encodingDesc.p: The published edition from which this e-text was transcribed is printed in the Devanāgarī script. The electronic text below is in a lossless transliteration using the Latin alphabet. The transliteration scheme used is the IAST (The International Alphabet of Sanskrit Transliteration). IAST differs in small ways from ISO 15919, but is preferred by most working Sanskrit scholars. Conversion of this file to ISO 15919 can be achieved by performing the following replacements throughout the file: ṛ -> r̥ and ṃ -> ṁ

The word separation is inconsistent. It mostly is transliterated as Devanāgarī ("ityevam" not "ity evam".), but in several occasions orthography follows general transliteration principles in roman script.
Vowel merging is inconsistent. Most have not been separated, but there are several occasions where separation occurs with "+" or "++" (e.g."na+ācaret", "ca++āme").
The seventh section of the fifth chapter (AS.Ci.7) is missing.

div.head: prathamādhyāyaḥ
div.p: AS.Sū.1.1 rāgādirogāḥ sahajāḥ samūlā yenā 'śusarve jagato 'pyapāstāḥ |
AS.Sū.1.2 athāta āyuṣkāmīyaṃ nāmādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ iti ha smā+āhurātreyādayo maharṣayaḥ ||
dadau dakṣāya so 'śvibhyāṃ tau śatakratave tataḥ ||
AS.Sū.1.9 gatamaṣṭāṅgatāṃ puṇyaṃ bubudhe yaṃ pitāmahaḥ |
gṛhītvā te tamāmrāyaṃ prakāśya ca parasparam ||
AS.Sū.1.12 svaṃ svaṃ tantraṃ tataste 'pi cakrustāni kṛtāni ca |
AS.Sū.1.13 taiḥ praśastāni tānyeṣāṃ pratiṣṭhāṃ bhuvi lebhire |
AS.Sū.1.15 tantrakāraiḥ sa eva 'rthaḥ kvacit kścidviśeṣataḥ |
AS.Sū.1.21 vāyuḥ pittaṃ kaphaśceti trayo doṣāḥ samāsataḥ |
vikṛtā 'vikṛtā dehaṃ ghnanti te varttayanti ca ||
koṣṭhaḥ krūro mṛdurmadhyo madhyaḥ syāttaiḥ samairapi ||
AS.Sū.1.26 samadhātuḥ samastāsu śreṣṭhā nindyā dvidoṣajāḥ |
tatra rūkṣo laghu śītaḥ kharaḥ sūkṣmaścalo 'nilaḥ ||
AS.Sū.1.27 pittaṃ sasnehatīkṣṇoṣṇaṃ laghu visraṃ saraṃ dravam |
snigdhaḥ śīto gururmandaḥ ślakṣṇo mṛtsnaḥ sthiraḥ ||
AS.Sū.1.30 rasādistheṣu doṣeṣu vyādhayaḥ sambhavanti ye |
AS.Sū.1.31 prīṇanaṃ jīvanaṃ lepaḥ sneho dhāraṇapūraṇe |
AS.Sū.1.34 tatrādyā mārutaṃ ghnanti trayastiktādayaḥ kapham |
AS.Sū.1.35 śamanaṃ kopanaṃ svasthahitaṃ dravyamiti tridhā |
indriyārthā vyavāyī ca vikāṣī cāpare guṇāḥ ||
AS.Sū.1.38 vyavāyī dehamakhilaṃ vyāpya pākāya kalpate |
AS.Sū.1.46 śodhanaṃ śamanaṃ ceti samāsādauṣadhaṃ dvidhā |
AS.Sū.1.47 vastirvireko vamanaṃ tathā tailaṃ ghṛtaṃ madhu |
vamau madātyaye 'rśassu viśi dvau dvau ca mūtrite ||
AS.Sū.1.62 mūrdhni vraṇe tathā dvau dvau sadyobhaṅge bhagandare |
AS.Sū.1.63 viṣe dvau bhujage kīṭe dvau ca lūtāsu mūṣike |

div.head: dvitīyo 'dhyāyaḥ
div.p: AS.Sū.2.3 brahmacārī jitadvandvo dhīraḥ sucaritaḥ sthiraḥ |
AS.Sū.2.5 pañcadaśyāmacandrāyāṃ parokṣe vā guroḥ paṭhet |
AS.Sū.2.7 na brūyāt kevalaṃ nāma nā 'sādhvapi vināṭayet |
AS.Sū.2.10 sa muhyatyāturaṃ prāpya prāpya bhīrurivāhavam |
AS.Sū.2.11 sa satsu garhāmāpneti vadhaṃ carcchati rājataḥ |
AS.Sū.2.12 jñānaṃ caturvidhaṃ yasya sa rājārho bhiṣaktamaḥ |
pradīpabhūtaṃ śāstraṃ hi darśanaṃ vipulā matiḥ ||
āhūta eva yo yāti suveṣaḥ sunimittataḥ ||
AS.Sū.2.15 gatvā 'turārthādanyatra na nidhatte manaḥ kvacit |
AS.Sū.2.16 hrepaṇīyāṃ ca tadvāarttāṃ na prakāśayate bahiḥ |
AS.Sū.2.17 jānāti copacarituṃ sa vaidyaḥ siddhimaśnute |
AS.Sū.2.18 tābhiśca rahasi sthānaṃ parihāsaṃ ca varjayet |
AS.Sū.2.19 caṇḍaṃ śokāturaṃ bhīruṃ kṛtaghnaṃ vaidyamāninam |
sādhyo 'sādhya iti vyādhirdvidhā tau tu punardvidhā ||
AS.Sū.2.29 kṛcchrairupāyaiḥ kṛcchrastu mahadbhiśca cireṇa ca |
AS.Sū.2.31 yāti nāśeṣatāṃ rogaḥ karmaṇo niyatāyuṣaḥ |
AS.Sū.2.38 varttate yastu siddhārthaḥ sa sarvamativarttate ||

div.head: tṛtīyo 'dhyāyaḥ
div.p: AS.Sū.3.4 pravarttayet pracalitaṃ na tu yatnādudīrayet |
AS.Sū.3.6 na cātiraskṛtya mahīṃ bhayāśaktyostu kāmataḥ |
AS.Sū.3.9 snātvā bhoktumanā bhuktvā suptvā kṣutvā surārccane |
AS.Sū.3.10 prāṅmukho vā viviktastho na bahirjānu nānyadṛk |
AS.Sū.3.21 svādvamlalavaṇaṃ śuṣkaṃ suṣiraṃ pūti picchilam |
AS.Sū.3.22 dantān pūrvamadho gharṣet prātaḥ siñcecca locanaṃ |
AS.Sū.3.23 praṇamya devān vṛddhāṃśca maṅgalāṣṭaśataṃ śubham |
AS.Sū.3.31 prāyogikaṃ tato dhūmaṃ gandhamālyādi cācaret |
AS.Sū.3.34 mālyaṃ na lambaṃ na bahirna raktaṃ jalajāddate |
pathyaṃ suptotthite bhukte snāte vānte ca mānave ||
AS.Sū.3.38 dvipatraṃekaṃ pūgaṃ ca sacūrṇakhadiraṃ ca tat |
AS.Sū.3.40 lokadvayāviruddhāṃ ca dhanārthī saṃśrayet kriyām |
AS.Sū.3.42 niśi cātyayike kārye daṇḍī maulī sahāyavān |
na seveta na śarvaryāṃ vṛkṣacaityaṃ na catvaram ||
AS.Sū.3.48 nā 'tiprage 'tisāyaṃ vā na nabhomadhyage ravau |
AS.Sū.3.49 na śatruṇā nāviditairnaiko nādhārmikaiḥ saha |
AS.Sū.3.51 nā 'rohodviṣamaṃ śailaṃ nāvaṃ saṃśayitāṃ tarum |
nipātayenna loṣṭena na phalena phalaṃ drumāt ||
AS.Sū.3.52 na vāryamāṇaḥ praviśennādvāreṇa nā ca+āsane |
svayaṃ tiṣṭhet paragṛhe yuktaniṃdraṃ na bodhayet ||
AS.Sū.3.54 na svahastena dantairvā snānaṃ cānu samācaret |
AS.Sū.3.58 śiraḥ śravaṇapādeṣu taṃ viśeṣeṇa śīlayet |
vātapittāmayī bālo vṛddho 'jīrṇī ca taṃ tyajet ||
AS.Sū.3.64 taṃ kṛtvā 'nusukhaṃ dehaṃ marddayecca samantataḥ |
tṛṣṇā kṣayaḥ pratamako raktapittaṃ śramaḥ klamaḥ ||
AS.Sū.3.66 gajaṃ siṃha iva+ākarṣan bhajannati vinaśyati |
nā 'nāplutya śiraḥ snāyānna jale 'lpe na śītale ||
AS.Sū.3.71 nātmānamīkṣeta jale na taṭastho jalāśayam |
AS.Sū.3.72 snātvā na mṛjyāt gātrāṇi dhunuyānna śiroruhān |
AS.Sū.3.73 na tvambaraṃ pūrvadhṛtaṃ na ca tailavase spṛśet |
abhinandya prasannātmā hutvā datvā ca śaktitaḥ ||
notsaṅge bhakṣayet bhakṣyān jalaṃ nāñjalinā pibet ||
AS.Sū.3.83 hrīmān dhīmān mahotsāhaḥ saṃvibhāgī priyātithiḥ |
AS.Sū.3.84 dātā pitṛbhyaḥ piṇḍasya yaṣṭā hotā kṛpātmakaḥ |
dharmyamarthyaṃ priyaṃ tathyaṃ mitaṃ pathyaṃ vadedvacaḥ ||
AS.Sū.3.89 nā 'runtudaḥ syānna krūro na tīkṣṇo no 'patāpavān |
hetāvīrṣyenna tu phale pāpaṃ pāpe 'pi nācaret ||
AS.Sū.3.90 parasya daṇḍaṃ nodyacchet kruddho nainaṃ nipātayet |
AS.Sū.3.96 na kāṃsyabhājane tau ca nopaviṣṭaḥ prasādhayet |
nā 'nuvātaṃ na vivṛto na klānto nā 'nyamānasaḥ ||
AS.Sū.3.98 dhamennā 'syena na skandennā 'dhaḥ kuryānna pādataḥ |
AS.Sū.3.99 nāpraśastaṃ na viṇmūtraṃ na darpaṇamamārjitam |
AS.Sū.3.100 uparaktaṃ ca bhāsvantaṃ vāsasā vā tirohitam |
AS.Sū.3.101 striyaṃ stravantīṃ nodakyāṃ na nagnāṃ nā 'nyasaṅgatām |
AS.Sū.3.102 śayīta naikaśayane na cāśnīyāstayā saha |
AS.Sū.3.104 pāyayantīṃ carantīṃ vā nānyasmai gāṃ nivedayet |
tithiṃ pakṣasya na brūyāt nakṣatrāṇi na nirdiśet ||
AS.Sū.3.111 madyātisaktiṃ vistraṃbhasvātantrye strīṣu ca tyajet |
AS.Sū.3.112 na deśaṃ vyādhibahulaṃ nāvaidyaṃ nāpyanāyakam |
sāyaṃ bhuktvā laghu hitaṃ samāhitamanāḥ śuciḥ ||
AS.Sū.3.124 sarvatejonidhānaṃ hi nṛpa ityucyate bhuvi |
AS.Sū.3.126 satvādyavasthā vividhāśca tāstāḥ samyak samīkṣyā+ātmahitaṃ vidadhyāt |
anyo 'pi yaḥ kaścidihā 'sti mārgo hitopadeśeṣu bhajeta taṃ ca ||
AS.Sū.3.127 iti caritamupetaḥ sarvajīvopajīvyaṃ prathitapṛthuguṇaudho rakṣito devatābhiḥ |
samadhikaśatajīvī nirvṛtaḥ puṇyakarmā vrajati sugatinimno dehabhede 'pi tuṣṭim ||

div.head: caturtho 'dhyāyaḥ
div.p: AS.Sū.4.2 kālo hi nāma bhagavānanādinidhano yathopacitakarmānusārī |
yadanurodhādādityādayaḥ khādayaśca mahābhūtaviśeṣāstathā tathā vipariṇamanto janmavatāṃ janmamaraṇasyarturasavīryadopadehabalavyāpatsaṃ padāṃ ca kāraṇatvaṃ patyayatāṃ pratipadyante ||

AS.Sū.4.4 tatrākṣinimeṣo māntrā tāḥ pañcadaśa kāṣṭhā tāstriṃśat kalā tāḥ sadaśabhāgā viṃśatirnāḍikā nāḍikādvayaṃ muhūrtaśca te tulyarātrindive rāśibhāge catvāraḥ pādonā yāmaḥ taiścaturbhiraho rātriśca pañcadaśāhorātrāḥ pakṣaḥ pakṣadvayaṃ māsaḥ sa śuklāntaḥ tairmārgaśīrṣādibhirdvisaṃkhyaiḥ kramāddhemantaśiśiravasantagrīṣmavarṣaśaradākhyāḥ ṣaḍṛtavo bhavanti teṣu śiśirādayastrayo raverudagayanamādānañca śeṣā dakṣiṇāyanaṃ visargaśca tāvādānavisargau varṣam ||

AS.Sū.4.5 tayorādānamāgneyam tasmin khalu kālasvabhāvamārgaparigṛhīto 'tyarthopṇagabhastijālamaṇḍalo 'rkastatsaṃparkādvāyavaśca tīvrarūkṣāḥ somajaṃ guṇamupaśoṣayanto jagataḥ snehamādadānā ṛtukrameṇo pajanitaraukṣyā rūkṣān rasāṃstiktakaṣāyakaṭukānabhiprabalayanto nṛṇāṃ daurbalyamāvahanti ||

AS.Sū.4.6 vasargastu saumyaḥ tasminnapi kālamārgameghavātavarṣābhihataprabhāve dakṣiṇāyanage 'rke śaśini cāvyāhatabale śiśirābhirbhābhiḥ śaśvadāpyāyamāne māhendrasalila praśānta santāpe jagatyarūkṣā rasāḥ pravardhante 'mlalavaṇamadhurā yathākramaṃ balaṃ copacīyate nṛṇāmiti ||
hemante śiśire cāgryaṃ visargādānayorbalam śaradvasantayormadhyaṃ hīnaṃ varṣānidāghayoḥ ||
AS.Sū.4.14 tejaḥ sahacaraḥ kupyecchītaḥ śīte viśeṣataḥ |
AS.Sū.4.20 raukṣyaṃ ca+ādānajaṃ tasmāt kāryaḥ pūrvo 'dhikaṃ vidhiḥ |
AS.Sū.4.23 tadā prabādhamāno 'gniṃ rogān prakurute bahūn |
AS.Sū.4.28 diśo jvalanti bhūmiśca māruto naiṛtaḥ sukhaḥ |
AS.Sū.4.32 madyaṃ na sevyaṃ svalpaṃ vā sevyaṃ subahuvāri vā |
AS.Sū.4.34 svādu śītaṃ dravaṃ cānnaṃ jāṅgalānmṛgapakṣiṇaḥ |
AS.Sū.4.36 sarāṃsi vāpiḥ saritaḥ kānanāni himāni ca |
AS.Sū.4.45 divyaṃ kvathitakūpotthaṃ cauṇḍaṃ sārasameva vā |
AS.Sū.4.50 śaradi vyoma śubhrābhraṃ kiñcit paṅkāṅkitā mahī |
taptānāṃ sañcitaṃ pūrvaṃ tadā pittaṃ prakupyati ||
AS.Sū.4.57 nirmalaṃ śuci kālena pakvaṃ pāne 'mṛtopamam |
AS.Sū.4.62 asātmyajā hi rogāḥ syuḥ sahasā tyāgaśīlanāt |

div.head: pañcamo 'dhyāyaḥ
div.p: AS.Sū.5.6 mūtrasya rodhāt pūrve ca prāyo rogāḥ tadauṣadham |
AS.Sū.5.7 annapānaṃ ca viḍbhedi viḍrodhottheṣu yakṣmasu |
mūtrajeṣu tu pāne ca prāgbhaktaṃ śasyeta ghṛtam ||
AS.Sū.5.11 pravartayet kṣutiṃ saktāṃ svedābhyaṅgau ca śīlayet |
tatra yojyaṃ laghu snigdhamuṣṇamalpaṃ ca bhojanam ||
śoṣo hidhmā ca kāryo 'tra kāsahā sutarāṃ vidhiḥ ||
AS.Sū.5.18 sagulmā bāṣpatastatra svapno madyaṃ priyāḥ kathāḥ |
AS.Sū.5.20 vyāyāmaḥ srutirasrasya śastaṃ cātra virecanam |
bastiśuddhikaraiḥ siddhaṃ bhajet kṣīraṃ priyāḥ striyaḥ ||
AS.Sū.5.23 tatra seveta sarvaṃ ca varjayedvegadhāriṇam |
nirdiṣṭaṃ sādhanaṃ tatra bhūyiṣṭhaṃ ye tu tān prati ||
AS.Sū.5.25 tataścānekadhā prāyaḥ pavano yat prakupyati |
AS.Sū.5.33 ye tu saṃśodhanaiḥ śuddhā na teṣāṃ punarudbhavaḥ |
AS.Sū.5.62 śītodbhavaṃ doṣacayaṃ vasante viśodhayan grīṣmajamabhrakāle |
ghanātyaye vārṣikamāśu samyak prāpnoti rogānṛtujān na jātu ||
dātā samaḥ satyaparaḥ kṣamāvānāptopasevī ca bhavatyarogaḥ ||
jitendriyaṃ nānupatānti rogāstatkālayuktaṃ yadi nāsti daivam ||
AS.Sū.5.65 kāle 'nukūlo viṣayā manojñā dharmyāḥ kriyāḥ karma sukhānubandhi |
sattvaṃ vidheyaṃ viśadā ca buddhirbhavanti dhīrasya sadā sukhāya ||

div.head: ṣaṣṭho 'dhyāyaḥ
div.p: AS.Sū.6.2 jīvanaṃ tarpaṇaṃ hṛdyaṃ hlādi buddhiprabodhanam |
AS.Sū.6.8 śvete kaṣāyaṃ tatsvādu kṛṣṇe tiktaṃ ca pāṇḍure |
AS.Sū.6.13 sārasaṃ svādu laghu ca tāṭākaṃ guru vātalam |
AS.Sū.6.14 audbhidaṃ svādu pittaghnaṃ svādu vāpījalaṃ gaghu |
nādeyaṃ vātalaṃ rūkṣaṃ kaṭukaṃ ca tadādiśet ||
AS.Sū.6.17 himavanmalayodbhūtāḥ pathyāstā eva ca sthitāḥ |
anārtavaṃ ca yaddivyamārtavaṃ prathamaṃ ca yat ||
AS.Sū.6.28 ajīrṇe kvathitaṃ cā++āme pakve jīrṇe 'pi netarat |
śīte vidhirayaṃ tapte tvajīrṇe śiśiraṃ tyajet ||
AS.Sū.6.29 pānīyaṃ prāṇināṃ prāṇā viśvameva ca tanmayam |
na hi toyādvinā vṛttiḥ svasthasya vyādhitasya vā ||
AS.Sū.6.31 kevalaṃ sauṣadhaṃ pakvamāmamuṣṇaṃ hitaṃ ca tat |
AS.Sū.6.34 pāke svādu himaṃ vīrye taduṣṇamapi yojitam |
AS.Sū.6.41 ante karoti sthūlatvamūrdhvaṃ cāmāśayāt kapham |
madhye madhyāṅgatāṃ sāmyaṃ dhātūnāṃ jaraṇaṃ sukham ||
AS.Sū.6.45 dīpanaṃ pācanaṃ kaṇṭhyaṃ laghu bastiviśodhanam |
AS.Sū.6.46 pānīyamuṣṇaṃ śītaṃ vā tridoṣaghnaṃ tṛḍaritijit |
AS.Sū.6.47 saṃsarge pittakaphayoḥ sannipāte ca śasyate |
AS.Sū.6.48 bhavet paryuṣitaṃ tacca toyaṃ himakarodbhavam |
AS.Sū.6.50 nālikerodakaṃ snigdhaṃ svādu vṛṣyaṃ himaṃ laghu |
AS.Sū.6.52 prāyaḥ payaḥ atra gavyaṃ tu jīvanīyaṃ rasāyanam |
AS.Sū.6.58 hastinyāḥ sthairyakṛt bāḍhaṃ uṣṇaṃ tvaikaśaphaṃ laghu |
AS.Sū.6.60 piṇyākāmlāśinīnāṃ tu gurvabhiṣyandi tat bhṛśam |
AS.Sū.6.62 amlapākarasaṃ grāhi gurūṣṇaṃ dadhi vātajit |
pīnase mūtrakuchre ca rūkṣaṃ tu grahaṇīgade ||
AS.Sū.6.65a na cānāmalakaṃ nāpi nityaṃ no mandamanyathā |
AS.Sū.6.65b takraṃ laghu kaṣāyāmlaṃ dīpanaṃ kaphavātajit |
AS.Sū.6.67 śītaṃ svādu kaṣāyāmlaṃ navanītaṃ navoddhṛtaṃ |
AS.Sū.6.76 ikṣoḥ saro guruḥ snigdho vṛṃhaṇaḥ kaphamūtrakṛt ||
AS.Sū.6.77 vṛṣyaḥ śītaḥ pavanajit bhukte vātaprakopanaḥ |
AS.Sū.6.79 kiñcit kālavidhṛtyā ca vikṛtiṃ yāti yāntrikaḥ |
AS.Sū.6.88 uṣṇamuṣṇārtamuṣṇe ca yuktaṃ coṣṇairnihanti tat |
AS.Sū.6.89 kurvate te svayaṃ yacca saviṣā bhramarādayaḥ |
pracchardane nirūhe ca madhūṣṇaṃ na nivāryate ||
AS.Sū.6.91 na hi kaṣṭatamaṃ kiñcittadajīrṇādyato naram |
AS.Sū.6.93 bhrāmaraṃ pauṣpikaṃ kṣaudraṃ mākṣikaṃ ca yathottaram |
varaṃ jīrṇaṃ ca teṣvantye dve eva hyupayojayet ||
AS.Sū.6.94 tailaṃ svayonivattatra mukhyaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ vyavāyi ca |
AS.Sū.6.95 kṛśānāṃ bṛṃhaṇāyālaṃ sthūlānāṃ karśanāya ca |
AS.Sū.6.97 satiktoṣaṇamairaṇḍaṃ tailaṃ svādu saraṃ guru |
AS.Sū.6.102 karañjanimbaje tikte nātyuṣṇe tatra nirdiśet |
AS.Sū.6.105 vātapittaharaṃ keśyaṃ śleṣmalaṃ guru śītalam |
AS.Sū.6.106 tilatailaṃ varaṃ teṣu kausumbhamavaraṃ param |
kākamadgu vasā tadvat kāraṇḍotthā ca ninditā ||
AS.Sū.6.109 dīpanaṃ rocanaṃ madyaṃ tīkṣṇokṣṇaṃ tuṣṭipuṣṭidam |
tadguṇā vāruṇī hṛdyā laghustīkṣṇā nihanti ca ||
AS.Sū.6.116 jagalaḥ pācano grāhī rūkṣastadvacca medakaḥ |
AS.Sū.6.117 nātitīvramadā laghvī pathyā baibhītakī surā |
vraṇe pāṇḍvāmaye kuṣṭhe na cātyarthaṃ virudhyate ||
AS.Sū.6.118 viṣṭambhinī yavasurā gurvī rūkṣā tridoṣalā |
mārdvikaṃ lekhanaṃ hṛdyaṃ nātyuṣṇaṃ madhuraṃ saram ||
AS.Sū.6.122 śārkaraḥ surabhiḥ tvādurhṛdyo nātimado maghuḥ |
AS.Sū.6.125 maireyo madhuro hṛṣyaḥ saraḥ santarpaṇo guruḥ |
AS.Sū.6.126 drākṣāsavo madhusamaḥ paramaṃ sa tu dīpanaḥ |
śāṇḍākī cā 'sutaṃ cānyat kālāmlaṃ rocanaṃ laghu ||
AS.Sū.6.132 dhānyāmlaṃ bhedi tīkṣṇoṣṇaṃ pittakṛt sparśaśītalam |
AS.Sū.6.142 pittaṃ tiktaṃ viṣaharaṃ rocanā kaphavātajit |

div.head: saptamo 'dhyāyaḥ
div.p: AS.Sū.7.3 puṇḍraḥ pāṇḍuḥ puṇḍarīkaḥ pramodo gauraśārivau |
mahāṃstaṃ cānu kalamastaṃ cāpyanu tataḥ pare ||
AS.Sū.7.8 sṛṣṭamūtrapurīṣāśca pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ ca ninditāḥ |
snigdho grāhī laghuḥ svādustridoṣaghnaḥ sthiro himaḥ ||
koradūṣaḥ paraṃ grāī sparśe śīto viṣāpahaḥ ||
AS.Sū.7.18 rūkṣaḥ śīto guruḥ svāduḥ saro viḍvātakṛdyavaḥ |
AS.Sū.7.20 ūṣṇāḥ sarā veṇuyavāḥ kaṣāyā vātapittalāḥ |
vṛṣyaḥ śīto guruḥ snigdho jīvano vātapittahā ||
AS.Sū.7.21 sandhānakarī madhuro godhūmaḥ sthairyakṛt saraḥ |
pathyā nandīmukhī śītā kaṣāyā madhurā laghuḥ ||
rūkṣā baddhamalāḥ śītā vipāke kaṭukā hitāḥ ||
ghnanti śukrāśmarīṃ śukraṃ dṛṣṭiṃ śophaṃ tathodaram ||
AS.Sū.7.32 madhurāḥ śītalā gurvyo balaghnyo rūkṣaṇātmikāḥ |
dṛkcchukrahṛt kaṭuḥ pāke tadvat bījaṃ kusumbhajam ||
AS.Sū.7.36 māṣo 'tra sarveṣvavaro yavakaḥ śūkajeṣu ca |
navaṃ dhānyamabhiṣyandi sekyaṃ kedārajaṃ ca yat ||
AS.Sū.7.41 vilepī grāhiṇī hṛdyā tṛṣṇāghnī dīpanī hitā |
AS.Sū.7.42 sudhautaḥ prasrutaḥ svinnastyaktoṣmā caudano laghuḥ |
AS.Sū.7.46 hṛdyaḥ pathyaḥ paraṃ vṛṣyo bṛṃhaṇaḥ prīṇano rasaḥ |
piśitena rasastatra yūṣo dhānyaiḥ khalaḥ phalaiḥ ||
AS.Sū.7.52 cāṇḍākīvaṭakaṃ dṛghnaṃ doṣalaṃ glapanaṃ guru |
AS.Sū.7.53 hṛdyā vṛṣyā rucikarā guruvo rāgaṣāḍavāḥ |
AS.Sū.7.55 rasālā bṛṃhaṇī vṛṣyā snigdhā balaya rucipradā |
AS.Sū.7.56 viṣṭambhi mūtralaṃ hṛdyaṃ yathādravyaguṇaṃ ca tat |
AS.Sū.7.58 dhāna viṣṭambhinī rūkṣā tarpaṇī lekhanī guruḥ |
AS.Sū.7.59 saktavo laghavaḥ pānāt sadya eva balapradāḥ |
nicayāt kaṭhinā gurvī proktā piṇḍī mṛdurlaghuḥ ||
AS.Sū.7.61 nodakāntaritānna dvirna niśāyāṃ na kevalān |
na bhuktvā na dvijaiśchitvā saktūnadyānna vā bahūn ||
AS.Sū.7.63 piṇyāko glapano rūkṣo viṣṭambhī dṛṣṭidūṣaṇaḥ |
AS.Sū.7.68 vartako vartikā ceti tittiriḥ krakaraḥ śikhī |
AS.Sū.7.73 pārāvataḥ pāṇavika ityuktāḥ pratudā dvijāḥ |
AS.Sū.7.77 dhūmikā madhuhā ceti prasahā mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ |
laghīyān ṣaḍrasaścāsau grāhī rūkṣo himaḥ śaśaḥ ||
AS.Sū.7.91 tadvacca kukkuṭo vṛṣyo grāmyastu śleṣmalo guruḥ |
AS.Sū.7.95 godhā niyachati viṣaṃ mūṣikaḥ śukravardhanaḥ |
caṭakāḥ śleṣmalāḥ snigdhā vātaghnāḥ śukralāḥ param ||
kulīraḥ paramaṃ vṛṣyo bṛṃhaṇaḥ prīṇano guruḥ ||
AS.Sū.7.102 viparītamato jñeyamāvikaṃ bṛṃhaṇaṃ tu tat |
sadyohataṃ vayasthaṃ ca śuddhaṃ surabhi śasyate ||
AS.Sū.7.104 eṇaḥ kuraṅgo hariṇaḥ śaśo lāvaḥ kapiñjalaḥ |
AS.Sū.7.106 lāvaiṇagodhāḥ siṃhāśca nindito gauḥ sadarduraḥ |
AS.Sū.7.108 puṃstriyoḥ pūrvapaścārdhe guruṇī garbhiṇī guruḥ |
AS.Sū.7.113 hanti doṣatrayaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ vṛṣyā soṣṇā rasāyanī |
tiktaṃ pāke kaṭu grāhi vātalaṃ kaphapittajit ||
AS.Sū.7.118 hṛdyaṃ paṭolaṃ kriminut svādupākaṃ rucipradam |
AS.Sū.7.119 vṛṣaṃ tu vamikāsaghnaṃ raktapittaharaṃ param |
AS.Sū.7.124 paṭolādiguṇaṃ svādu kaṣāyaṃ pittajit param |
AS.Sū.7.125 satiktaṃ laghu cakṣuṣyaṃ vṛṣyaṃ doṣatrayapraṇut |
snigdhaṃ śītaṃ guru svādu bṛṃhaṇaṃ śukrakṛt param ||
AS.Sū.7.127 pālakyā pichilā gurvvī śleṣmalā bhedinī himā |
AS.Sū.7.129 cakṣuṣyā sarvadoṣaghnī jīvantī madhurā himā |
śākānāṃ pravarā nyūnā dvitīyā kiñcideva tu ||
AS.Sū.7.134 śīrṇavṛntaṃ tu sakṣāraṃ pittalaṃ kaphavātajit |
AS.Sū.7.136 satarūḍhaṃ kadambaṃ ca rūkṣaṃ grāhi himaṃ guru |
AS.Sū.7.139 ālūpāni ca sarvāṇi tathā sūpyāni lakṣmaṇā |
AS.Sū.7.140 svādu rūkṣaṃ salavaṇaṃ vātaśleṣmakaraṃ guru |
laghupatrā tu yā cillī sā vāstukasamā matā ||
AS.Sū.7.142 takkārī varaṇaṃ svādu satiktaṃ kaphavātajit |
AS.Sū.7.144 laghuruṣṇā sarā tiktā sorupūkā ca lāṅgalī |
AS.Sū.7.148 rūkṣoṣṇamamlaṃ kausumbhaṃ guru pittakaraṃ saram |
sakṣāraṃ madhuraṃ snigdhamuṣṇaṃ guru ca sārṣapam ||
AS.Sū.7.150 tanmūlakaṃ doṣaharaṃ laghu soṣṇaṃ niyacchati |
AS.Sū.7.152 gurvabhiṣyandi ca snigdhasiddhaṃ tadapi vātajit |
AS.Sū.7.156 rase pāke ca kaṭukaṃ doṣotkleśakaraṃ laghu |
AS.Sū.7.159 kaṣāyatiktamadhurā mūtralā na ca pittakṛt |
AS.Sū.7.161 hṛdyaḥ keśyo gururvṛṣyaḥ snigdho rocanadīpanaḥ |
AS.Sū.7.164 dīpanaḥ sūraṇo rucyaḥ kaphaghno viśado laghuḥ |
AS.Sū.7.165 patre puṣpe phale kande ca gurutā kramāt |
AS.Sū.7.166 drākṣā phalottamā vṛṣyā cakṣuṣyā sṛṣṭamūtraviṭ |
AS.Sū.7.168 udriktapittān jayati tridoṣān svādu dāḍimam |
AS.Sū.7.169 sarvaṃ hṛdyaṃ laghu snigdhaṃ grāhi rocanadīpanam |
ūrumāṇaṃ priyālaṃ ca bṛṃhaṇaṃ guru śītalam ||
AS.Sū.7.173 nālikeraṃ guru snigdhaṃ pittaghnaṃ svādu śītalam |
AS.Sū.7.174 mocaṃ svādurasaṃ proktaṃ kaṣāyaṃ nātiśītalam |
AS.Sū.7.175 snigdhaṃ svādu kaṣāyaṃ ca rājādanaphalaṃ guru |
phalaṃ tu pittalaṃ tālaṃ saraṃ kāśmaryajaṃ himam ||
AS.Sū.7.181 kaṣāyamadhuraṃ rūkṣaṃ śītalaṃ guru lekhanam |
AS.Sū.7.185 viṣṭambhakṛdakaṇṭhyaṃ ca sāmlaṃ tu kṣīrivṛkṣajam |
AS.Sū.7.187 svādu sāmlaṃ guru snigdhaṃ mārutaghnamapittalam |
AS.Sū.7.189 kaṣāyaṃ rocanaṃ hṛdyaṃ vātalaṃ lavalīphalam |
AS.Sū.7.190 pakvaṃ bālaṃ punastīkṣṇaṃ pittalaṃ laghu dīpanam |
AS.Sū.7.191 vṛkṣāmlaṃ grāhi rūkṣoṣṇaṃ laghu dīpanarocanam |
AS.Sū.7.192 phalaṃ karañjaṃ viṣṭambhi pittaśleṣmāvirodhi ca |
AS.Sū.7.193 kaṭupākarasaṃ pīlu tīkṣṇoṣṇaṃ bhedi pittalam |
AS.Sū.7.194 satiktaṃ svādu yat pīlu nātyuṣṇaṃ tattridoṣajit |
AS.Sū.7.196 bṛṃhaṇaṃ madhuraṃ māṃsaṃ vātapittaharaṃ guru |
AS.Sū.7.198 bhallātakasya tvaṅmāṃsaṃ bṛṃhaṇaṃ svādu śītalam |
AS.Sū.7.199 svādvamlaṃ śītamuṣṇaṃ ca dvidhā pārāvataṃ guru |
AS.Sū.7.200 pakvamāśu jarāṃ yāti nātyuṣṇaṃ guru doṣalam |
AS.Sū.7.209 na śakyaṃ vistareṇāpi vaktuṃ sarvaṃ tu sarvathā |
tatastato yato dṛṣṭāste te bhāvāstathā tathā ||
AS.Sū.7.211 mātrayā sevitaṃ madyaṃ hanti rogāstadudbhavān |
kuṣṭhaṃ tatkāryapi tilo hanti bhallātakaiḥ saha ||
AS.Sū.7.218 saktavo vātalā rūkṣāḥ pītāste tarpayanti tu |
AS.Sū.7.221 laghu pittaharā lājā vrīhito gurupittalāt |
AS.Sū.7.228 medhyastilaḥ sparśaśīto medhyaṃ tailaṃ khalo himaḥ |
tasyaiva śleṣmakāritvaṃ na tailasya khalasya vā ||
AS.Sū.7.230 kṣāraḥ prācyeṣu matsyāstu saindhaveṣvaśmakeṣu tu |
dehasātmyaṃ ghṛtaṃ kṣīraṃ madyaṃ māsaṃ ca kasyacit ||
AS.Sū.7.233 peyā yūṣo raso 'nyasya godhūmo 'nyasya śālayaḥ |
sātmyaṃ hyāśu balaṃ dhatte nātidoṣaṃ ca bahvapi ||
AS.Sū.7.235 sraṃsanaṃ sat payo gavyaṃ bhavati grāhi kasyacit |
AS.Sū.7.237 takramāmaṃ kaphaṃ koṣṭhe hanti kaṇṭhe karoti tu |
dṛṣṭe sparśahimaṃ dravyaṃ śrotrasyoṣṇaṃ tu pūjitam ||
AS.Sū.7.239 payaḥ svādu saraṃ śītaṃ viparītaṃ tato dadhi |
AS.Sū.7.240 payo dadhi ca vātaghnamajātaṃ vātalaṃ tu tat |
śīte na tu tadādyante snigdhāmlalavaṇā hitāḥ ||
AS.Sū.7.243 ṛtuṣvanyo raseṣvanyo raukṣye snehe bale kramaḥ |
AS.Sū.7.244 mūlakaṃ dosajidbālaṃ viparītaṃ tu kandavat |
jvare peyā kaṣāyāśca sarpiḥ kṣīraṃ virecanam ||
AS.Sū.7.248 añjanaṃ pakvadoṣasya pratiśyāye ca nāvanam |
AS.Sū.7.250 ahitāḥ saktavaḥ śuṣkā hitāste tu pramehiṇaḥ |
AS.Sū.7.251 vātalaṃ vātakope 'pi varṣāsu madhu śasyate |
tadeva madyaṃ madyasya viṣasya tu viṣāntaram ||
AS.Sū.7.253 svedairyāti śamaṃ dāhaḥ prāyo laśunapānajaḥ |
te taireva punardaṣṭāḥ sadyo jahati jīvitam ||
AS.Sū.7.256 svayameva viṣaṃ tīvraṃ tān punarnātibādhate |
sarvāṅgavyāpi teṣāṃ ca śukravat saṃsṛtaṃ viṣam ||
chardighnī makṣikāviṭ ca makṣikaiva tu vāmayet ||
tulye 'pi deśakālādau laṅghanaṃ na samaṃ matam ||
AS.Sū.7.260 ityete 'nye ca bahavaḥ sūksmā durlabhahetukāḥ |

div.head: athāṣṭamo 'dhyāyaḥ
div.p: AS.Sū.8.1 athāto 'nnarakṣāvidhimadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ iti ha smāhurātreyādayo maharṣayaḥ ||
AS.Sū.8.2 īśvarāṇāṃ vasumatāṃ viśeṣeṇa tu bhūbhujāṃ prāyeṇa mitrebhyo 'pyamitrā bhūyāṃso bhavanti |

tasmādrājā kulīnaṃ snigdhamāptamāstikarmāyarmāyaparigrahaṃ dakṣaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ nibhṛtaṃ śucimanuddhatamanalasamavyasaninamanahaṅkṛtamakopanamasāhasikaṃ vākyārthāvabodhakuśalaṃ niṣṇātamaṣṭāṅge yathāmrāyamāryuvede suvihitayogakṣemaṃ sannihitāgadādiyogaṃ sātmyajñaṃ ca prāṇācāryaṃ parigṛhṇīyāt |
tamarthamānābhyāṃ yathākālaṃ gurumiva śiṣayaḥ pitaramiva putraḥ pūjayet |
na hi bhadro 'pi gajapatirniraṅkuśaḥ ślāghanīyo janasya |
te hi pramādaparigatā duḥkhāsahiṣṇavaśca svayamapyapathyarucayaḥ sannihitāhitapriyavacanaprāyaparicārakāśca tasmādbhiṣajo rājā rājagṛhāsanne niveśanaṃ kārayet |
AS.Sū.8.4 sa samyaksampannamannaṃ suparīkṣitaṃ viśuddhamagnyādiṣu prāgupanītaṃ śikhinā dṛṣṭamabhiprokṣitaṃ prokṣāṇaiḥ puraḥsthito rājānaṃ hastabaddhauṣadhiratnaṃ bhojayet ||
pakvaṃ ca sadyaḥ paryuṣitamiva nirūṣma stabdhaṃ ca jāyate
kvāthaḥ dhyāmatā śyāmatā hīnātiriktavikṛtānāṃ cātracchāyānāṃ darśanamadarśanameva vā
viśeṣeṇa lavaṇolbaṇeṣu phenamālā rasasya madhye nīlā rājiḥ
AS.Sū.8.11 tatra naladakuṣṭhalāmajjakaiḥ kṣaudradrutairnasyamañjanaṃ ca kuryāt |

triphalātrikaṭunāgapuṣpamadhukabarhiṇaparṇībṛhatīdvayacūrṇaṃ siṃhavyāghravṛkatarakṣudvīpimārjārasṛgālamṛgagodhānāmanyatamapittarasasaṃyuktaṃ sakṣaudraṃ pānameṣa jīvano nāmāgadaḥ paraṃ sarvaviṣauṣadham |
tasmin jīrṇe śyāmāvyoṣātiviṣāsiddhena payasā ghṛtena vopastambhitāṃ mudgayūṣeṇa kiṃcillavaṇena sasarpiṣkeṇa mṛdvodanaṃ bhojayet |
tatra nīlinīphalayuktena sarpiṣā virecanaṃ samākṣikaṃ ca dūṣīviṣāriṃ dadhnā pāyayet |

dantakāṣṭhaprayukte tu viṣe kūrcakaviśaraṇamauṣadhagandho rūkṣatā tāludantajihvoṣṭhamāṃsaśophaśca tatra pracchāya dhātakīpuṣpajāmbavāsthiharītakīcūrṇaiḥ sakṣaudraiḥ saptacchadakalkena vā pratisāraṇaṃ kuryāt |
kapitthameṣaśṛṅgībhallātakānāṃ puṣpairvaraṇaniryāsena vāñjanaṃ bṛhatīśirīṣabījaprapauṇḍarīkanāgabalācūrṇaṃ saptakṛtvo madhunā bhāvayet |
tatrātiviṣāśvetākākamācīmadayantikākalke kṣīrasiddhaṃ sarpirnnasye pāne ca vidadhyāt ||
AS.Sū.8.19 śiro 'bhyaṅgaprayukte śirovedanā granthijanma keśacyavanaṃ ca |
tatra śyāmāpālindītaṇḍulīyakacūrṇa ghṛtarkṣapittaiḥ subhāvitayā kṛṣṇamṛdā pralepaḥ |
tatra bahupatrāsvaraso ghṛtakṣaudrasaṃyuktaḥ pratipūraṇaṃ somavalkaraso vā suśītaḥ |
AS.Sū.8.22 ghreyāṇi ghrāpayitvā tu spṛśyān saṃspṛśya tānapi |
AS.Sū.8.23 tato vijñāya śuddhiṃ ca bhājanasyodakasya ca |
AS.Sū.8.35 prasthānaṃ vā niveśaṃ vā nāvijñāya prayojayet |
chardirmūrchā jvaro mohaḥ śiroduḥkhaṃ ca jāyate ||
sarvagandhaiḥ samaṃ yojya pacetpakve ca nikṣipet ||
cāraṭīṃ trāyamāṇāṃ ca prokṣayettena tāṃ bhuvam ||
AS.Sū.8.41 saviṣaṃ virasaṃ toyaṃ kavoṣṇaṃ rājibhiścitam |
AS.Sū.8.45 phaṇijjakaṃ prativiṣāṃ dagdhvā tadbhasma gālayet |
bahuśo gālitaṃ tacca pācayettatra ca kṣipet ||
AS.Sū.8.53 bhūmimuddiśya yatproktaṃ tatsarvaṃ tatra ceṣyate |
AS.Sū.8.54 vividhān kurvate yogān kuśalāḥ khalu mānavāḥ |

AS.Sū.8.59 atha śuklapakṣe puṇye 'hani puṣyapunarvasuhastacitrāmṛgaśiraḥśravaṇarevatīśatabhiṣakprājāpatyottarāṇāmanyatamena nakṣatreṇa yogamupagate bhagavatyauṣadhipatau praśaste muhūrte sindhusrotaḥsamutthaṃsnigdhaṃ saprabhaṃ gandhavarṇacchadairnīlotpalābhamañjanamāharet |

tataścāryāvalokiteśvaramāryatārāṃ brahmadakṣāśvirudrendradityasomavaruṇavaiśvānaravāyuviṣṇujanakabharadvājadhanvantarisuśrutabhavyasukanyāskandaścyavanavainateyānanyāṃśca yathāvidhyuktadevatāḥ sumano 'kṣatalājasvastikasaṃyāvanistuṣayavasaṃskṛtaguḍaghṛtamiśrapāyasairarcayitvāvṛddhavaidyabrahmaṇāṃśca śuklavāsaso mahatībhirdakṣiṇābhiḥ pūjayitvā tasminnagnau tadañjanaṃ dhmātaṃ dhmātamāvṛtya pṛthakpṛthaṅniṣecayet |
tataḥ śukle vāsasi badhvā dvādaśarātra māntarikṣe 'mbhāsi vāsayet |

tataśchāyāyāṃ viśoṣya sphaṭikamuktāpravālakālanusāryāpratīvāpaṃ punarapi balimaṅgalapūrvakamahatavāsasā kanyayā dṛṣadi peṣayitvāsuvarṇarajatatāmraśaṅkhaśailadviradaradanagavayaśṛṅgavaiḍūryasphaṭikameṣaśṛṅgyasanasārānyatamaghaṭṭitāyāmañjanikāyāṃ nidhāpayet |
atha pūrvavatpunarapi kṛtasvastyayanaṃ sāvitreṇa karmaṇā sarvavit dvijanmā vidhivattadabhisaṃskuryāt |

tato gajaskandhamāropya pāṇḍuracchatracāmarabālavyajanairanugataṃ tathā śaṅkhadundubhisvanairdvijātivaraprayuktaiśca vedavādamiśraiḥ puṇyāhaghoṣaiḥ kṛtapuṣpopahāraṃ vaidyagṛhānnāyakagṛhamanupraveśayet |

anantaraṃ ca tena videhādhipopadiṣṭena sarvārtheṣu siddhenāñjanena yathoktānāmevāñjanabhājanadravyāṇāmanyatamayā śalākayā gobrāhmaṇapūjāpūrvakaṃ śuciḥ saniyamo bhūtvā dhāraṇīmimāṃ vidyāmadhīyānaḥ pūtaḥ pūrvamakṣi dakṣiṇamañjayet ||
AS.Sū.8.60 atha mantraḥ namaścakṣuḥpariśodhanarājāya tathāgatāyarhate samyaksambuddhāya tadyathā auṃ cakṣuḥ prajñācakṣurjñānacakṣurvijñānacakṣurviśodhaya svāhā ||
AS.Sū.8.61 tataḥ paraṃ ca tāmeva dhāriṇīmanusmaran sāyamprātaḥ patyahametatparamaṃ pavitramārogyakaramūrjaskaraṃ sarvaviṣaghnamañjanamaśvibhyāmindrasya vṛtravadhābhyudyatasya prākprakalpitam |
tasmodatadrājñāṃ rājamahāmātrāṇāṃ ca mahīṃ vijagīṣamāṇānāṃ ca brāhmaṇānāṃ ca vedādhyayanamanyadvā mahacchāstramavagāhamānānāṃ prasannamanā bhiṣakprakalpayediti |
AS.Sū.8.62 atha yogāḥ pravakṣyante bṛhaspatikṛtāḥ śivāḥ |
yān sevamāno nṛpatiḥ śatrubhyo naiti pajcatām ||
AS.Sū.8.64 saviṣaṃ prokṣitaṃ tena sadyo bhavati nirvisam |
tataḥ kṛtvā maṇiṃ hemnā baddhaṃ hastena dhārayet ||
AS.Sū.8.69 saṃspṛṣṭaṃ saviṣaṃ tena sadyo bhavati nirviṣam |
AS.Sū.8.71 viṣajitparamaṃ kāryo maṇiratnaṃ ca pūrvavat |
śrutvā dṛṣṭvā samāghrāya sadyo bhavati nirviṣam ||
AS.Sū.8.75 madhukaṃ ceti sakṣaudraṃ goviṣāṇe nidhāpayet |
AS.Sū.8.76 viṣaṃ bhuktaṃ jarāṃ yāti nirviṣe 'pi na doṣakṛt |
AS.Sū.8.78 na tatra kīṭāḥ saviṣā nondurā na sarīsṛpāḥ |
na kṛtyā karṣaṇā(kārmaṇā)dyāśca dhūpo 'yaṃ yatra dahyate ||
AS.Sū.8.81 gośṛṅge nihitaṃ yojyaṃ snānīye 'mbhasi bhūpateḥ |
AS.Sū.8.87 agadān viṣabhuktasya tīkṣṇāni vamanāni ca |
AS.Sū.8.90 sarpiḥ kṣaudraṃ dadhi kṣīramantataḥ śītalaṃ jalam |
AS.Sū.8.92 suśītāḥ saghṛtāścaiṣāṃ yathāsvaṃ kalpitā rasāḥ |
AS.Sū.8.93 sūkṣmaṃ tāmrarajaḥ kāle sakṣaudraṃ hṛdviśodhanam |
śuddhe hṛdi tataḥ śāṇaṃ hemacūrṇasya dāpayet ||
AS.Sū.8.98 ucite purato rājñastiṣṭhedvākyaṃ ca nākṣipet |
AS.Sū.8.99 deśe kāle parārthaṃ ca vadeddharmārthasaṃhitam |
AS.Sū.8.103 nivedya rājñe kurvīta kāryāṇi sulaghūnyapi |
AS.Sū.8.105 vastrādi rājñā sadṛśaṃ rājalīlāṃ ca varjayet |
AS.Sū.8.108 pāto yathā hi duḥkhāya nocchrāyaḥ sukhakṛttathā |
upahāraṃ ca sandhyāyāṃ bhuktvā cānte niśāsu ca ||
AS.Sū.8.113 etatsvastyayanaṃ karma kartavyaṃ śucinā śuceḥ |
AS.Sū.8.114 saṅkṣepa eṣa viṣapālanasādhanāya proktastu vistaravidhiḥ punaruttare tu |
ālocya samyagakhilaṃ matipūrvakārī yuñjīta taṃ parivikalpya vikāracihnam ||
AS.Sū.8.115 iti viṣagararakṣorakṣaṇāyopadeśaṃ bhajati narapatiryo nityamevāpramattaḥ |
nijapararipuvṛndairapradhṛṣyo mahātmā janayati janatāyāḥ kṣemayogau cirāya ||

div.head: navamo 'dhyāyaḥ
div.p: sa punaḥ śakalī lohitanayanaḥ sarvato lohitarājirlohitaprabhākaraḥ prāyo bhūmau carati so 'tyābhiṣyanditamatvāt sutarāṃ vyādhīnupajanayatyāmaviṣaṃ ca ||
pauṣkaraṃ rauhiṇīkaṃ jātukaṃ vā śākaṃ saha madhupyobhyāṃ nābhyavaharet |
tathā sarṣapatailabhṛṣṭānāṃ matsyabadarāṇāṃ badarāṇi śvāvidvarāhamāṃsaṃ caikadhyaṃ pittenāmamāṃsāni
dadhnā kukkuṭaṃ pṛṣataṃ ca kusumbhaśākenairaurabhraṃ sauvīrakeṇa tilaśaṣkulīḥ
dadhnā māṣasūpena guḍena madhunā ghṛtena vā lakucaphalaṃ
tāmeva matsyapacane śṛṅgiverapacane vā bhājane siddhāmanyatra vā siddhāṃ rātrimuṣitāṃ
AS.Sū.9.5 madhusarpirvasātailodakāni samadhṛtāni dviśastriśaḥ samastāni vā |
madhupuṣkarabījaṃ padmottarikāśākaṃ śārkaro mairayo madhu ca sahopayuktaṃ viruddham |
AS.Sū.9.9 kṣīraṃ kulatthaiḥ panasena matsyaistaptaṃ dadhi kṣaudraghṛte samāṃśe |
vāryūṣare rātriṣu saktavaśca toyāntarāste yavakāstathā ca ||
kuryādviruddhamaśanaṃ jvaramastrapittamaṣṭau gadāṃśca mahato viṣavacca mṛtyum ||
AS.Sū.9.12 teṣvāśu kuryātsaṃśuddhiṃ śamaṃ vā tadvirodhibhiḥ |
AS.Sū.9.17 krameṇānena santyaktā doṣāḥ saṃvarddhitā guṇāḥ |
AS.Sū.9.22 nidrāyattaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ puṣṭiḥ kārśyaṃ balābalam |
vṛṣatā klībatā jñānamajñānaṃ jīvitaṃ na ca ||
AS.Sū.9.23 akāle 'tiprasaṅgācca na ca nidrā niṣevitā |
AS.Sū.9.24 saiva yuktā punaryuṅkte nidrā dehaṃ sukhāyuṣā |
AS.Sū.9.25 rātrau jāgaraṇaṃ rūkṣaṃ snigdhaṃ prasvapanaṃ divā |
dhātusāmyaṃ tathā hyeṣāṃ śleṣmā cāṅgāni puṣyati ||
viṣārttaḥ kaṇṭharogī ca naiva jātu niśāsvapi ||
AS.Sū.9.33 tataḥ srotassu ruddheṣu jāyate gātragauravam |
AS.Sū.9.36 eta eva ca vijñeyā nidrānāśasya hetavaḥ |
AS.Sū.9.38 kapho 'lpo vāyunoddhūto dhamanīḥ sanirudhya tu |
AS.Sū.9.40 arddhatrirātrātsā sādhyā na sā sādhyā tataḥ param |
AS.Sū.9.44 pravāte surabhau deśe sukhāṃ śayyāṃ yathocite |
AS.Sū.9.45 sarpiḥ kṣīrānupānaṃ ca jīvanīyaiḥ śṛtaṃ pibet |
AS.Sū.9.47 nidrā santoṣatṛptasya svaṃ kālaṃ nātivarttate |
nidrā bibhartti prathamā śarīraṃ pāpmāntagā vyādhinimittamanyāḥ ||

AS.Sū.9.49 grāmyadharmapravṛttau tu rajasvalāmaniṣṭāmaniṣṭācārāmaśastāmatisthūlāmatikṛśāṃ garbhiṇīṃ sūtikāmanuttānāṃ vikṛtāṅgāṃ gaṇikāmaprajasaṃ duṣṭayonimanyayonimanyastriyaṃ viśeṣācca vayovarṇavṛddhāṃ sagotrāṃ gurumitrabandhubhṛtyapatnīṃ varṇinīṃ tathā caityacatvaracatuṣpathopavanaśmaśānāghātasalilauṣadhadvijagurusuranṛpālayeṣvahani gosarge madhyandine 'rddharātrau parveṣvanaṅge pipāsurapraṇītasaṅkalpo vā na gacchet |
viśeṣeṇa cātivyāyatāṃ garbhiṇīṃ navaprasūtāmṛtumatīṃ saṃvṛtayoniṃ ca |
AS.Sū.9.52 dvyahādvasante tasyānte pakṣāttadvat ghanodaye seveta kāmataḥ kāmaṃ hemante śiśire balī |
AS.Sū.9.54 strīsaṃsargaddhi sadyaḥ syāt klībatā balināmapi |
evaṃ cāpyāyate śīghraṃ teṣāṃ śukraṃ ca dhāma ca ||
AS.Sū.9.58 naconaḥ ṣoḍaśādvarṣāt saptateḥ parato na ac |
AS.Sū.9.60 śuṣkaṃ rūkṣaṃ yathā kāṣṭhaṃ jantujagdhaṃ vijarjaram |
spṛṣṭamāśu viśīryeta tathā vṛddhaḥ striyaṃ vrajan ||
AS.Sū.9.61 kāyasya tejaḥ paramaṃ hi śukramāhārasāradapi sārabhūtam |
jitātmanā tat parirakṣaṇīyaṃ tato vapuḥ santatirapyudārā ||
AS.Sū.9.64 nāpathyasevinaṃ sadyaḥ prabādhante tadā malāḥ |
AS.Sū.9.65 na ca sarvopacāro 'pi sarvadā sarvadoṣakṛt |
na hi sarvāṇyapathyāni tulyadoṣāṇi naiva ca ||
AS.Sū.9.66 sarve tulyabalā doṣā na sarvāṇi vapūṃṣi ca |
AS.Sū.9.78 karma pañcavidhaṃ teṣāṃ yojyaṃ tadvadrasāyanam |
AS.Sū.9.79 brahmacaryaṃ dayā dānaṃ sadācāraratiḥ śamaḥ |
AS.Sū.9.81 hemantādiṣu kurvīta svaṃ svaṃ cākālikeṣvapi |
ata eva ca caryāyāṃ hemantaśiśire same ||
daive puruṣakāre ca sthitaṃ tasya balābalam ||
AS.Sū.9.86 madhyā madhyasya miśrasya saṅkīrṇā śruṇu cāparam |
AS.Sū.9.87 tathā daivena balinā pauruṣaṃ karma durbalam |
AS.Sū.9.88 karma kiñcit kvacitkāle vipākaniyataṃ mahat |
AS.Sū.9.89 evaṃ ca dvividho mṛtyuḥ kālākālavibhedataḥ |
AS.Sū.9.91 śyenādinā ca yāgena bhrātṛvyasya tathā ca taiḥ |
AS.Sū.9.97 na vā te 'pi yathākāmamāyuṣaḥ sthitimāpnuyuḥ |
upekṣayā na maraṇaṃ jīvitaṃ vā cikitsayā ||
AS.Sū.9.106 yathā ratho vāhyamāno nyāyena kramaśaḥ kṣayam |
AS.Sū.9.108 sa evāto yathā ca syādviparīto viparyaye |
AS.Sū.9.110 nagarī nagarasyeva rathasyeva rathī tathā |
AS.Sū.9.115 yacca rogasamutthānaṃ na śakyamiha kenacit |
parivartuṃ na tat prāpya śocitavyaṃ manīṣiṇā ||
AS.Sū.9.119 tadātve cānubandhe vā tasmāt karmāśubhodayam |

div.head: atha daśamo 'dhyāyaḥ |
div.p: AS.Sū.10.3 athātmavān svabhāvasaṃyogasaṃskāramātrādeśakālopayogavyavasthāḥ saptāhārakalpanāviśeṣāṇāṃ svāsthyāsvāsthyaphalānāṃ hetubhūtāḥ samīkṣya hitameva anurudhyeta |
AS.Sū.10.4 tatra saṃyogo nāma dvayorbahūnāṃ vādravyāṇāṃ saṃhatībhāvaḥ |
mātrā punaḥ piṇḍaparimāṇataḥ samudāyena pratidravyāpekṣayā cāhārarāśiḥ |
ajīrṇe 'pi pūrvasyāhārasyāpariṇato rasa uttareṇopasaṃsṛjyamānaḥ sarvān doṣān prakopayatyāśu |

jīrṇe tu svasthānastheṣu doṣeṣu vātānulomyādutsṛṣṭeṣu mūtrapurīṣavegeṣu viśuddheṣūdgārahṛdayasrotomukheṣu viśadakaraṇe laghuni śarīre 'gnāvudīrṇe jātāyā bubhukṣāyāmabhyavahṛtamannamapradūṣayaddoṣānāyurbalavarṇānabhivarddhayati |
AS.Sū.10.6 atītakālaṃ punastadvātaviṣṭabdhaṃ kṛcchrādvipacyate karśayatyannaruciṃ ca punarupahanti |

upayogavyavasthā tu nāsnāto na digvāsā naikavastradhṛk na malinavasano nāhutvā na japitvā nānirūpya devatābhyo na pitṛbhyo na datvāgramannamagnaye na gurubhyo nātithaye nābhyāgatebhyo na śvavayaḥśvapacebhyaḥ pratyavekṣya cāśritopāśitānapi tiraśco 'pi svaparigṛhītān praśastadeśakālopakaraṇayuktaḥ sragvī vibhūṣitaḥ surandhirārdrapāṇipādaḥ suviśuddhavadano 'bhimatasahāyaḥ keśamakṣikādyanupajuṣṭamanindyamanindannaninditamapunaruṣṇīkṛtaṃ nātyuṣṇamanupadagdhaṃ susiddhamalolo nāsātmyaṃ nāviditaṃ nāviditāgamaṃ nātisāyaṃ nātiprage nākāśe nātape nāndhakāre nādho vṛkṣasya na śyyāstho nonnamya pradeśinīṃ na pātre bhinne nāsaṃvṛte na maline bhāvadūṣite vā na cāsanasthite na hastasthe na haste prāṅmukhaḥ sumanāḥ śucibhaktākṣudhitānukūlajanopahitaṃ hitamannamaśrīyāt |
AS.Sū.10.7 snigdhalaghūṣṇāni hi vahnimaudaryamudīrayanti koṣṭhaṃ pariśodhayānti dhātūnna vikurvate kṣipraṃ jarayanti anilamanulomayanti |
tathā snigdhaṃ dṛḍhīkarotīndriyāṇyupacinoti śarīramapacinoti jarasaṃ balamabhivarddhayati varṇaprasādamabhinirvarttayati |
vilambitaṃ tu bhuñjāno na tṛptimadhigacchati bahu ca bhuṅkte śītībhavati cānnajātaṃ viṣamapākaṃ ca bhavati |
atidrutaṃ tu bhuñjānasya jalpato hasto 'nyamanaso vā bhavedutsnehanamavasādanaṃ bhojanasyāpratiṣṭhānaṃ guṇadoṣāvibhāvanaṃ ca ||
AS.Sū.10.8 samīkṣya samyagātmānamiti mamedaṃ sātmyamidamasātmyamiti nityamapramattaḥ pratyavekṣeta |
tatra sātmyaṃ nāma sahātmanā bhavatyabhyastaṃ tadaucityādupaśeta ityeke |
tatra sarvarasaṃ pravaramekarasamavaraṃ madhyaṃ tu madhyamameva |
itareṣāmapi krameṇa sātmyamapi cāhitaṃ pādena vā vivarjayedityuktaṃ prāk |
tatra yadāhārajātaṃ samadhātūnanuvarttayati viṣamāṃśca samīkaroti tatsamāsato hitam |
tat punarmātrāyogādivaicitryādaniyatamapi yathopadeśaṃ yathābhūyiṣṭhaṃ ca śīlayet pariharecca ||
AS.Sū.10.9 tathā viśeṣataḥ samaśanamadhyaśanamamātraśanaṃ viṣamāśanaṃ ca varjayet |
bhuñjānastu peyāyūṣarasān vyañjanāni rājateṣu pātreṣu nidadhyāt |
ghṛtamāyase payaḥ suśītaṃ tāmramaye pānīya pānakāni ca mṛddhemasphaṭikakācamayeṣu audanaṃ ca vistīrṇe manorame sthāne |
savye peyaṃ lehyaṃ mukhodgharṣaṇapiṇḍīṃ ca madhye bhojyamiti |
tacchītaṃ dadhimadhuyavagodhūmamadyaviśeṣeṣu sarveṣu ca vidāhiṣu śarad grīṣmayośca |
uṣṇaṃ piṣṭamayeṣvanyeṣu ca durjareṣu hemante ca |
madyaṃ māṃseṣu phalāmlamambu vāsavāṃśca vividhān vibhajya prayojayet |
viśeṣatastu madhvāsavān grāmyeṣu tīkṣṇān triphalāsavān vanyeṣu |
nyagrodhādiphalāsavān viṣkireṣu arkaśeluśirīṣakapitthāsavān bileśayeṣu digdhahateṣu ca |
amlaphalāsavān prasaheṣu kāśekṣupadmabījaśṛṅgāṭakakaśerukamṛdvīkākhadirāsavān kṣaudrayuktaṃ vā śītamudakamudaścidvā mahāmṛgeṣvaudakeṣu ca |
surāṃ pratudeṣu tathā śramārtteṣu kṛśeṣu ca |

AS.Sū.10.12 anupānaṃ khalu tarpayati prīṇayatyūrjayati bṛṃhayati dehasya paryāptimabhinirvartayati bhuktamavasādayatyannasaṅghātaṃ bhinatti mārdavamāpādayati kledayati sukhapariṇāmitāmāśuvyavāyitāṃ cāhārasyopajanayati |
teṣāṃ hi pradūṣyāmāśayamuraḥkaṇṭhasthitamāhārajaṃ snehamāsādya tadabhiṣyandāgnisādacchardyādīnāmayān vidadhyāt |

AS.Sū.10.13 tataḥ pāṇigatamannamanyenāpanīya dantāntarasthaṃ ca śanaiḥ śanaiḥ śodhanena viśodhya lepagandhasnehāpanodamācānto 'ṅgulyagragalitāmbupariṣiktanetrastāmbūlādikṛta vadanavaiśadyo dhūmapānādihṛtordhvakaphavegaḥ padaśatamātraṃ gatvā vāmapārśvena saṃviśet |
tadyathā ūṣmā vāyuḥ snehaḥ kledaḥ kālaḥ samayogaśca |
tatroṣmā pacati vāyurapakarṣati sneho mārdavaṃ janayati klaidaḥ śaithilyamāpādayati kālaḥ sarvavapurvyāptimabhinirvarttayati |
samayogasya tu punaḥ kāraṇānyucito hitaśca dehasaṃskāro 'bhyavahāraśceṣṭā śayanaṃ saumanasyaṃ ca |
AS.Sū.10.20 triphalāṃ madhusarpirbhyāṃ niśi netrabalāya ca |
AS.Sū.10.25 karoti rūkṣaṃ balavarṇanāśaṃ tvagrūkṣatāṃ vātaśakṛnnirodham |
AS.Sū.10.28 atimadhuramanalaśamanaṃ bhuktamasātmyaṃ na puṣṭaye vapuṣaḥ |
AS.Sū.10.29 tanumapi tanujāṃ rujāṃ tvanāpya vrajati naraḥ sa samāśatasya pāram ||

div.head: athaikādaśo 'dhyāyaḥ |
div.p: kukṣerapratipīḍanamāhāreṇa hṛdayasyāsaṃrodhaḥ pārśvayoravipāṭanamanatigauravamudarasya prīṇanamindriyāṇāṃ kṣutpipāsoparatiḥ sthānāsanaśayanagamanocchvāsapraśvāsabhāṣyasaṅkathāsu sukhānuvṛttiḥ sāyaṃ prātaśca sukhena pariṇamanaṃ balavarṇopacayakaratvaṃ ceti mātrāyā lakṣaṇam ||
tena hi prapīḍyamānā vātādayo yugapatprakupitāḥ kukṣyaikadeśasthāstadevāparipakvamāviśya viṣṭambhayanto 'lasakamabhinirvartayanti |
prayāti nordhvaṃ nādhastādāhāro na ca pacyate |

śleṣmā tu chardyarocakaprasekāṅgasādāvipākaśītajvaragātragauravāṇi viśeṣatastu durbalasyālpavahnerbahuśleṣmaṇovātamūtrapurīṣavegavidhāriṇo 'nnapānamanilaprapīḍitaṃ śleṣmaṇāvibaddhamārgamalasatvādabahirmukhībhavat chardyatīsāravarjyāni yathoktāni śūlādīnyupajanayatyatimātrāṇi |
atimātraduṣṭāstu doṣāḥ śarīraṃ daṇḍavat stambhayanti tatastamalasakamasādhyaṃ bruvate ||
na ca kevalaṃ mātrayaiva kṛtsnamāhāraphalamavāptuṃ śakyaṃ svabhāvādīnāṃ bhinnaphalatvāt ||
gururūkṣaśuṣkaśītadviṣṭaviṣṭambhividāahyaśuciviruddhātyambupānadravamakāle kāle vā kāmakrodhalobherṣyādvrīśokodvegabhayakṣudupataptena vā yadannapānamupayujyate tadapyāmameva pradūṣayati ||
AS.Sū.11.9 tatra sādhyamānaṃ duṣṭamalasībhūtamullikhet pāyayitvā salavaṇamuṣṇaṃ vāri |
AS.Sū.11.18 nāmyamānāni cāṅgāni bhṛśaṃ svinnāni veṣṭayet |
udvarttanaṃ khalliviṣūcikāghnaṃ tailaṃ vipakvaṃ ca tadarthakāri ||
AS.Sū.11.23 āmadoṣeṣu tvannakāle jīrṇāhāraṃ doṣopaliptāmāśayaṃ stimitagurukoṣṭhamanannābhilāṣiṇamabhisamīkṣya pāyayeddoṣaśeṣapācanārthamauṣadhaṃ vahnisandhukṣaṇārthaṃ ca |
tena hyanilānalavṛdhyā vātātapaparīta ivālpaḥ salilāśayo 'lpadoṣaḥ praśoṣamāpadyate |
laṅghanapācanābhyāṃ madhyadoṣe vātātapābhyāṃ pāṃsubhasmāvakiraṇairiva cānatimahān salilāśayaḥ |
sati tvanubandhe nidānaviparītamapāsya vyādhiviparītameva tadarthakāri vā |
vimuktāmadoṣasya punaḥ paripakvāmadoṣaśeṣasya dīpte cāgnāvabhyaṅgāsthāpanānuvāsanaṃ vividhasnehapānaṃ ca yuktyā prayojyam |
AS.Sū.11.28 vyoṣaṃ karañjasya phalaṃ haridre mūlaṃ samāvāpya ca mātuluṅgyāḥ |
AS.Sū.11.33 vidagdhe bhramatṛṇmūrchāḥ pittacca vividhā rujāḥ |
AS.Sū.11.34 laṅghanaṃ kāryamāme tu viṣṭabdhe svedanaṃ bhṛśam |
vidagdhe vamanaṃ yadvā yathāvasthaṃ hitaṃ bhavet ||
AS.Sū.11.39 prātarāśe tvajīrṇe 'pi sāyamāśo na duṣyati |
ajīrṇe sāyamāśe tu prātarāśo hi duṣyati ||
AS.Sū.11.43 rātrau tu hṛdaye mlāne saṃvṛteṣvayaneṣu ca |
AS.Sū.11.47 doṣopanaddhaṃ yadi līnamannaṃ pittolbaṇarayāvṛṇuyānna vahnim |
jāyeta duṣṭā tu tato budhukṣā yā mandabuddhīn viṣavannihanti ||

div.head: atha dvādaśo 'dhyāyaḥ |
div.p: teṣu vakṣyamāṇaṃ hemādi lavaṇāntaṃ prāyeṇa bhaumam |
punarapi ca trividhaṃ daivavyapāśrayaṃ yuktivyapāśrayaṃ satvāvajayaśceti |
tatra śastrādisādhye bheṣajamanukramate na tu bheṣajasādhye śastrādi ||
AS.Sū.12.5 punarapi trividhaṃ hetuviparītaṃ vyādhiviparītamubhayārthakāri ca |
AS.Sū.12.6 yacca doṣaśamanatve satyapi jvare viśeṣato hitaṃ mustā parpaṭakaṃ yavāgvaśca pramehe rajanī yavānnaṃ cetyādi |

tathā chardyāṃ chardanamatisāre virecanaṃ madātyayemadyapānaṃ tutthadagdhe 'gnipratapanaṃ pitte 'ntarnnigūḍhe vimārgage vā svedaḥ kaṭvamlalavaṇatīkṣṇoṣṇābhyavahāraśca bahiḥ pravarttanāya svamārgāpādanāya ca |
śleṣmaṇi cāntarnigūḍhe stabdhe bahiḥ śītopacārastatpīḍitasyoṣmaṇo 'ntaḥpraveśena kapho vilayatāmupayāti |
evaṃvidhaṃ hyaviparītameva sat bheṣajaṃ hetuvyādhiviparītamarthaṃ karoti ||
AS.Sū.12.8 suvarṇaṃ bṛṃhaṇaṃ snigdhaṃ madhuraṃ rasapākayoḥ |
AS.Sū.12.9 rūpyaṃ snigdhaṃ kaṣāyāmla vipāke madhuraṃ rasam |
AS.Sū.12.10 tāmraṃ satiktamadhuraṃ kaṣāyaṃ lekhanaṃ laghu |
AS.Sū.12.11 kasyaṃ kaṣāyānurasaṃ viśadaṃ lekhana laghu |
lekhanaṃ pittalaṃ kiñcit trapu sīsaṃ ca tadguṇam ||
AS.Sū.12.13 cakṣuṣyaṃ kṛṣṇalohaṃ tu kaṣāyaṃ svādutiktakam |
AS.Sū.12.16 maṇiratnaṃ saraṃ śītaṃ kaṣāyaṃ svādulekhanam |
tutthakaṃ kaṭu sakṣāraṃ kaṣāyaṃ viṣadaṃ laghu ||
AS.Sū.12.20 kaphaghnī tiktakaṭukā manohvā lekhanī sarā |
AS.Sū.12.21 kaṣāyaṃ madhuraṃ śītaṃ lekhanaṃ snigdhamañjanam |
AS.Sū.12.22 sroto 'ñjanaṃ varaṃ tatra tataḥ sauvīrakāñjanam |
AS.Sū.12.25 kaṣāyā madhurā rūkṣā kāsaghnī vaṃśarocanā |
AS.Sū.12.26 viṣyandi lavaṇaṃ sarvaṃ sūkṣmaṃ sṛṣṭamalaṃ viduḥ |
AS.Sū.12.27 saidhanvaṃ tatra sasvādu vṛṣyaṃ hṛdyaṃ tridoṣanut |
AS.Sū.12.30 vipāke svādu sāmudraṃ guru śleṣmavivardhanam |
romakaṃ laghu pāṃsūtthaṃ sakṣāraṃ śleṣmalaṃ guru ||
AS.Sū.12.32 lavaṇānāṃ prayoge tu saindhavādīn prayojayet |
AS.Sū.12.34 kṣāraḥ sarvaśca paramaṃ tīkṣṇoṣṇaḥ kṛmijillaghuḥ |
AS.Sū.12.35 kaṣāyā madhurā pāke rūkṣā vilavaṇā laghuḥ |
dīpanī pācanī medhyā vayasaḥ sthāpanī param ||
paraṃ ca kaṇṭhyaṃ cakṣuṣyaṃ hṛdyaṃ dāhajvarāpaham ||
AS.Sū.12.41 akṣaṃ tu tadguṇānnyūnaṃ kaṣāyamadhuraṃ himam |
AS.Sū.12.42 paraṃ keśyastu tanmajjā śukraghnaṃ ca tato 'ñjanam |
AS.Sū.12.44 rase pāke ca kaṭukaṃ kaphaghnaṃ maricaṃ laghu |
śleṣmalā svādu śītārdrā gurvīṃ snigdhā ca pippalī ||
AS.Sū.12.45 sā śuṣkā viparītātaḥsnigdhā vṛṣyā rase kaṭuḥ |
nāgaraṃ dīpanaṃ vṛṣyaṃ grāhi hṛdyaṃ vibandhanut ||
AS.Sū.12.47 rucya laghu svādupākaṃ snigdhoṣṇaṃ kaphavātajit |
AS.Sū.12.58 ahṛdyāḥ sarṣapāḥ snigdhā bāṣpikāvacca kīrttitāḥ |
AS.Sū.12.59 kaṭupākarasaṃ rucyaṃ dīpanaṃ pācanaṃ laghu |
AS.Sū.12.63 pācanaṃ kaphapittaghnaṃ tiktaṃ śītaṃ viṣādvayam |
AS.Sū.12.66 mahānimbaḥ paraṃ grāhī kaṣāyo rūkṣaśītalaḥ |
vraṇyaḥ svaryaḥ kaṭuḥ pāke rukṣaḥ sūkṣmo 'gnidīpanaḥ ||
AS.Sū.12.69 śaṅkhapuṣpī sarā tiktā medhyā kṛmiviṣāpahā |
AS.Sū.12.71 laghu raktaṃ tathośīraṃ vālakaṃ pācanaṃ ca tat |
guru svādu himaṃ vṛṣyaṃ cakṣuṣyṃ svaravarṇakṛt ||
AS.Sū.12.75 balātrayaṃ svādu vṛṣyaṃ snigdhaṃ śītaṃ balapradam |
AS.Sū.12.76 tāmbulaṃ kaṭu sakṣāraṃ rucyamuṣṇaṃ kaphapraṇut |
bhedi sammohakṛt pūgaṃ kaṣāyaṃ svādu rocanam ||
AS.Sū.12.80 sacampakaṃ tato nyūnaṃ guṇaiḥ koraṇḍakiṃśukam |
kaphaghnaṃ kaitakaṃ tiktaṃ śairīṣaṃ viṣahāri ca ||
AS.Sū.12.83 bandhūkaṃ śleṣmalaṃ grāhi tadvadeva ca yūthikā |
AS.Sū.12.88 sannipātajvaraṃ śvāsamāmaṃ vāyuṃ ca kopayet |
paścimaḥ śiśiro hanti mūrcchāṃ dāhaṃ tṛṣaṃ viṣam ||
AS.Sū.12.90 uttaro mārutaḥ snigdho mṛdurmadhura eva ca |
rasādibhedairiti bheṣajānā diṅmātramuktaṃ na yato 'sti kiñcit |

div.head: atha caturdaśo 'dhyāyaḥ |
div.p: bastiṣu tu teṣu teṣvavasthāntareṣuyānyupayujyante dravyāṇi tānyasaṅkhyeyatvānnopadiśyante |
rasaskandhebhya eva yathādoṣaṃ yathāvasthaṃ ca vibhajet |
rājādanamajjakṣaudralavaṇāni madyāni gavādiśakṛdrasamūtrapittānyevaṃvidhāni cendriyopaśayānyanyānyapi tathā snehāḥ kṣīraṃ raktaṃ māṃsaraso dhānyarasastoyamiti śirovirecanopayogīni ||

AS.Sū.14.6 madhukapadmakamañjiṣṭhāśārivāmustāpunnāganāgakesarailavālukasuvarṇatvaktamālapṛthvīkāhareṇulākṣāśatapuṣpāsallakīśarkarāmadanakamarubakanyagrodhodumbarāśvatthaplakṣalodhratvak padmotpalāni sarvagandhadravyāṇi ca kuṣṭhatagaravarjyāni prāyogikadhūmopayogīni agaruguggulusallakīśaileyakanaladahrīberahareṇūśīramustādhyāmakavarāṅgaśrīveṣṭakasthauṇeyakaparipelavailavālukakundurukasarjarasayaṣṭyāhvaphalasārasnehamadhūcchiṣṭabilvaphalamajjayavatilamāṣakuṅkumāni medomajjavasāsarpīṣi ca snaihikadhūmopayogīni |
śirovirecanadravyāṇi gandhadravyāṇi ca tīkṣṇāni manohvā haritālaṃ ceti tīkṣṇadhūmopayogīni ||

AS.Sū.14.7 bhadradārukuṣṭhatagaravaruṇabalātibalārtagalakacchurāhlādinīkuberākṣīvatsādinyarkālarkakatakabhārṅgīkārpāsīvṛścikālīpattūraprabhṛtīni vidāryādigaṇo vīratarādi stṛṇākhyavarjyāni ṣaṭ pañcamūlāni ceti vātaśamanāni |

dūrvānantāmocarasamañjiṣṭhāparipelavakālākālīyakakadalīkandalīpayasyātmaguptānālikerakharjjūradrākṣāvidārībadarībalānāgabalānāgapuṣpaśatāvarīśīta pākyodanapākītṛṇaśūlyāṃśumatīdvayāriṣṭakāriṣṭāṭarūṣaketkaṭarpriyaṅgudhātakīdhavadhavadhanvanasyandanakhadirakadarapriyālatālasālasarjatiniśāśvakarṇagundrāvānīrapadmāpadmakapadmabījamṛṇālakumudanalinasaugandhikapuṇḍarīkaśatapatraśaivālakalhārotpalakākolyutpalikāśalūkaśṛṅgāṭakakaśerukakrauñcādanaprabhṛtīni anyāni ca śītavīryāṇi sārivādiḥ padmakādiḥ paṭolāadirnyagrodhādirdāhaharo mahākaṣāyastṛṇapañcamūlaṃ ceti pittaśamanāni |

śītaśivaśatapuṣpāsaralasuradārurāsneṅgu dīsātalāsumanaḥkākādanīlāṅgalikāhastikarṇamuñjātalāmajjakaprabhṛtīnyanyāni ca rūkṣoṣṇavīryāṇyāragvadhādirasanādirarkādiḥ surasādirmuṣkakādirvatsakādirmustādiḥ śītaghnaśca mahākaṣāyo vallīkaṇṭakapañcamūle ca śleṣmaśamanānīti ||

div.head: atha pañcadaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
div.p: AS.Sū.15.1 athāto mahākaṣāyasaṅgrahamadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ iti ha smāhurātreyādayo maharṣayaḥ ||
ye tu sutarāmupayogavantaḥ prakarṣavartino vā te jīvanīyādisaṃjñāḥ |
śakyaṃ hi buddhimadbhiḥ svāduśītasnigdhādīn jīvantyādiṣu sādhāraṇān guṇānālocya kṣīrekṣudrākṣākṣoḍavidārīkandādiṣvapi tadguṇeṣu jīvanīyāditvamavadhārayitum |
yadyapi tāni tānyeva dravyāṇīti dravyasaṅkaraḥ kaṣāyeṣu tathāpi na saṃjñāvirodhaḥ |
tatra lavaṇavarjyā rasāḥ kalpanāyāṃ kaṣāyā ityucayante |
AS.Sū.15.5 haimavatī ciribilvaṃ mustā kuṣṭhaṃ vacā haridre ca |
AS.Sū.15.9 aindryatirasā payasyā ṛṣyaproktā sthirā balātibalā |
iti balyo daśako 'yaṃ hayagandhā rohiṇī ṛṣabhaḥ ||
hidhmāṃ nighnanti śaṭī durālabhā badarabījaṃ ca ||
AS.Sū.15.28 śāmānantā padmā kaṭvaṅgaḥ padmakesaraṃ lodhram |
bhṛṣṭā ca mṛt payasyā saśālmalī viḍvirajanāni ||
AS.Sū.15.31 kamalanalinakumuda madhukasaugandhikadhātakīlatākusumam mūtraṃ nayati virāgaṃ sotpalaśatapatrapuṇḍarīkaṃ ca ||
kāsaṃ ghnanti saśṛṅgī tāmalakī kaṇṭakārī ca ||
triphalā ceti gaṇo 'yaṃ jvarasya śamanāy nirdiṣṭaḥ ||
AS.Sū.15.40 kākolyelā sevyaṃ nidigdhike śālipṛśniparṇyau ca |
saṃsthāpayanti rudhiraṃ rudhiraṃ ca saśarkaraṃ lodhram ||
AS.Sū.15.46 amṛtā pathyā dhātrī jīvantī śreyasī sthirāyuktā |

div.head: atha ṣoḍaśo 'dhyāyaḥ |
div.p: kaṇḍūkarī jīvanahrasvasaṃjñe dve pañcake gopasutā tripādī ||
AS.Sū.16.5 padmakapuṇḍrau vṛddhitugardhyaḥ śṛṅgyamṛtā daśa jīvanasaṃjñāḥ |
AS.Sū.16.6 parūṣakaṃ varā drākṣā kaṭphalaṃ katakāt phalam |
AS.Sū.16.14 varaṇādiḥ kaphaṃ medo mandāgnitvaṃ niyacchati |
AS.Sū.16.17 vargo vīratarādyo 'yaṃ hanti vātakṛtān gadān |
AS.Sū.16.20 arkālarkau nāgadantī viśalyā bhārṅgī rāsnā vṛścikālī prakīryā |
pratyakpuṣpī pītatailodakīryāḥ śvetāyugmaṃ tāpasānāṃ ca vṛkṣaḥ ||
AS.Sū.16.22 surasayugaphaṇijjaṃ kālamālā viḍaṅgaṃ kharabukavṛṣakarṇīkaṭphalaṃ kāsamardaḥ |
kuṣṭhaṃ truṭī haimavatī ca yonistanyāmayaghnā malapācanāśca ||
AS.Sū.16.34 nyagrodhādirgaṇo vraṇyaḥ saṅgrāhī bhagnasādhanaḥ medaḥpittāsratṛḍdāhayoniroganibarhaṇaḥ ||
AS.Sū.16.36 elādiko vātakaphau viṣaṃ ca viniyacchati |
bastāntrī vyādhighāto bahalabahurasastīkṣṇavṛkṣāt phalāni śyāmādyo hanti gulmaṃ viṣamarucikaphau hṛdrujaṃ mūtrakṛchram ||

div.head: atha saptadaśo 'dhyāyaḥ |
div.p: tadāśrayeṣu ca dravyasaṃjñakeṣu pṛthivyādiṣu guṇāḥ prakṛtivikṛtivicāradeśakālavaśādgurvādayo raseṣu sāhacaryādupacaryante ||
AS.Sū.17.9 itthaṃ ca nānauṣadhabhūtaṃ jagati kiñcid dravyamasti vividhārthaprayogavaśāt ||
tatsaṅkare ca yato bāhulyena kāryakartṛtvaṃ bhavati yadevādhikaṃ tadeva tatkāryakaramiti vyapadeśaḥ |
AS.Sū.17.18 vīryaṃ dravyasya tadjñeyaṃ yadyogāt kriyate kriyā |
nāvīryaṃ kurute kiñcit sarvā vīryakṛtā hi sā ||
AS.Sū.17.19 tairapi caivamatiprakṛṣṭaśaktiyuktānāmaśeṣaudhaguṇasārabhūtānāmaṣṭānāmeva gurvādīnāṃ vīryasaṃjñā viśiṣṭāmnāyavihitāpi laukikīti samudbhāvyate |
tathā hi tayā rasavipākaguṇāntaravijayino bhūyāṃsaśca variṣṭhāśca guṇāḥ saṅgṛhītāḥ |
viśeṣavṛtyā ca tatra tatra dravyasvarūpakathane vyavahāraḥ pravṛttito bhavati |
ata eva sarvātiśāyī dravyasvabhāvaḥ prabhāva ityāmnātaḥ |
satyapi ca kriyānirvarttanasāmānye tadviparītā rasādayo vīryākhyayā prabhāvasaṃjñayā vā na parāmṛśyante ||
AS.Sū.17.20 anye tu gurvādīnāmagnīṣomātmakatvādādānavisargavibhāagena kālasya coṣṇaśītātmakatvād dvividhamevāmananti |
AS.Sū.17.27 kaṭutiktakaṣāyāṇāṃ kaṭuko yeṣāṃ vipāka iti pakṣaḥ |
AS.Sū.17.28 tatra yanmadhuraṃ rasavipākayoḥ śītavīryaṃ ca dravyaṃ yaccāmlaṃ tayoruṣṇavīryaṃ ca yadvā kaṭukaṃ teṣāṃ yathāsvaṃ rasebhyaḥ prāyo guṇān doṣakopaśamanatvaṃ ca vidyāt |
yathā madhu madhuraṃ śleṣmāṇaṃ śamayati kaṭuvipākatayā |
tathā tailaṃ kaṭuvipākatayā ca vipākata eva baddhaviṇmūtram |
amlaṃ kāñjikaṃ kaphaṃ jayati rūkṣoṣṇatvāt kapitthaṃ tu raukṣyāt pittaṃ tu śītavīryatvāt |
āmalakaṃ pittaṃ śītavīryatvāt svādupākatayā ca kaphaṃ raukṣyāllāghavācca śaityaraukṣyalāghavaistu na vātam |
lavaṇaṃ saindhavaṃ svādupākatayā pittaṃ jayati lāghavāt kaphaṃ jayati |
kaṭukāpi śuṇṭhī snehauṣṇyasvādupākairvātaṃ kṣapayati pippalī ca |
kaṣāyatiktaṃ mahat pañcamūlaṃ vātaṃ jayati na tu pittaṃ uṣṇavīryatvāt |
AS.Sū.17.31 yadad dravye rasādīnāṃ balavattvena vartate |
AS.Sū.17.34 viruddhā api cānyonyaṃ rasādyāḥ kāryasādhane |
AS.Sū.17.37 guṇā dravyeṣu ye coktāsta eva tanudoṣayoḥ |
AS.Sū.17.41 saṅkīrṇatvāt phale cāsau tulyatvānna vivakṣyate |
AS.Sū.17.42 saṅkhyābhedo yathā nāsti rasānāmapi sa kramaḥ |
AS.Sū.17.43 na ca taddāḍimādyeṣu ṣaḍevāto rasāḥ smṛtāḥ |
AS.Sū.17.45 yathārasaṃ jaguḥ pākān ṣaṭ kecittadasāmpratam |
AS.Sū.17.46 yāti tailaṃ ca kaṭutāṃ kaṭukāpi na pippalī |
AS.Sū.17.48 kaṭupāko 'pi pittaghno mudgo māṣastu pittalaḥ |
AS.Sū.17.50 kurute dadhi gurveva vahniṃ pārāvataṃ na tu |
AS.Sū.17.51 kaṣāyā grāhiṇī śītā dhātakī na harītakī |
AS.Sū.17.52 prabhāvaśca yato dravye dravyaṃ śreṣṭhamato matam |
rasādisāmye yat karma viśiṣṭaṃ tat prabhāvajam ||
madhukasya ca mṛdvīkā ghṛtaṃ kṣīrasya dīpanam ||
AS.Sū.17.55 mitho viruddhān vātādīn lohitādyā jayanti yat |
AS.Sū.17.58 virecayati yad vṛṣyamāśu śukraṃ karoti vā |
AS.Sū.17.59 mātrādi prāpya tattacca yat prapañcena varṇitam |
AS.Sū.17.60 rasena vīryeṇa guṇaiśca karma dravyaṃ vipākena ca yadvidadhyāt |
sadyo 'nyathā tat kurute prabhāvāddhetoratastatra na gocaro 'sti ||

div.head: atha aṣṭādaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
div.p: sa ṣaḍṛtukatvāt kālasya mahābhūtaguṇairūnātiriktaiḥ saṃsṛṣṭo viṣamaṃ vidagdhaḥ ṣoḍhā pṛthagvipariṇamate madhurādibhedena ||
mukhaṃ srāvayatyakṣibhruvaṃ saṅkocayati daśanān harṣayati romāṇi ca |
lavaṇo mukhaṃ viṣyandayati kaṇṭhakapolaṃ vidahati annaṃ prarocayati |
tikto viśadayati vadanaṃ viśodhayati kaṇṭhaṃ pratihanti rasanām |
kaṭuko bhṛśamudvejayati jihvāgraṃ cimicimāyati kaṇṭhakapolaṃ srāvayati mukhākṣināsikaṃ vidahati deham |
kaṣāyastu jaḍayati jihvāṃ badhnāti kaṇṭhaṃ pīḍayati hṛdayam ||

AS.Sū.18.5 tatra madhuro raso janmaprabhṛtisātmyāt sarvadhātuvivardhanaḥ āyuṣyo bālavṛddhakṣatakṣīṇabalavarṇendriyatvakkeśakaṇṭhahitaḥ prīṇano bṛṃhaṇo jīvanastarpaṇaḥ sthairyasandhānaḥ stanyakaro vātapittaviṣadāhamūrchātṛṣṇāpraśamanaḥ snigdhaḥ śīto mṛdurguruśca ||
rocanaḥ pācano dīpano bṛṃhaṇastarpaṇaḥ prīṇanaḥ kledano vyavāyī laghuḥ snigdho hṛdyaśca ||
AS.Sū.18.9 janayati śithilatvaṃ sevitaḥ sotidehe kaphavilayanakaṇḍūpāṇḍutādṛgvighātān |
kṣatavihitavisarpaṃ raktapittaṃ pipāsāṃ śvayathumapi kṛśānāṃ taijasatvāt bhramaṃ ca ||

AS.Sū.18.10 lavaṇaḥ stambhabandhasaṅghātavidhmāpanaḥ sarvarasapratyanīko dīpano rocanaḥ pācanaḥ kledanaḥ śoṣaṇaḥ snehanaḥ svedano bhedanaḥ chedanaḥ saro vyavāyī vikāṣī harati pavanaṃ viṣyandayati kaphaṃ viśodhayati srotāṃsi nātiguruḥ snigdhatīkṣṇoṣṇaśca ||
kṣataviṣamadavṛddhiṃ vātaraktaṃ karoti kṣapayati balabhojaḥ soti vā sevanena ||

AS.Sū.18.12 tiktaḥ svayamarociṣṇuraruciviṣakṛmimūrcchotkledajvaradāhatṛṭakuṣṭhakaṇḍūharaḥ kledamedovasāmajjaviṇmūtrapittaśleṣmopaśoṣaṇo dīpanaḥ pācano lekhanaḥ stanyakaṇṭhaviśodhano medhyo nātirūkṣaḥ śīto laghuśca ||

AS.Sū.18.14 kaṭuko 'lasakaśvayathūdardasthaulyābhiṣyandakṛmivaktrarogaviṣakuṣṭhakaṇḍūprasādhano vraṇāvasādanaḥ sneha kledaśoṣaṇo rocanaḥ pācano dīpano lekhanaḥ śodhanaḥ śoṣayatyannaṃ sphuṭayatīndriyāṇi bhinatti śoṇitasaṃghātaṃ chinnatti bandhān vivṛṇoti srotāṃsi kṣapayati śleṣmāṇaṃ laghurūkṣatīkṣṇoṣṇaśca ||
AS.Sū.18.17 kaṣāyo balāsaṃ sapittaṃ saraktaṃ nihantyāśu badhnāti varcotirūkṣaḥ |
gurustvaksavarṇatvakṛt kledaśoṣī himaḥ prīṇano ropaṇo lekhanaśca ||

AS.Sū.18.23 kaṭukadravyaskandho maricahiṅgutejovatīhastipippalīviḍaṅgabhallātakāsthimūlakasarṣapalaśunapalāṇḍukarañjamanaśśilāladevadārukuṣṭhailāsurasacorakahareṇukāmūtrapittaprabhṛtīni kuṭherādiśca haritavargaḥ pañcakolaṃ ca ||
prāyaḥ kaṣāyaṃ śītaṃ stambhanaṃ cānyatra harītakyāḥ ||
AS.Sū.18.26 iti yathāsthūlaṃ nityopayogināṃ pradhānatamānāṃ copasaṅgrahaḥ ||

AS.Sū.18.28 atha yaḥ śiśirapavanadharaṇīdharavividhavanagahananadītaṭākapalvalodapānakamalakumudakuvalayāvakīrṇoramyaḥ sthirasnigdhabhūmirbhūriharitatṛṇo 'tidūravistṛtapratānapravālopasaṃcchannapādapaḥ sasyasarīsṛpakhagabahulaḥ śleṣmapittaprāyo gurvauṣadhisalilaḥ ślīpadagalarogāpācīṃjvarādyāmayopadrutajanapadaḥ so 'nūpo madhurarasayoniḥ ||
AS.Sū.18.29 yastu viṣamavipulasikatāsthalabahulo 'tidūrāvagāḍhavirasasalilaḥ kleśasahārogaśarīradīrghāyuḥprāyo janapado 'nūparītaśca sa jāṅgalaḥ kaṭukarasayoniḥ |
dvau tiktaḥ kaṭukaścaikaṃ yāti pañcadaśaiva te ||
lavaṇastrīn bhajatyekaṃ tikta evaṃ tu viṃśatiḥ ||
ekaṃ tiktayuto yāti daśaiva madhuro rasaḥ ||
AS.Sū.18.34 catvāro 'mlaḥ paṭuścaikaṃ bhedāḥ pañcadaśeti ca |
ekaikasya parityāgāt saṃyogāḥ pañcake ca ṣaṭ ||
AS.Sū.18.35 ekaśca ṣaḍrasaḥ ṣaṭ ca pṛthagevaṃ triṣaṣṭidhā |

div.head: atha ekonaviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ |
div.p: saśabdasya vāyoḥ kukṣau tiryagūrdhvaṃ ca bhramaṇenāntraveṣṭanena pārśvahṛdayapīḍanenālpatayā ca śakṛt |
AS.Sū.19.7 anye 'pi ca malā yathāyathaṃ malāyanaṃ śoṣaśūnyatvalāghavaiḥ |
tathā hi dehadhātavo ye guravaste gurubhiraikyakāritayopacīyante |
tasmādanyebhyo dravyebhyo 'pi sutarāṃ raktamāpyāyyate raktena māṃsaṃ māṃsena medo medasāsthi taruṇāsthnā majjā majñā śukraṃ śukreṇāmagarmeṇa garbhaḥ |
yatra tvevaṃ lakṣaṇena sāmānyena sāmānyavatāmāhāravihārāṇāmasānnidhyaṃ syāt sannihitānāṃ cābhyavaharaṇamaśakyaṃ viruddhatvād ghṛṇitvādaruceranyasmādvā kāraṇāntarāt |
AS.Sū.19.10 tadyathā śukrakṣaye kṣīrasarpiṣorupayogo madhurasnigdhaśītānāmapareṣāṃ ca dravyāṇām |
karmāpi yadyasya dhātoḥ samānakriyatayā vṛddhikaraṃ tasya tasya vṛddhimabhilaṣatā tattadāsevyam |
vṛddhiḥ kṣayaśca dhātūnāṃ jāyate śṛṇu cāparam ||
AS.Sū.19.13 dravyaṃ tulyaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ hi svaṃ svaṃ vṛdhdyai kṣayāya ca |
AS.Sū.19.14 pūrvo dhātuḥ paraṃ kuryāt vṛddhaḥ kṣīṇaśca tadvidham |
AS.Sū.19.15 adho dve sapta śirasi khāni svedavahāni ca |
AS.Sū.19.17 rakte visarpaṃ dāhaṃ ca māṃse māṃspākakothanam |
AS.Sū.19.18 asthni dāhaṃ bhṛśaṃ majñi hāridranakhanetratām |
AS.Sū.19.19 sirāgataṃ krodhanatāṃ pralāpaṃ snāvagaṃ tṛṣam |
AS.Sū.19.20 śleṣmā tvaci sthitaḥ kuryāt stambhaṃ śvetāvabhāsatām |
AS.Sū.19.26 doṣā yānti tathā tebhyaḥ srotomukhaviśodhanāt |
AS.Sū.19.29 āgantuṃ śamayeddoṣaṃ sthāninaṃ pratikṛtya vā |
AS.Sū.19.31 yaccharīrarasaḥ snehaḥ prāṇo yatra pratiṣṭhitaḥ |
AS.Sū.19.32 hṛdayasthamapi vyāpi tat paraṃ jīvitāspadam |
duścchāyo durmanā rūkṣo bhavet kṣāmaśca tatkṣaye ||
AS.Sū.19.35 yadannaṃ dveṣṭi yadapi prārthayetāvirodhi tu |
tattatyajan samaśnaṃśca tau tau vṛddhikṣayau jayet ||
vṛddhāḥ kṣīṇāśca bhūyiṣṭhaṃ lakṣayantyabudhā na tat ||
AS.Sū.19.37 yathābalaṃ yathāsvaṃ ca doṣā vṛddhā vitanvate |
rūpāṇi jahati kṣīṇāḥ samāḥ svaṃ karma kurvate ||
AS.Sū.19.38 ya eva dehasya samā vivṛdhyai ta eva doṣā viṣamā vadhāya |

div.head: atha viṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
div.p: tatra pakvāśayaḥ kaṭiḥ sakthinī pādāvasthi śrotraṃ sparśanaṃ ca vātasthānāni |
nābhirāmāśayaḥ svedo lasīkā rudhiraṃ cakṣuḥ sparśanaṃ ca pittasthānāni |
uraḥ kaṇṭhaḥ śiraḥ kloma parvāṇyāmāśayo raso medo ghrāṇaṃ rasanaṃ ca śleṣmasthānāni |
ataśca doṣā dehasya sthirīkaraṇāt sthūṇā ityucyante |
AS.Sū.20.2 ta ete pratyekaṃ pañcadhā bhidyante |

vyāno hṛdyavasthitaḥ kṛtsnadehacaraḥ śīghrataragatiḥ gatiprasāraṇākuñcanotkṣepāvakṣepanibheṣonmeṣajṛmbhaṇānnāsvādanasrotoviśodhanasvedāsṛksrāvaṇādikriyo yonau ca śukrapratipādano vibhajya cānnasya kiṭṭāt sāraṃ tena kramaśo dhātūṃstarpayati |

tatra yadāmāśayapakvāśayamadhyasthaṃ pañcamahābhūtātmakatve 'pi tejoguṇotkarṣāt kṣapitasomaguṇaṃ tataśca tyaktadravasvabhāvaṃ sahakārikāraṇairvāyukledādibhiranugrahāddahanapacanādikriyayā labdhāgniśabdaṃ pittamannaṃ pacati sārakiṭṭau vibhajati śeṣāṇi ca pittasthānāni tatrasthamevānugṛhṇāti tat pācakamityucyate |
sa tūrasthaḥ svavīryeṇa trikasyānnavīryeṇa ca saha hṛdayasya ca śeṣāṇāṃ ca śleṣmasthānānāṃ tatrastha evodakakarmaṇāvalambanādavalambaka ityucyate |
AS.Sū.20.5 evamamīṣu sthāneṣu bhūyiṣṭhamavikṛtāḥ sakalaśarīravyāpino 'pi vātapittaśleṣmāṇo vartante |
śītaguṇopahitāstīkṣṇādayaḥ pittasya cayamuṣṇaguṇopahitāḥ kopaṃ śītaguṇopahitā mandādayaḥ praśamam |
śītaguṇopahitāḥ snigdhādayaḥ kaphasya cayamuṣṇaguṇopahitāḥ kopaṃ tathā tu rūkṣādayaḥ praśamam ||
AS.Sū.20.6 cayo vṛddhiḥ svadhāmnyeva pradveṣo vṛddhihetuṣu |
doṣo vikāraṃ kurute khe varṣamiva toyadaḥ ||
AS.Sū.20.9 atha prakupitā vātādayo nānāvidhairvikāraiḥ śarīramupatapanti |

nakhabhedo vipādikā pādaśūlaṃ pādabhraṃśaḥ suptapādatā vātakhuḍatā gulphagrahaḥ piṇḍikodveṣṭanaṃ gṛddhrasī jānubhedo jānuviśleṣaḥ ūrusāda ūrustambhaḥ paṅgutvaṃ gudabhraṃśo gudārtirvṛṣaṇākṣepo meḍhrastambho vaṅkṣaṇānāhaḥ śreṇibhedo viṅbheda udāvartaḥ khañjatvaṃ kubjatvaṃ vāmanatvaṃ trikagrahaḥ pṛṣṭhagrahaḥ pārśvāvamarda udarāveṣṭo hṛnmoho hṛddravo vakṣodgharṣastathā vakṣoparodho vakṣastodo bāhuśoṣastathā grīvāstambho manyāstambhaḥ kaṇṭhoddhvaṃso hanustambhastālvoṣṭhabhedo dantabhedo dantaśaithilyaṃ mūkatvaṃ vāksaṅgaḥ pralāpaḥ kaṣāyāmyatā mukhaśoṣo rasājñatvaṃ ghrāṇanāśaḥ karṇaśūlamaśabdaśrutiruccaiḥśrutirbādhiryaṃ vartmastambho vartmasaṅkocastimiramakṣiśūlamakṣivyudāso bhrūvyudāsaḥ śaṅkhabhedo lalāṭabhedaḥ śirorukkeśabhūmisphuṭanamarditamekāṅgarogaḥ sarvāṅgaroga ākṣepako daṇḍakaḥ śramo bhramo vepathurjṛmbhā glānirviṣādo raukṣyaṃ pāruṣyaṃ śyāvāruṇābhāsatvamasvapno 'navasthitacittatā ca ||

AS.Sū.20.10 pittavikārāḥ punaroṣaḥ ploṣo davo davathurvidāho 'ntardāhastvagdāho 'ṃsadāho dhūmako 'mlaka ūṣmādhikyamatisvedo 'ṅgagandho 'vayavasadanaṃ śoṇitakledo māṃsakledastvaṅmāṃsāvadaraṇaṃ carmadaraṇaṃ raktakoṭho raktavisphoṭo raktamaṇḍalāni raktapittaṃ haritatvaṃ hāridratvaṃ nīlikā kakṣyā kāmalā tiktāsyatā lohitagandhāsyatā pūtimukhatvaṃ tṛṣṇādhikyamatṛptirāsyapāko galapāko 'kṣipākaḥ pāyupāko meḍhrapāko jīvādānaṃ tamaḥpraveśo haritahāridranetramūtraśakṛttvaṃ ca ||

AS.Sū.20.11 śleṣmavikārāstu tṛptistandrā nidrādhikyaṃ staimityaṃ gurugātratālasyaṃ mukhamādhuryaṃ prasekaḥ śleṣmodgiraṇaṃ malādhikyaṃ balāso hṛdayopalepaḥ kaṇṭhopalepo dhamanīpraticayo galagaṇḍo 'tisthaulyaṃ śītāgnitvamudardaḥ śvetāvabhāsatā śvetanetramūtraśakṛttvaṃ ca ||
sarāgakaṇḍūḥ śophaḥ syādudardaḥ sa kaphodbhava iti ||
AS.Sū.20.15 sarveṣu teṣu teṣvanukteṣu cānyeṣvasaṅkhyeyatvādvikāreṣvimānyeva doṣāṇāmātmaliṅgāni sakalaśarīravyāpīnyavyabhivārīṇi ca |
AS.Sū.20.16 karmāṇi tu vāyoḥ sraṃsavyāsasaṅgasādhedatodaharṣatarṣavarttāṅgamardakampavyathaveṣṭabhaṅgaśūlaśoṣasvāpapāruṣyasauṣiryasaṅkocaspandanāni kaṣāyarasatvaṃ śyāvāruṇavarṇatā ca |
pṛthak trīn viddhi saṃsargastridhā tatra tu tānnava ||
AS.Sū.20.21 ekaṃ tulyādhikaiḥ ṣaṭ ca tāratamyavikalpanāt |
AS.Sū.20.22 ekaikavṛddhisamatākṣayaiḥ ṣaṭ te punaśca ṣaṭ |
prakṛtisthaṃ yadā pittaṃ vṛddho vāyuḥ kaphakṣaye |
AS.Sū.20.25 tadā bhedaśca dāhaśca tatra tatrānavasthitau |
AS.Sū.20.26 prakutisthaṃ kaphaṃ kṣīṇe pitte vāyuryadā balī |
AS.Sū.20.27 prakṛtisthaṃ yadā vātaṃ pittaṃ vṛddhaṃ kaphakṣaye |
AS.Sū.20.28 prakṛtisthaṃ kaphaṃ vṛddhaṃ pittaṃ vāyukṣaye yadā |
AS.Sū.20.29 prakṛtisthaṃ yadā vāyuṃ vṛddhaḥ pittakṣaye kaphaḥ |
AS.Sū.20.30 prakṛtisthaṃ yadā pittaṃ vṛddhaḥ śleṣmānilakṣaye |

div.head: atha ekaviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ |
div.p: AS.Sū.21.1 athāto doṣopakramaṇīyamadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti hasmāhurātreyo maharṣayaḥ |

vātasyopakramaḥ snehaḥ svedo mṛdūni snigdhoṣṇamadhurāmlalavaṇāni saṃśodhanānyabhyavahāryāṇi cābhyaṅgapūrvamupanāhanopaveṣṭanonmardanapariṣekāvagāhasaṃvāhana pīḍanāni vitrāsanavidhmāpanavismaraṇāni surāsavavidhānaṃ snehāścānekayonayo dīpanīyapācanīyavātaharavirecanīyadravyopahitāstathā śatapākasahasrapākāḥ sarvaśaḥ prayogārthā bastayo bastiniyamo viśeṣatastailaṃ māṃsaraso 'nuvāsanāni sukhaśīlatā strīsamparkavarjyaśca haimanto vidhiḥ ||
AS.Sū.21.2 pittasya sarpiṣpānaṃ sarpiṣā snehanamadhodoṣaharaṇaṃ madhuratiktakaṣāyāṇāmauṣadhābhyavahāryāṇāmupayogo mṛdusurabhiśītahṛdyānāṃ gandhānāmupasevā paramaśiśirasurabhisalilamajjanam |
viśeṣatastu ghṛtaṃ payo virecanāni saumyāḥ sarve bhāvāḥ divāsvapnavarjyaśca graiṣmo vidhiḥ ||

AS.Sū.21.3 śleṣmaṇaḥ punarvidhivihitāni tīkṣṇāni saṃśodhanāni rūkṣaprāyāṇyabhyavahāryāṇi kaṭutiktakaṣāyopahitāni tīkṣṇāni dīrghakālasthitāni hṛdyāni madyāni dhāvanalaṅghanaplavanajāgaraṇāniyuddhayuddhavyavāyavyāyāmarūkṣonmardanasnānocchādanāni |
viśeṣataḥ kṣaudraṃ yūṣo vamanāni sarvaśaścopavāsaḥ sadhūmagaṇḍūṣaḥ sukhapratiṣedhaḥ sukhārthameva vāsantiko vidhiriti |
AS.Sū.21.5 graiṣmaḥ prāyo marutpitte vāsantaḥ kaphamārute |
AS.Sū.21.6 yojyāḥ paṭvamlamadhurā vāyau kruddhe rasāḥkramāt |
pitte pittastataḥ svāduḥ kaṣāyaśca raso hitaḥ ||
AS.Sū.21.7 kaṭukaḥ prāk tatastiktaḥ kaṣāyo 'nte kaphāmaye ||
pittaṃ yāti cayaṃ kopaṃ na tu kālasya śaityataḥ ||
tulye 'pi kāle dehe ca skannatvānna prakupyati ||
cayādīn yānti sadyo 'pi doṣāḥ kāle 'pi vā na tu ||
AS.Sū.21.14 caya eva jayeddoṣaṃ kupitaṃ tvavirodhayan |
AS.Sū.21.17 netṛbhaṅgena dṛṣṭo hi samaṃ sainyaparājayaḥ ||
AS.Sū.21.18 sthānataḥ kecidicchanti prāk tāvacchleṣmaṇo vadham |
AS.Sū.21.20 tasmādādau kapho ghātyaḥ kāyadvārārgalo hi saḥ |
AS.Sū.21.22 suśrutaśca na sarvatra matametat bravīti tu |
AS.Sū.21.23 prāyeṇa tāpātmatayā jvare tejo viśiṣyate |
AS.Sū.21.27 krameṇādyena tatrāpi pravṛddhān svāśraye sthitān |
AS.Sū.21.28 vijñāya karmabhiḥ svaiḥ svairdoṣodrekaṃ yathābalam |
nāsau viśuddhaḥ śuddhastu śamayedyo na kopayet ||
dṛṣṭā mithaśca doṣeṣu nātonyonyaṃ jayanti te ||
AS.Sū.21.32 ārambhakaṃ virodhe 'pi mitho yadyat guṇatrayam |
viparyaye tu pakvatvaṃ tathā tāmraṃ samecakam ||
AS.Sū.21.38 āmena tena sampṛktā doṣā dūṣyāśca dūṣitāḥ |
AS.Sū.21.39 sarvadehapravisṛtān sāmān doṣān na nirharet |
AS.Sū.21.40 āśnayasya hi nāśāya te syurdurnirharatvataḥ |
AS.Sū.21.42 ghrāṇena cordhvajatrūtthān pakvādhānāt gudena tu |
utkliṣṭānadha ūrdhvaṃ vā na cāmān vahataḥ svayam ||

div.head: atha dvāviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ |
div.p: AS.Sū.22.1 athāto rogabhedīyamadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ iti hasmāhurātreyādayo maharṣayaḥ |
tatra rogotpattiṃ prati pratyutpannaṃ karma yadanenaiva śarīreṇa dṛṣṭamadṛṣṭañcoddiśyāptopadiṣṭānāṃ vihitānāṃ pratiṣiddhānāmananuṣṭhānamanuṣṭhānaṃ vā |
AS.Sū.22.2 tatra yathāsvaṃ pratipakṣaśīlanāt pūrveṣāṃ rogāṇāmupaśamaḥ |
anye punaḥ pratyutpannaṃ karma parakṛtamapi varṇayanti |
evañcāhuḥ yadi svayaṃ kṛtādevakarmaṇaḥ kāryānirvṛttiḥ syāt |
kimiti vidvānapi parācaritayorupakārāpakārayoḥ sukhaduḥkhānurodhāttoṣaroṣau pratikartavyacittaṃ vā pratipadyate |
evamete vyādhayo dvividhāḥ santaḥ trividhā jāyante |
yasmānniyatahetuko 'pyāmayaḥ samyak bhiṣagādeśānuṣṭhānādupāttāyussaṃskārāparikṣaye jātopi vā sahyavedanatāṃ pratipadyate |
svayamapi ca daivānnidānālpatayā vā nivartamānaṣṣoḍaśaguṇasamudita kriyopalambhādāśutaramaparikliṣṭasya cāpagacchati |
aniyataphaladāyini tu daive hitābhyāsaratasyā 'vakāśameva na labhate vyādhiḥ |
subahuśo 'pica bhidyamānā vyādhayo nijāgantutāṃ na vyabhicaranti ||
teṣu pūrvaṃ vātādayo vaiṣamyamāpadyante tato vyathābhinirvartate |
bāhyahetujāstvāgantavaḥ teṣu prāhareṇa vyathā pūrvamupajāyate tato doṣavaiṣamyam |
doṣavaiṣamyeṇaiva ca bahurūpā ruganubadhyate pravarddhate ca |
evañca kṛtvā na doṣavyatirekeṇa rogānubandhaḥ kevalaṃ paurvāparye viśeṣaḥ |
yathaiva śakuniḥ sarvataḥ paripatan divasaṃ svāṃ cchāyāṃ nātivartate |
yathā vā kṛtsnaṃ vikārajātaṃ vaiśvarūpyeṇa vyavashtitaṃ guṇatrayamapyatiricya na vartate |
yathā ca vidyudvarṣādayo nabhasi bhavanti na tvavaśyaṃ nimittatastvavaśyamapi |
AS.Sū.22.6 trividhantu nimittameṣāmasātmyendriyārthasaṃyogaḥ pajñāparādhāḥ pariṇāmaśca te punaḥ pratyekamatiyogāyogamithyāyogabhedāt tridhā bhidyante |
AS.Sū.22.7 kāyavāṅmanobhedena tu trividhamapyahitaṃ karma prajñāparādhaḥ |
tatrāpi rasavarjyā viṣayā yathāyathamindriyaṃ bādhante 'nugṛhṇanti ca |
AS.Sū.22.8 sarvabhāvānāṃ bhāvābhāvau nāntareṇa yogātiyogādīn vyavasyet |
yadā hyete trayo nidānādiviśeṣāt nānyonyamanubadhnantīṣadvānubadhnantyabalā vā na tadāminirvarttante vyādharyāścarā dvābhinirvarttante tanavo vā bhavantyasampūrṇaliṅgā vā |
AS.Sū.22.9 trayaśca rogāṇāṃ mārgā bāhyamadhyābhyantarāḥ tatra bāhyo raktādidhātavastvak ca |

ābhyantaro mahāsrotaḥ śarīramadhyaṃ mahānimnamāmapakvāśayāśrayaḥ koṣṭho 'ntariti paryāyāḥ tadāśrayā jvarātīsārachardyalasakaviṣūcikāśvāsakāsahidhmānāhodaraplīhādayo 'ntarbhāgāśca visarpaśophārśovidradhigulmādayaḥ ||
AS.Sū.22.10 te ca rogāḥ svapradhānā bhavantyanyaparivārā vā kramādanubandhyanubandhākhyāḥ |
itare tu tadviparītāḥ tadvacca doṣā api |
pradhānapraśame ca praśamo bhavati teṣāmanupaśāmyato vā paścāttānupakramet |
sa hi pīḍākarataro bhavati vyādhiparikliṣṭadehatvāt pramehapiṭakādivat |
tathānyaḥ pradhāna eva rogo 'nyasya pradhānasya hetuḥ bhavati |
yathā jvaro raktapittasya raktapittaṃ vā jvarasya |
ekaścāpacāro nimittamekasya vyādheḥ bahūnāṃ ca tathā bahavaḥ tadvadekaṃ liṅgam |
evameva praśame 'bhyupāyaḥ tathā sa evānyasya prakope |

AS.Sū.22.11 tatrāgamato rogamevamevaṃ prakopaṇamevaṃ yonimevamadhiṣṭhānamevamātmānamevaṃ devanamevaṃ rūpaśabdagandharasasparśamevaṃ pūrvarūpamevamupadravamevaṃ vṛddhisthānakṣayānvitamevamudarkamevaṃ nāmānam |
prakṛtivikṛtiyuktamāsyarasantu praśnena tathā succhardanaducchardanatvaṃ mṛdukrūrakoṣṭhatāṃ svapnadarśanamabhiprāyaṃ janmāmayapravṛttinakṣatradviṣṭeṣṭasukhaduḥkhāni ca |
AS.Sū.22.16 jñānāṃśena na hi jñānaṃ kṛtsne jñeye pravartate |
na jātu skhalati prājño viṣamepi kriyāpathe ||
tatrānubandhaṃ prakṛtiñca samyak jñātvā tataḥ karma samārabheta ||

div.head: atha trayoviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ |
div.p: kasminnayaṃ deśe jātaḥ saṃvṛddho vyādhito vā kasmiṃśca deśe manuṣyāṇāmidamāhārajātamidaṃ vihārajātametāvat balamevāṃvidhaṃ satvamevaṃvidhaṃ sātmmamiyaṃ bhaktirime vyādhayo hitamidamahitamidamiti |
kimāhāreṇa kupito vāyuḥ kiṃ vihāreṇa tathā rūkṣeṇa laghunā śiśireṇa vā sāhasena vegarodhena vā bhayena śokena veti |
ekarūpasyāpi hi hetoḥ mṛdvādivibhāgena pṛthak samavetānāñca doṣāṇāmaṃśāṃśabalavikalpaviśeṣāt vyādherbalābalaviśeṣaḥ |
tatrānekadoṣātmakeṣu vyādhiṣvanekaraseṣu ca bheṣajeṣu rasadoṣaprabhāvamekaikaśo 'bhisamīkṣya vyādhibheṣajaprabhāvatatvaṃ vyavasyeta |
AS.Sū.23.3 na hi viṣamavikṛtisamavetānāṃ nānātmakānāṃ paraspareṇopagṛhītānāmupahatānāñcānyaiśca vikalpanairvikalpitānāmavayavaprabhāvānumānena samudāyaprabhāvatatvamadhyavasituṃ śakyam |
tathā kasya dhāmādhiṣṭhāya vyādhirayamavashtita iti nirūpayet |
pravisṛto hi doṣaḥ svameva sthānamātaṅkāyādhitiṣṭhan mūrddhādīn vā dustaro bhavati |
saṃśamanāni tu vyādhibalādadhikāni tamupaśamayya vyādhiṃ vyādhikṣapitadehe śīghramanyamāvahanti |
atisthūlo 'tikṛśo durbalo durbaddhamāṃsaśoṇitāsthyaṃgāvayavo 'lpāgniralpāhāro 'sātmyāhāropacitaḥ sārarahito vā vyādhibalameva tāvadasamarthasoḍhum |
tathā balavati vyādhyāture 'lpabalamalpaṃ vā bheṣajamakiñcitkaraṃ bhūya eva doṣamutkleśya vyādhimudīrayet ||

idamevaṃrasavīryavipākamevaṃguṇamevaṃdravyamevaṃkarmaivaṃprabhāvamasmin deśe jātamasminnṛtāvevaṃgṛhītamevaṃnihitamevaṃvihitamevaṃniṣiddhamevamupasaskṛtamevaṃsaṃyuktamevaṃyuktamanayā mātrayaivaṃvidhasya puruṣasyaivaṃvidhe kāla etāvantaṃ doṣamapakarṣatyupaśamayati vā |
anyadapi caivaṃvidhaṃ bheṣajamabhūt tanmānena vā viśeṣeṇa prayuktamidamakarot |
santi vyādhayo ye śāstra utsargāpavādairupakramaṃ prati nirdiṣṭāḥ |
sa kṣaṇalavamuhūrtādibhedenāturāvasthayā ca dvidhoktaḥ prāgapi ca |
sādhāraṇā hi mandaśītoṣṇavarṣatayā sukhatvāt bhavantyavikalpakāḥ śarīrauṣadhānām |
tadanu prāptañca bheṣajaṃ saṃśodhanārthamuṣṇasvabhāvamapi śītopahatatvānmandavīryatāṃ gatamayogāya jāyate |

tadvadvarṣāsvapi samantādatighanena bahalena ghanasampātenāvatate nabhasi uparuddhatejaḥyasareṣu dinakarakareṣu jalapaṭalotplāvanoddāmakardamāyāṃ bhūmāvatyarthopaklinnamavasannānalabalamādānadurbalaṃ śarīraṃ bhavati ||
AS.Sū.23.10 auṣadhagrāmastu jaladodarapratatapramuktadhārāvapātasambhṛtāmbunivahopaplāvitamūlajālasāraviṭapo bahalakomalapallavopacitaskandhaśākhaḥ punariva bālatāmupagato 'lpavīryo bhavati |

aparisaṃsthitatayā ca kṣitimalapnāyābhiramlavipākābhiḥ khagamṛgasarīsṛpādiśavadhātumūtrapurīṣasaṃspṛṣṭābhiradbhiḥ salilaśiśiraśīkarānuviddhaśiśirapavanasampṛktena ca dhārādharoṣmaṇā komalatvādapariṇatasyāsya sutarāṃ vidāho janyate |
abhaktaṃ prāgbhaktaṃ madhyabhaktamadhobhaktaṃ sabhaktamantarabhaktaṃ sāmudgaṃ muhurmuhuḥ sagrāsaṃ grāsāntarā niśi ca ||
tadapānānilavikṛtāvadhaḥ kāyasya ca balādhānārthaṃ tadgateṣu ca vyādhiṣu praśamanāya kṛśīkaraṇārthañca yojyam ||
AS.Sū.23.15 madhyabhaktaṃ madhye bhaktasya tat samānānilavikṛtau |
pūrvakāyasya ca balādhānārthaṃ tadgateṣu vyādhiṣu ca ślaiṣmikeṣu ca praśamāya sthūlīkaraṇārthañca ||
AS.Sū.23.17 sabhaktaṃ yadannena samaṃ sādhitaṃ paścādvā samāloḍitam |
tat bāleṣu sukumāreṣvauṣadhadveṣiṣvarucau sarvāṅgageṣu ca rogeṣu ||
AS.Sū.23.18 antarābhaktaṃ yat pūrvāhṇe bhakte jīrṇe madhyāhne bheṣajamupayujyate |
tattu laghvalpānnayuktaṃ pācanāvalehacūrṇādi hidhmāyāṃ kampākṣepayorūrdhvādhassaṃśraye ca doṣe ||
AS.Sū.23.22 tatrādye kāle tṛṣitaḥ pītaśītāmburajīrṇī kṣudhitaḥ kṣāmaśca bheṣajaṃ varjayet |
tataḥ karma bhiṣak paścāt jñānapūrvaṃ samācaret ||
dehe mārgīkṛte doṣaiḥ śeṣaḥ sūkṣma ivānalaḥ ||
prayojayet kriyāṃ prāptāṃ kriyākālaṃ na hāpayet ||
AS.Sū.23.35 ucito yasya yo deśastajjaṃ tasyauṣadhaṃ hitam |

div.head: atha caturviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ |
div.p: AS.Sū.24.2 upakramyasya hi dvitvād dvidhaivopakramo mataḥ |
AS.Sū.24.3 bṛṃhaṇaṃ yat bṛhatvāya laṅghanaṃ lāghavāya yat |
AS.Sū.24.4 snehanaṃ rūkṣaṇaṃ karma svedanaṃ stambhanañca yat |
AS.Sū.24.5 śodhanaṃ śamanañceti dvidhā tatrāpi laṅghanam |
AS.Sū.24.7 samīkaroti viṣamān śamanaṃ tacca saptadhā |
AS.Sū.24.19 āma eva ślathīkurvan dhātūn shtaulyamupānayet |
AS.Sū.24.21 srotastu medoruddheṣu vāyuḥ koṣṭhe viśeṣataḥ |
AS.Sū.24.22 sthūlaṃ koṭaravadvṛddhau dahato 'gnyanilau ca tam |
AS.Sū.24.23 koṣṭha eva vipakve 'sya saṃruddhasrotaso rase |
AS.Sū.24.27 śleṣmamedoharaṃ yacca kulatthā yavakā yavāḥ |
AS.Sū.24.28 mastu takraṃ ca tīkṣṇoṣṇaṃ rūkṣaṃ chedi ca bheṣajam |
AS.Sū.24.29 dehāpekṣī tathā rūkṣaṃ snānamudvartanādi ca |
AS.Sū.24.35 takreṇa dadhimaṇḍena pītaṃ kolarasena vā |
mūtrakṛchraṃ kṛmīn mehaṃ sthūlatāṃ ca vyapohati ||
AS.Sū.24.38 niśe bṛhatyau hapuṣā pāṭhā mūlaṃ ca kembukāt |
eṣāṃ cūrṇaṃ madhu ghṛtaṃ tailaṃ ca sadṛśāṃśakam ||
AS.Sū.24.39 saktubhiḥ ṣoḍaśaguṇairyuktaṃ pītaṃ nihanti tat |
kārśyameva varaṃ sthaulyānna hi sthūlasya bheṣajam |
AS.Sū.24.49 svapnaprasaṅgācca kṛśo varāha iva puṣyati |
AS.Sū.24.50 sadyaḥ kṣīṇo yataḥ sadyo bṛṃhaṇenopacīyate |
ciraṃ krameṇa ca kṣīṇastadabhyāsena tatra ca ||
AS.Sū.24.53 yuñjyāt kṛśānāṃ jvariṇāṃ kāsināṃ mūtrakṛcchriṇām |
AS.Sū.24.57 svāduramlo jalakṛtaḥ sasneho rūkṣa eva vā |
AS.Sū.24.58 guru cātarpaṇaṃ sthūle viparītaṃ hitaṃ kṛśe |
AS.Sū.24.59 syaulyakārśye prakṛtyāpi syātāṃ tatrāpyayaṃ vidhiḥ |
satataṃ vyādhitatayā sadā yojyo vibhajya ca ||
upakramā na tu dvitvādbhinnā api gadā iva ||

div.head: atha pañcaviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ |
div.p: AS.Sū.25.4 sarpirmajjā vasā tailaṃ sneheṣu pravaraṃ matam |
AS.Sū.25.6 ghṛtāttailaṃ guru vasā tailānmajjā tato 'pi ca |
apaprasūtā yukte ca nasye bastau virecane ||
tailaṃ prāvṛṣi varṣānte sarpiranyau tu mādhave |
sarvaṃ sarvasya ca snehaṃ yuñjyāt bhāsvati nirmale ||
AS.Sū.25.15 tvaramāṇe tu śīte 'pi divā tailaṃ ca yojayet |
AS.Sū.25.20 kalpayedvīkṣya doṣādīn prāgeva tu hrasīyasīm |
AS.Sū.25.22 hrasvā peyā sukhā sā hi parihāre 'nuvartate |
cirācca balyā na ruje vyāpannāpi prakalpate ||
AS.Sū.25.25 unmattaiḥ kṛcchramūtraiśca mahatī śīghrameva sā |
AS.Sū.25.26 hyastena jīrṇa evānne snehocchaḥ śuddhaye bahuḥ |
AS.Sū.25.27 bṛṃhaṇo rasamadyādyaiḥ sabhakto 'lpo hitaḥ sa ca |
AS.Sū.25.31 vāte salavaṇaṃ sarpiḥ pitte kevalamiṣyate |
AS.Sū.25.36 bhojyo 'nnaṃ mātrayā pāsyan śvaḥpiban pītavānapi |
AS.Sū.25.40 upacārastu śamane kāryaḥ snehe viriktavat |
snehasya pānāt pūrvaṃ ca dātavyaṃ mṛdubheṣajam |
AS.Sū.25.41 tryahamacchaṃ mṛdau koṣṭhe krūre saptadinaṃ pibet |
AS.Sū.25.42 sātmībhūto hi kurute na malānāmudīraṇam |
AS.Sū.25.43 vihatya setuṃ mṛtkoṣṭhāt sravati kṣapayan mṛdam |
AS.Sū.25.45 vimalendriyatā samyak snigdhe rūkṣe viparyayaḥ |
AS.Sū.25.55 tato doṣādibalataḥ pūrvoktaṃ ca vidhiṃ śrayet |
na sarpiḥ kevalaṃ pitte peyaṃ sāme viśeṣataḥ |
sarvaṃ hyanuvrajeddehaṃ hatvā saṃjñāṃ ca mārayet ||
AS.Sū.25.62 tilacūrṇaṃ ca sasnehaṃ phāṇitaṃ kṛsarāṃ tathā |
AS.Sū.25.63 peyāṃ sukhoṣṇā kṣaireyīṃ pātre vā sasitāghṛte |
AS.Sū.25.65 snehaṃ vaikaṃ surācchena dadhno vā saguḍaṃ saram |
vasāṃ varāhajāṃ sarpiḥ pippalīṃ lavaṇaṃ tilān ||
taddhi viṣyandyarūkṣaṃ ca sūkṣmamuṣṇaṃ vyavāyi ca ||
dṛḍhendriyo mandajaraḥ śatāyuḥ snehopasevī puruṣaḥ pradiṣṭaḥ ||

div.head: atha ṣaḍviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ |
div.p: tatra tāpasvedaḥ pāṇikāṃsyaphālavālukāvastraghaṭikādibhiḥ sākṣādagninā ca prayoktavyaḥ ||

kṣīraśuktadhānyāmlalavaṇamastupragāḍhaiḥ susnigdhaiḥ sukhoṣṇaiḥ sālvalābhidhānaistairbahuśaḥ pradihyoṣṇavīryāpūtisṛduromacarmabhistadabhāve ghanavātaharapatrāvikakauśeyairupanaddhamaṅgamahasthitaṃ vidāhaparihārārthaṃ niśi muñcet |

tatra śigruvaraṇāmrātakamūlakasarṣapasurasārjakavāsāvaṃśāśmantakāśokaśirīṣārkakarañjairaṇḍamālatīpatrabhaṅgapūtīkadaśamūlādivātaharairdravyairmastusalilasurākṣīraśuktādibhiḥ kvathitaiḥ pūrvoktaiśca yathādoṣaṃ pṛthak sahitairvā kumbhīrvarṣalikāḥ praṇālīrvā pūrayitvā vātaharasiddhasnehābhyaktamanabhyaktaṃ vopaviṣṭaṃ kiliñje vā śayānamekāṅge sarvāṅge vā vastrāvacchanne pariṣecayet |
tairevādbhiḥ pūrṇe mahati kaṭāhe kuṇḍe droṇyāṃvāvagāhayet ||
piṇḍaḥ saṃstaro nāḍī ghanāśma kumbhī kūpaḥ kuṭī jentākaśca |
tatra mṛtkapālapāṣāṇaloṣṭalohapiṇḍānagnivarṇān sandaṃśena gṛhītvāmbhasyamle vā nimajjayet tairārdrāvakivastreṇa veṣṭitaiḥ śleṣmamedobhūyiṣṭhaṃ sarujamaṅgaṃ granthimadvā svedayet |

AS.Sū.26.6 yathārhasvedadravyāṇi pihitamukhāyāmukhāyāṃ samyagupasvedya nivātaśaraṇaśayanasthe kiliñje prastīryāvikakauśeyavātaharapatrānyatamottarapracchade rauravājinaprāvārādibhiḥ svavacchannaṃ svedayediti saṃstarasvedaḥ ||

nāḍīmūlacchidrapramāṇapārśvacchidrāmupasandhāyāvalipya ca pārśvacchidrasthayā nāḍyā śaroṣikāvaṃśadalakiliñjakarañjapatrānyatamakṛtayā gajāgrahastasaṃsthānayā vyāmadīrghayādhyarddhavyāmadīrghayā vā svāyāmacaturbhāgāṣṭabhāgapariṇāhamūlāgrasrotasā sarvatovātaharapatrasaṃvṛtachidrayā dvistrirvā vinamitayā sukhopaviṣṭasya svabhyaktaprāvṛteṅge bāṣpamupaharet |
bāṣpo hyanṛjugāmī vihatacaṇḍavegastvacamavidahan sukhaṃ svedayatīti nāḍīsvedaḥ ||

AS.Sū.26.8 puruṣāyāmamātramadhikaṃ vā ghanaṃ samaṃ ca śilātalaṃ bhūpradeśaṃ vā vātaharadārudīptenāgninā sarvatastāpayitvāgnimapohyoṣṇodakāmlādibhirabhyukṣya yathoktapracchade saṃstaravatsvedayediti ghānāśmasvedaḥ ||

bhūmau vā tāṃ nikhāya tadūrdhvamāsanaṃ śayanaṃ vā nātighanapracchadaṃ paritaḥ pralambamānakuthākambalagoṇikaṃ nidhāya tatrasthasyoṣmāṇaṃ gṛhṇataḥ kumbhyāmagnivarṇānayoguḍānupalāṃśca śanairnimajjayediti kumbhīsvedaḥ ||
AS.Sū.26.10 śayanasyādhovistāradviguṇakhāte kūpe vātaharadārukarīṣānyatarapūrṇadagghe vigatadhūme svāstīrṇaśayanasthaṃ svedayediti kūpasvedaḥ ||

AS.Sū.26.11 kuṭīṃ nātyuccavistārāṃ vṛttāmacchidrāmupanāhakalkaghanapradigdhakuḍyāṃ sarvatovidhūmapradīptakhadirāṅgārapūrṇahasantikāsamūhaparivṛtāṃ vidhāya tanmadhye ca śayyāṃ tatrasthaṃ svedayediti kuṭīsvedaḥ ||
saptāṣṭau vāratnīrapakramyodakāt prāṅmukhamudaṅmukhaṃ vābhimukhatīrthaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ kārayet |
asya ca kūṭāgārasyāntaḥ samantato bhittimaratnivistārocchrāyāṃ piṇḍikāṃ kārayedākavāṭāt |
madhye cāsya kūṭāgārasya kiṣkumuktaṃ dvipuruṣapramāṇaṃ mṛnmayaṃ kandusaṃsthānaṃbahusūkṣmacchidramaṅgārakoṣṭhakastambhaṃ sāpidhānaṃ kārayet |
taṃ ca khādirāṇāmaśvakarṇānāṃ vā kāṣṭhānāṃ pūrayitvā dīpayet |
sa yadā jānīyātsādhudagdhāni kāṣṭhāni vigatadhūmānyavataptaṃ sarvamagninā tadagnigṛhaṃ svedayogyena coṣmaṇā yuktamiti |
praviśya caināṃ piṇḍikāmāruhya ṣārśvāparapārśvābhyāṃ yathāsukhaṃ śayīthāḥ |
bhraśyamāno hyataḥ piṇḍikāvakāśād dvāramanadhigacchan svedamūrcchā parītatayā sadyaḥ prāṇān jahyāḥ |
tvaṃ yadā jānīyā vigatābhiṣyandamātmānaṃ samyak prasrutasvedapicchaṃ sarvasroto vimuktaṃ laghubhūtamapagatavibandhastambhasuptivedanāga ravamiti |
niṣkramya ca cakṣuṣoḥ paripālanārthamatisvinno 'pi na sahasā śītodakamanupraviśethāḥ |
samyak svinnastvapagatasantāpaklamo muhūrtāt sukhoṣṇena vāriṇā yathānyāyaṃ pariṣikto 'śnīyāditi jentākasvedaḥ ||
AS.Sū.26.16 kaphārto rūkṣaṇaṃ rūkṣo rūkṣasnigdhaṃ kaphānile |
alpaṃ vaṅkṣaṇayoḥ svalpaṃ dṛṅbhuṣkahṛdaye na vā ||
AS.Sū.26.19 muhuḥ karaiśca toyardraiḥ svidyate hṛdayaṃ spṛśet |
AS.Sū.26.22 svedanaṃ guru tīkṣṇoṣṇaṃ prāyaḥ stambhanamanyathā |
prāyastiktaṃ kaṣāyaṃ ca madhuraṃ ca samāsataḥ ||
AS.Sū.26.24 stammitaḥ syāt bale labdhe yathoktāmayasaṅkṣayāt |
AS.Sū.26.28 garbhiṇīṃ puṣpitāṃ sūtāṃ mṛdu vātyayike gade |
AS.Sū.26.33 agnerdīptiṃ mārdavaṃ tvakprasādaṃ bhaktaśraddhāṃ srotasāṃ nirmalatvam |
kuryāt svedo jāḍyatandrāpahāraṃ stabdhān sandhīṃśceṣṭayatyāśu cāsya ||
AS.Sū.26.34 snehaklinnāḥ koṣṭhagā dhātugā vā srotolīnā ye ca śākhāsthisaṃsthāḥ |
doṣāḥ svedaiste dravīkṛtya koṣṭhaṃ nītāḥ samyak śuddhibhirnirhriyante ||

div.head: atha saptaviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ |
div.p: AS.Sū.27.2 doṣaharaṇamūrdhvabhāgaṃ vamanākhyamadhobhāgaṃ virecanākhyamubhayaṃ vā malavirecanādvirecanamityucyate ||

AS.Sū.27.3 tatroṣṇatīkṣṇasūkṣmavyavāyivikāṣīṇyauṣadhāni svavīryeṇa hṛdayamupetya saukṣmyāt vyavāyitvācca dhamanīranusṛtya snehena mṛdūkṛte 'ntaśśarīre svedoṣmaṇārdradāruvadviṣyaṇṇe sthūlāṇusrotebhyaḥ sakalamapi doṣasaṅghātamauṣṇyāt punarviṣyandayanti |

sa viṣyaṇṇavicchinno doṣasaṅghātaḥ pāriplavaḥ snehāktabhājanastha ivodakāñjalirasajjannanupnasaraṇabhāvādāmāśayamanugamya udānapraṇunnaḥ agnivāyvātmakatvāt ūrdhvabhāgaprabhāvāccauṣadhasyordhvaṃ pravartate |
AS.Sū.27.4 tatrotkṛṣṭe śleṣmaṇi pittasaṃsṛṣṭe vā tatsthānagate vā pitte anile vā śleṣmottare ca vamanamācaret |
pitte tu virekaṃ śleṣmasaṃsṛṣṭe vā tatsthānagate vā śleṣmaṇīti ||

AS.Sū.27.5 tatra vamanasādhyā viṣapītadaṣṭadigdhaviddhaviruddhājīrṇānnanavajvararājayakṣmātīsārādhoraktapittaviṣūcikālasakāvipākārocakāpacigranthyarbudaślīpadamedogadagaronmādāpasmāraśvāsakāsahṛllāsavīsarpapramehakuṣṭhapāṇḍuvartmamukhaghrāṇakapālarogakarṇarodhaśophastanyadoṣādayo doṣabhedīyoktāśca śleṣmavyādhayo viśeṣeṇa |
ete hi paraṃ vamanena nāśamupayānti salilāpagamanenāniṣpannaśālyādivat ||
AS.Sū.27.7 garbhiṇyādicintāprasaktāntāścātra dhūmāntaiḥ prāyaḥ sarvakarmabhirvakṣyamāṇaḥ parihartavyāḥ |

AS.Sū.27.8 atha virecanasādhyā jīrṇajvarordhvaraktapittagulmavidradhiplīhārśobhagandarodarakṛmiṇakoṣṭhamūtrāghātaretoyonidoṣavātaśoṇitahalīmakavyaṅgatimirakācābhiṣyandākṣipākakṣārāgnidagdhakuṣṭavraṇaśiraḥpakvāśayaśūlodāvartavibandhacchardivisphoṭādayo vāmyoktāśca viṣūcikādayo doṣabhedīyoktāśca pittavyādhayaḥ |

AS.Sū.27.9 avirecyāḥ punarnavajvarātisāryadhoraktapittakṣatagudalaṅghatarātrijāgaritāsthāpitālpāgnirājayakṣmamadātyayārtādhmātasaśalyābhihatatisnigdharūkṣakrūrakoṣṭhāḥ tatra navajvarasyāvipakvān doṣānna nirharet |
kṣatagudasya gude prāṇoparodhakarīṃ rājayakṣmārtasya kṣīṇadhātutayā malabalattvam |
ādhmātasya purīṣāśaye nicito vāyurvisarpan sahasā tīvrataramādhmānaṃ maraṇaṃ vā janayet |
krūrakoṣṭhasyauṣadhoddhatā doṣā hyapravartamānā hṛdayaśūlaparvabhedānāhacchardimūrcchāklamān janayitvā prāṇān hanyuḥ |

AS.Sū.27.10 atha sādhāraṇe kāle samyaksnigdhasvinnamanupahatamānasaṃśvaḥ cchardayitavyamiti grāmyānūpaudakaśṛtamāṃsarasakṣīradadhimāṣatilapalalaśākādibhirdravaprāyaiḥ samutkleśitaśleṣmāṇaṃ sukhoṣitaṃ jīrṇāhāraṃ pūrvāhṇe snātānuliptaṃ sragviṇamahatavāsasaṃ devatāgnidvijaguruvṛddhavaidyānarcitavantaṃ kṛtahomabalimaṅgalaprāyaścittasvastivacanaṃ jānusamasaṃstṛtasopadhānopāśrayāsanopaviṣṭaṃ nirannabhīṣatsnigdhaṃ vā yavāgū maṇḍena ghṛtamātrāṃ pītavantaṃ bhīrukṛśabālavṛddhasukumārān vā doṣānurodhenākaṇṭhaṃ pītakṣīratakrayūṣekṣumāṃsarasamadyatuṣodakayavāgūmaṇḍānyatamaṃ nakṣatratithikaraṇamuhūrtodaye praśaste yathāvyādhidoṣadūṣyādivihitāmauṣadhamātrāṃ madhusaindhavayuktāṃ sukhoṣṇāṃ brāhmaṇaprayuktābhirāśīrbhirābhimantritāṃ
AS.Sū.27.13 aum nāmo bhagavate bhaiṣajyagurave vaiḍūryaprabharājāya tathāgatāyārhate samyaksambuddhāya |
AS.Sū.27.14 tataḥ pītavānūrunyastabhujo vamanānugatamānasognitaptaiḥ pāṇibhirupatapyamāno muhūrtamanupālayet |
sa yadā jānīyāt svedaprādurbhāvena doṣaṃ pravilayamāpadyamānaṃ

atha samupasthitānekapratigrāhaḥ pārśvalalāṭopagrahaṇe nābhiprapīḍane pṛṣṭhapratilomonmardane ca pravṛttāvyapatrapaṇīyapuruṣo vivṛtoṣṭhatālukaṇṭho nātimahatā vyāyāmena vegānudīrayan nāpravṛttān na pravarttayan pravṛttāṃścānupravartayan suparilikhitanakhābhyāmaṅgulībhyāmutpalakumudairaṇḍanālairvā kaṇṭhamabhimṛśan vamet |
sarveṣu ca vamaneṣu saindhavaṃ madhu ca vidadhyātkaphavilayanavicchedanārtham |
AS.Sū.27.17 tatrāpravṛttiḥ kevalasya vā bheṣajasya pravṛttirvibandho vā vegānāmayogalakṣaṇam |
AS.Sū.27.18 yogalakṣaṇaṃ punaḥ kāle kramāt kaphapittānilapravṛttirnātimahatī vyathā svayaṃ cāvasthānaṃ tataśca svasthatā manaḥprasādaḥ svaraviśuddhirarocakādivaiparītyaṃ ca ||

AS.Sū.27.20 yogena tu khalvenaṃ charditavantaṃ suviśodhitapāṇipādamukhaṃ muhūrtamāśvāsya dhūmatrayasyānyatamaṃ sāmarthyataḥ pāyayitvā punarupaspṛṣṭodakaṃ sammānitasurabhitāmbūlaṃ nivātāgāraśayyāsthitaṃ snehoktenācāravidhinānuśiṣyāt ||
