AS.Utt.29.9 snigdhaḥ sthūlauṣṭhāḥ pāṇḍuścaṇḍakaṇḍūrnavanītavasāmajjapiṣṭatilanārikelāmbusadṛśaśvetaśītabahalapicchilakledaḥ svāpastambhastaimityagauravopadehayuktaḥ sirāsnāyujālāvatato mandavedanaḥ kaṭhinaśca kaphāt ||
AS.Utt.29.11 yathāsvaliṅgasaṅkare dvābhyāṃ tribhiḥ sarvaiśca duṣṭaṃ vidyāt |
tatra yathoktaduṣṭaliṅgābhāvāt saṃrambharahitatvaṃ jihvāvarṇatā ślakṣṇatvaṃ nīrujatvaṃ nirāsrāvatā śyāvaparyantatvaṃ samauṣṭhamadhyatā kiñcidunnatamadhyatā vā ||
AS.Utt.29.14 tatra ghṛṣṭāsu vā tvakṣu sphoṭeṣu vā bhinneṣu salilaprakāśo bhavatyāsrāvaḥ |
AS.Utt.29.17 snāvagataḥ snighdo ghanaḥ siṅghāṇakapratimaḥ saraktaśca ||
AS.Utt.29.18 sandhigataḥ samantāt prapīḍyamāno na pravartate tathākuñcanaprasāraṇonnamananamanapravāhaṇeṣu sravati picchilo 'valambī sa phenarudhironmiśraśca ||
AS.Utt.29.19 asthi tvabhihataṃ sphuṭitaṃ bhinnaṃ doṣāvadāritaṃ vā doṣabhakṣitatvānnissāraṃ bhavati |
svayaṃ vidīrṇāśca doṣajā na tu vaidyakṛtāḥ ||
AS.Utt.29.23 vayasthānāṃ dṛḍhānāṃ prāṇavatāṃ satvavatāmātmavatāṃ dīptāgnīnāṃ ca vraṇāḥ sucikitsyāḥ ||
AS.Utt.29.25 eta eva guṇā vṛddhakṛśālpaprāṇabhīrumandāgniprakledidehadeśakāleṣu viparītāḥ śiṣyopanayanīyaṃ cekṣeta ||
vraṇāḥ kṛcchreṇa sidhyanti yeṣāṃ ca syurvraṇe vraṇāḥ ||

AS.Utt.29.29 asādhyāḥ punarmāṃsapiṇḍavadudgatāḥ prasekinontaḥpūyā vedanāvantaśca pāyuvadudvṛttauṣṭhāḥ kaṭhinā gośṛṅgavadunnatamāṃsaprarohā duṣṭaśoṇitāsrāviṇastanupicchilāsrāvasrāviṇo vā madhyonnatāḥ samavasannasuṣiraparyantāḥ śaṇatūlavatsnāyujālavanto durdarśanā medomajjavasāmastuluṅgasrāviṇaśca doṣasamutthāḥ pītāsitāmūtrapurīṣavātavāhinaśca koṣṭhasthāḥ raktaśayajāśca kṣārodakasamāsrāvāḥ pakvāśayajāśca pulākodakamiva sravantaḥ kṣīṇamāṃsānāṃ ca sarvatogatayastvaṇumukhamāṃsabudbudavantaḥ saśabdavātavāhinaśca śiraḥkaṭhasthā visarpajvarapipāsārocakāvipākakāsaśvāsātīsāracchardiyuktāḥ bhinno ca śiraḥkapāle yatra mastuluṅgadarśanaṃ tridoṣaliṅgaprādubhāvo vā syāditi |

div.head: atha triṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ |
div.p: AS.Utt.30.2 vraṇasya śophāvasthāyāṃ śastrakarmavidhau śvayathucikitsite ca sādhanamuddiṣṭam |
sadyaḥ śāmyanti śuddhānāṃ vraṇāḥ śophāśca dehinām ||
AS.Utt.30.7 yastu śītastanurmuhurmuhuśca prayujyate sa pradeho raktapittatvacāṃ prasādakṛt |
pralepastūṣṇaḥ śīto vā bahalaśca tathā vātaśleṣmapraśamanastasyopayogaḥ kṣatākṣateṣu |
yastu kṣateṣūpayujyate sa bhūyaḥ kalka iti saṃjñāṃ labhate ||
snaihiko nirvāpaṇaḥ prasādanaḥ stambhano vilāyanaḥ pācanaḥ pīḍanaḥ śodhano ropaṇaḥ savarṇīkaraṇaśca ||
AS.Utt.30.9 tatra vāte snigdhadravyaiḥ snehāḍhyaiḥ snehenaiva vā snaihikaḥ |
pitte pittaprāye ca śophe viṣāgnikṣāradagdhe ca śītairnirvāpaṇaḥ |
śleṣmamedobhūyiṣṭhe śītaiścāvidagdhe piṣṭalabdhe grathite vā rūkṣairvilāyanaḥ |
AS.Utt.30.10 na ca pradehaṃ rātrau prayuñjīta |
AS.Utt.30.13 na ca paryuṣitaṃ lepaṃ dadyāt bhūyastameva vā |
AS.Utt.30.14 śophe vraṇe ca kaṭhine vivarṇe vedanānvite |
AS.Utt.30.19 sadāhaśūlāṃstu tilānatasīśca bhṛṣṭvā payasi nirvāpya tenaiva kṣīreṇa piṣṭvā pralepayet ||
AS.Utt.30.22 daśamūlasiddhena sukhoṣṇenāmbhasā payasā vā ghṛtatailābhyāṃ vā pariṣekaḥ śophe vraṇe vā dāhaśūlaghnaḥ ||
AS.Utt.30.23 sthirāṇāṃ mandavedanānāṃ śophānāṃ vimlāpanaṃ kāryam ||
AS.Utt.30.24 abhyajya svedayitvā ca veṇunāḍyā tataḥ śanaiḥ |
AS.Utt.30.27 śigruśaṇaphalacitrakakiṇvaniṣpāvasarṣapatilātasīsaktukolagṛhadhūmairamlapiṣṭaiḥ sukhoṣṇaiḥ snigdhaiḥ salavaṇairutkārikāṃ kṛtvā tathā pralipyairaṇḍapatreṇāvacchādyabadhnīyāt ||
AS.Utt.30.28 pākābhimukhe ca śophe yatheṣṭamāturaṃ bhojayet pācanārthaṃ pākavedanāśastrakarmasahanārthaṃ ca ||
AS.Utt.30.29 pakve tu yathoktena vidhinā śastramavacārayet |
AS.Utt.30.32 śuṣyantaṃ samupekṣeta pralepaṃ pīḍanaṃ prati |
AS.Utt.30.37 ajagandhājaśṛṅgī ca gavākṣī lāṅgalī niśā |
AS.Utt.30.39 tatra gambhīreṣu pittātmakeṣu dāhapākavatsu vraṇeṣvatīkṣṇoṣṇairebhiḥ kārpāsīphalamiśraṃ kalkaṃ ghṛtaṃ ca sādhayitvā yojayet ||
AS.Utt.30.40 utsannamāṃseṣvalpasrāveṣu rūkṣeṣu tilāpāmārgabṛhatīdvayayuktaiḥ pūrvoktaiḥ pūtīkādibhiḥ sarṣapaṃ tailaṃ ca ||
AS.Utt.30.41 pracalapradeśajeṣu kledabahuleṣūtsannasthiramāṃseṣu tailena cāsidhyatsu rasakriyāṃ kuryāt |
yathoktānāṃ saṃśodhanauṣadhānāṃ kaṣāye punaḥ parisrāvyādhiśṛte manaśśilātuvarīkāsīsacūrṇapratīvāpasiddhāṃ ca mātuluṅgarasopetāṃ sakṣaudrāṃ yuñjīta ||
AS.Utt.30.43 vacāyāṃ saindhave kiṇve kāsīse rajanīdvaye |
AS.Utt.30.47 śuṣkālpamāṃse gambhīre vraṇa utsādanaṃ hitam ||
AS.Utt.30.48 aśvagandhāpāmārgatālapatrīsuvarcalābalātibalānantādhātakīkusumasamaṅgābhiḥ padmakādivargeṇa nyagrodhādinā ca kalkastathā sarpīṃṣyabhyañjanārthe ||
AS.Utt.30.52 saruje kaṭhine stabdhe rūkṣe śuṣyati ca vraṇe ||
AS.Utt.30.53 mārdavajananārthaṃ vraṇāvirodhi vātaghnasiddhasya sarpiṣaḥ pānam |
chinnāśca sandhayo yeṣāṃ yathoktairye ca sādhanaiḥ |
AS.Utt.30.61 jatrūrdhvaje ca śvayathau kaṇḍvāḍhye tīkṣṇanāvanam |
te vraṇe vātike yojyāḥ kaṣāyādiṣu sapptasu ||
AS.Utt.30.64 nyagrodhapadmakādyau tu paitte vargaśca pittajit |
ghanaḥ koṣṇaśca paitte tu payaḥpiṣṭo ghṛtānvitaḥ ||
rūkṣastailena vā snigdho bahalaḥ kaphaje hitaḥ ||
AS.Utt.30.68 sa kṣaudranimbapatrābhyāṃ yuktaḥ saṃśodhanaḥ param |
pūrvābhyāṃ sarpiṣā cāsau yuktaḥ syādāśu ropaṇaḥ |
AS.Utt.30.70 abadhyānāṃ calasthānāṃ śuddhānāṃ vā praduṣyatām |
AS.Utt.30.71 samānāṃ sthiramāṃsānāṃ tvaksthānāṃ cūrṇa iṣyate |
sādhitaṃ tailamājyaṃ vā tadvat kampillakena vā |
AS.Utt.30.75 kampillakaṃ viḍaṅgāni vatsakaṃ triphalā balā |
kalkairebhirghṛtaṃ siddhaṃ tailaṃ vā ropaṇaṃ param ||
AS.Utt.30.76 padmakaṃ padmakiñjalkaṃ dārvī mūrvā tilotpalam |
pralepaḥ kurute kārṣṇyaṃ sadya eva navatvaci ||
kāsīsaṃ madhukaṃ lepo vraṇe kṛṣṇe madhudrutaḥ ||
AS.Utt.30.86 kāsīsaṃ prapunāṭañca māsaṃ nyastaṃ tato bhuvi |

div.head: atha ekatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ |
div.p: vividhābhighātajanitaistu subahvākṛtibhirapi sadyovraṇairadhiṣṭhitamaṅgaṃ samāsāt trividhaṃ bhavati chinnaṃ viddhaṃ piccitaṃ ca |
etadeva caturvidhaṃ koṣṭhe pṛthumukhairvā praharaṇaiḥ kuntādibhirviddhamanubhinnaṃ bhinnottuṇḍitamatibhinnaṃ nirbhinnamiti ca saṃjñāṃ labhate ||
AS.Utt.31.5 yat punaḥ prahāreṇa pīḍanena vā gātramasthiyuktamasṛṅmajjaplutaṃ pṛthutāmāpadyate tat piccitam |
AS.Utt.31.13 iti sāptāhikaḥ proktaḥ sadyovraṇahito vidhiḥ |
AS.Utt.31.17 prāyaḥ sāmānyakarmedaṃ vakṣyate tu pṛthak pṛthak ||
AS.Utt.31.18 ghṛṣṭe rujaṃ nigṛhyāśu varṇe cūrṇāni nikṣipet |
AS.Utt.31.19 asādhyaṃ sphuṭitaṃ netramudīrṇaṃ lambate tu yat |
tato 'sya secane nasye tarpaṇe ca hitaṃ haviḥ ||
AS.Utt.31.23 karṇe sthānātucyute syūte srotastailena pūrayet ||
samaṃ niveśya badhnīyāt syūtva śīghraṃ nirantaram ||
AS.Utt.31.25 ājena sarpiṣā cātra pariṣekaḥ praśasyate |
AS.Utt.31.26 ghātaṃ śākhāsu tiryaksthaṃ gātre samyaṅniveśite |
AS.Utt.31.27 pādau vilambimuṣkasya prokṣya netre ca vāriṇā |
snehasekaṃ na kurvīta tena klidyati hi vraṇaḥ ||
AS.Utt.31.30 chinnāṃ niśśeṣataḥ śākhāṃ dagdhvā teilena yuktitaḥ |
AS.Utt.31.31 kāryaḥ śalyāhṛte viddhe kramo bhaṅgāttu piccite ||
AS.Utt.31.34 dūrāvagāḍhāḥ sūkṣmāsyā ye vraṇāḥ srutaśoṇitāḥ |
AS.Utt.31.35 bhinne koṣṭhe 'sṛjā pūrṇe mūrcchā hṛtpārśvavedanāḥ |
AS.Utt.31.38 pakvāśayasthe rudhire saśūlaṃ gauravaṃ bhavet |
kliṣṭāntraḥ saṃśaye dehī chinnāntro naiva jīvati ||
AS.Utt.31.47 prakṣālya payasā digdhaṃ tṛṇa śoṇita pāṃsubhiḥ |
AS.Utt.31.48 aṅgulyā pramṛśet kaṇṭhaṃ jalenodvejayecca tam |
AS.Utt.31.53 anuvarteta varṣaṃ ca yathoktāṃ vraṇayantraṇām ||
AS.Utt.31.54 udarānmedaso vartiṃ nirgatāṃ bhasmanā mṛdā |
AS.Utt.31.55 dṛḍhaṃ ca badhvā sūtreṇa varddhayet kuśalo bhiṣak |
AS.Utt.31.57 sakṣaudre ca vraṇe baddhe sujīrṇenne ghṛtaṃ pibet |
haridre padmabījāni sośīraṃ madhukaṃ ca taiḥ |
AS.Utt.31.61 viśliṣṭadehaṃ mathitaṃ kṣīṇaṃ marmahataṃ hatam |

div.head: atha dvātriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ |
div.p: tatra sandhimuktaṃ ṣaḍvidhamutpiṣṭaṃ viśliṣṭamavakṣiptamatikṣiptaṃ tiryakkṣiptaṃ vivartitamiti ||
AS.Utt.32.4 tasya sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ prasāraṇākuñcana vivartanākṣepaṇāśaktirugrarujatā sparśāsahiṣṇutvaṃ ca ||
AS.Utt.32.5 athotpiṣṭe svasthāna eva sandhāvubhayataḥ śopho vedanā viśeṣataśca rātrau bhavati |
tiryak kṣiptetvekasyāsthnaḥ pārśvato gamanamatyarthaṃ vedanā ca |
karkaṭakaṃ vakraṃ sthuṭitaṃ vellitamasthicchallikāśvakarṇaṃ piccitaṃ dāritaṃ cūrṇitamatipātitaṃ śeṣitaṃ majjānugatamiti ||
AS.Utt.32.7 śvayathubāhulyaṃ spandanaṃ vivartanaṃ sparśāsahiṣṇutā ca pīḍyamāne śabdaḥ srastāṅgatā vedanātipravṛttiḥ sarvāsu cāvasthāsu śarma na labhata iti sādhāraṇamasandhibhagnarūpam ||
AS.Utt.32.8 vaiśeṣikaṃ tu saṃvyūḍhamubhayatosthimadhyabhagnaṃ granthirivonnataṃ karkaṭakānukāri karkaṭakam ||
AS.Utt.32.18 kṣataṃ bhagnamunnamyamānaṃ majñi majjati majjānugatam ||
AS.Utt.32.19 eṣāmantyāni pañca kṛcchrasādhyāni kṛśātibālavṛddhāsahānāmatyāśināṃ vātātmakānāṃ kuṣṭhināmupadravavatāṃ ca ||
AS.Utt.32.20 asādhyaṃ tu bhinnaṃ kaṭīkapālaṃ sandhimuktaṃ vā jaghanamutpiṣṭaṃ kūrparo vivartitastathā lalāṭaṃ cūrṇitamasaṃśliṣṭakapālaṃ ca śiraḥ śaṃkhapṛṣṭhastanāntarabhaṅgaṃ ceti |
AS.Utt.32.25 śithilena hi hi bandhena sandhisthairyaṃ na jāyate |
prātaḥ prātaḥ pibet bhagnaḥ śītalaṃ lākṣayāyutam ||
AS.Utt.32.30 savraṇasya tu bhagnasya vraṇo madhughṛtottaraiḥ |
AS.Utt.32.35 iti bhaṅga upakrāntaḥ sthiradhātorṛtau hime |
māsaiḥ sthairyaṃ bhavet sandheryathoktaṃ bhajatāṃ vidhim ||
AS.Utt.32.44 maṇibandhe ca jānau ca gulphe caiṣaḥ kriyākramaḥ ||
AS.Utt.32.45 ubhe tale same kṛtvā talabhagnasya dohinaḥ |
AS.Utt.32.49 grīvāyāṃ tu vivṛttāyāṃ praviṣṭāyāmadhopi vā |
ghṛtaṃ vātaghnamadhuraiḥ siddhaṃ nasyaṃ ca pūjitam ||
AS.Utt.32.54 nāsāṃ vivṛttāṃ sannaṃ vā ṛjūkṛtya śalākayā |
AS.Utt.32.55 bhagnaṃ karṇaṃ ghṛtābhyaktaṃ nyasya bandhena yojayet |
yantraṇārthaṃ tataḥ kīlāḥ pañca kāryā nibandhanāḥ |
jaṅgo rupārśvayordvau dvau tala ekaśca kīlakaḥ ||
AS.Utt.32.57 śroṇyāṃ vā pṛṣṭvaṃśe vā vakṣasyakṣakayostathā |
AS.Utt.32.60 bhaṅgo naiti yathā pākaṃ prayateta tathā bhiṣak |
AS.Utt.32.63 glānirna śasyate tasya sandhiviśleṣakṛddhi sā ||
vyāyāmaṃ ca na seveta bhagno rūkṣaṃ ca bheṣajam ||
AS.Utt.32.66 taruṇāsthīni bhujyante bhajyante nalakāni tu |
avedanaṃ ca ceṣṭāyāṃ bhagnaṃ vidyāt susādhitam ||
AS.Utt.32.68 kṛṣṇāstilānvirajaso dṛḍhavastrabaddhān saptakṣapā bahati vāriṇi vāsayet |
saṃśoṣayedanudinaṃ pratisārya cainān kṣīre tathaiva madhukakvathite ca toye ||
AS.Utt.32.69 punarapi pītapayaskāṃstān pūrvavadeva śoṣitān bāḍham |

div.head: atha trayastriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ |
div.p: vātaṃ mūtraṃ śakṛcchukraṃ khaiḥ sūkṣmairvahati kramāt ||
AS.Utt.33.6 doṣaiḥ pṛthagyutaiḥ sarvairāgantuḥ so 'ṣṭamaḥ smṛtaḥ ||
AS.Utt.33.11 sthirā snigdhā mahāmūlā pāṇḍuḥkaṇḍūmatī kaphāt ||
AS.Utt.33.15 vraṇatāṃ yānti tāḥ pakvāḥ pramādāt tatra vātajā |
AS.Utt.33.18 vātapittāt parikṣepī parikṣipya gudaṃ gatiḥ |
AS.Utt.33.20 kaphapitte tu pūrvotthaṃ durnāmāśritya kupyataḥ |
AS.Utt.33.21 sa śīghraṃ pakvabhinnosya kledayan mūlamarśasaḥ |
AS.Utt.33.24 syāttadā pūyadīrṇāyāṃ māṃsakothena tatra ca |
pravāhiṇīṃ balīṃ prāptaṃ sevanīṃ vā samāśritam ||
AS.Utt.33.27 atha bhagandāriṇamapakvapiṭakaṃ pākaparihārāthamapatarpaṇena vraṇapratiṣedhavihitena śīghramupācaret ||

AS.Utt.33.28 pakvapiṭakaṃ punarupasnigdhamarkādikvāthaśuddhaṃ svabhyaktamavagāhasvinnaṃ bhuktavantaṃ śayanasthamarśasamiva yantrayitvā parācīnamarvācīnaṃ bahirmukhamantarmukhaṃ vā bhagandaraṃ samyagīkṣeta ||
AS.Utt.33.29 tato 'ntarmukhe yantraṃ prāṇidhāya pravāhaṇapraviṣṭaṃ bhagandaramabhisamīkṣya samyageṣitvā śastreṇa pāṭayet |
bahirmukhetveṣāṇīṃ praṇidhāya sāśayamuddharecchastreṇānantaraṃ co 'bhayamapyagninā kṣāreṇa copatrameta uṣṭhagrīvaṃ tu kṣāreṇaiva ||
AS.Utt.33.30 tato nirvāpaṇaśodhanaropaṇairyathākālaṃ sādhayoditi sāmānyo vidhiḥ ||
AS.Utt.33.31 atha śataponake nāḍīrekāntaritāḥ pāṭayitvā ropayet |
tatra snehābhyaktagudasya snigdhān piṇḍanāḍīkumbhīsvedān prayuñjītāvagāhaṃ vā |
svinnaṃ ca vaca hiṃgukuṣṭhavyoṣalavaṇapañcakājamodān sarpirmadyākāñjikakulatthayūṣānyatamena pāyayet |
AS.Utt.33.32 evameva ca parikṣepiṇyāmapi kramāt gatiṃ nāḍīvihitena kṣārasūtreṇa dviśastriśovāvadārayet |
AS.Utt.33.33 arśobhagandare pūrvamarśāṃsi cchindyāt tato gatyanusāreṇa bhagandaram ||
AS.Utt.33.38 yatet koṣṭhaśudhyai ca bhiṣak tasyāntarāntarā ||
AS.Utt.33.39 ārdrakasya rase siddhaṃ kalke vā pāyayet ghṛtam |
AS.Utt.33.49 guggulupañcapalaṃ palikāṃśā māgadhikā triphalā ca pṛthak syāt |
AS.Utt.33.52 bhagandareṣveṣa viśeṣa uktaḥ śeṣāṇi tu vyañjanasādhanāni |
sāhasāni vividhāni ca ruḍhe vatsaraṃ pariharedadhikaṃ vā ||

div.head: atha caturtriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ |
div.p: vṛttonnataṃ yaṃ śvayathuṃ sa granthirgrathanāt smṛtaḥ ||
AS.Utt.34.5 pittāt sadāhapītābho rakto vā pacyate drutam |
śītaḥ savarṇaḥ kaṇḍūmān pakvaḥ pūyaṃ sravet ghanam ||
AS.Utt.34.8 pravṛddhaṃ sedurairmedo nītaṃ māṃse 'tha vā tvaci |
vāyunā kurute granthiṃ bhṛśaṃ snigdhaṃ mṛduṃ calam ||
vāyuḥ sampīḍya saṅkocya vakrīkṛtya viśoṣya ca |
nisphuraṃ nīrujaṃ granthiṃ kurute sa sirāhvayaḥ ||
AS.Utt.34.12 arūḍhe rūḍhamātre vā vraṇe sarvarasāśinaḥ |
AS.Utt.34.13 vāto 'sramasrutaṃ duṣṭaṃ saṃśoṣya grathitaṃ vraṇam |
AS.Utt.34.14 sādhyā doṣāsramedojā na tu sthūlakharāścalāḥ |
AS.Utt.34.15 tallakṣaṇaṃ ca medontaiḥ ṣoḍhā doṣādibhistu tat |
AS.Utt.34.16 sirāsthaṃ śoṇitaṃ doṣaḥ saṅkocyānuprapīḍya ca |
AS.Utt.34.17 māṃsāṅkkuraiścitaṃ yāti vṛddhiṃ cāśu sravettataḥ |
śanaiḥ śanairghanaṃ śophaṃ ślīpadaṃ taṃ pracakṣate ||
rūkṣaṃ ca vātāt pittāttu pītaṃ dāhajvarānvitam ||
ślīpadaṃ jāyate tacca deśe 'nūpe bhṛśaṃ bhramāt ||
AS.Utt.34.28 gatiḥ sā dūragamanānnāḍī nāḍīva saṃsruteḥ |
AS.Utt.34.32 antaḥsthitaṃ śalyamanāhṛtaṃ tu karoti nāḍīṃ vahate ca sāsya |
phenānuviddhaṃ tanumalpamuṣṇaṃ sāsra ca pūyaṃ sarujaṃ ca nityam ||

div.head: atha pañcatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ |
div.p: AS.Utt.35.2 sarveṣveva pūrvaṃ granthiṣu bṛhatīdvayapippalīcitrakasādhitena purāṇasapiṃṣā snigdhaṃ vāmayet |
kṛtasaṃsarjanasyacottamāṅgagateṣu granthiṣu lākṣādvirajanīviḍaṅgaśuṇṭhīpūtīdārubhiḥ śiro virecayet dhūmakavalagaṇḍūṣāṃśca sa seveta ||
bahuśaḥ svinnamaṅguṣṭhena veṇuparvaṇā vā śanaiśśanaiḥ punaḥ punarvimardayet |
AS.Utt.35.6 atha vātaje granthau daśamūlasiddhaṃ mahāsnehaṃ pibet |
AS.Utt.35.7 pakvaṃ tu vidārya nirastapūyaṃ kṛtvārkādivargāmbhasā prakṣālya tilakalkena sacitrakasaindhavenālepayet |
AS.Utt.35.8 pittaje raktaje ca jalaukaso nyagrodhādiḥ pradehapariṣekayoḥ padmakādiḥ pāne ca drākṣekṣurasayuktā harītakī virekaḥ |
AS.Utt.35.10 evamapyapacyamānamamarmasthaṃ vidārya sthitaraktaṃ niśśeṣamagninā dahet |
medojepyayameva vidhiḥ api ca medogranthiṃ tilakalkadigdhaṃ dviguṇapaṭāntaritaṃ taptena phālena darvyā vā jatuliptayā bahuśaḥ pramṛjyāt |
AS.Utt.35.13 sirāgranthau tvabhinave tailaṃ sāhacaraṃ pibet upanāhañca vātaharairbastikarma ca kuryāt |
AS.Utt.35.15 pittotthe mṛdūn svedopanāhān kāyavirecanañca prayojayet |
AS.Utt.35.16 śleṣmaje tūrdhvamadhaśca hṛtadoṣasya srutaraktasya ca vamanavirecanadravyaiḥ pralepaḥ |
lepāsvādalobhena ca nilīyamānā makṣikāḥ sa mupekṣeta |
sarvārbudāni ca yadṛcchayā paryāgatāni supariśodhitāni ropayet |
AS.Utt.35.18 saśeṣadoṣāṇi tu yorbudāni karoti tasyāśu punarbhavanti |
tasmādaśeṣoddharaṇaṃ praśastaṃ kṣāreṇa śastreṇa tathāgninā vā ||
AS.Utt.35.19 ślīpade tu vātātmake snehasvedopanāhān prayujya gulphasyopariṣṭādvyaṅgule sirāṃ vidhyet |
AS.Utt.35.20 paittike mṛdurupanāho gulphasyādhaḥ sirāmokṣaḥ pittārbudoktāḥ snehavirekāḥ pittaghnāśca lepāḥ ||
AS.Utt.35.22 ādārīkākajaṃghākākādanīśukanāsākadambapuṣpabṛhatīdvayamantardhūmaṃ dagdhvā gomūtreṇa bahuśaḥ parisrāvayet tatastat kṣārodakaṃ kṣārakalpena vipacet |
dadyāccātra paratīvāpaṃ phalguśukākhyā madanaphalarasaṃ eṣa kṣāro madhurāhāreṇābhyastaḥ ślīpadāpacīgrahaṇīdoṣārocakān sarvaviṣāṇi ca niyacchati ||
AS.Utt.35.25 saśeṣadoṣaṃ tu kauṣṭhikaṃ navakaṃ pāyayet |
madhūkasāraṃ vā śigruphalāni vā nimbakarañjakaravīrasiddhaṃ vā tailaṃ vairecanikañca dhūmaṃ pibet ||
AS.Utt.35.29 amarmajāṃśca gaṇḍānapakvānevodbhṛtyāgninā kṣāreṇa vā prasādhayet |
māṃsīsarjarasakārpāsīphalasaindhavaiḥ stanyapiṣṭaistailaṃ vipakvamabhyaṅgo vraṇakāṭhinyaghnaḥ sarpājagaravase tailaṃ ca samaṃ trayametadapacīghnam |
AS.Utt.35.30 evamanupaśame vāmapārśvajāyāṃ dakṣiṇajaṅghāpṛṣṭhamadhyādindrabasteradhaḥ ūrdhvaṃ vā śastreṇākṣimātraṃ vraṇaṃ kṛtvā matsyāṇḍajālanibhaṃ medopanīyāgninā dahet |
AS.Utt.35.34 śalyahetukīṃ pāṭayitvā sarvaśaḥ śalyaṃ viśodhya madhughṛtatilakalkapraticchannāṃ badhnīyāt |
AS.Utt.35.35 aśastrakṛtyāṃ nāḍyāṃ bhedinyaiṣiṇyānte samudbhidya kṣārāktaṃ sūtraṃ praveśayet |
tadasannidhānetvitarayaiṣiṇyā ca tenānavadīrṇāyāṃ tadanusyūtamanyadanyat kṣārasūtraṃ sañcārayedā gatibhedādayamanapāyo 'bhyupāyaḥ |
sūkṣmānekagatiṣu bhagandareṣu mūleṣu ca chidriteṣu granthyarbudeṣviti |
yā vartyo yāni tailāni tannāḍīṣvapi kalpayet ||
varāhaviṣṭhā ca maṣī sudagdhā tailaplutā sarvagatīrnihanti ||
AS.Utt.35.38 dhattūrakaṃ madanakodravajañca bījaṃ kośātakī śukanasā mṛgabhojanī ca |
aṅkolajañca kusumaṃ parikalpya cūrṇaṃ lākṣodakāpahṛtadoṣagatau prayojyam ||
AS.Utt.35.39 miśritaṃ tena tailañca paramaṃ gatiropaṇam |
sauvaheṣu ca kandeṣu kṛtaṃ vajrāhvayeṣu ca ||

div.head: atha ṣaṭtriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ |
div.p: AS.Utt.36.2 snigdhāḥ savarṇā grathitā nīrujā mudgasannibhāḥ |
AS.Utt.36.3 yavaprakhyā yavaprakhyā tābhyāṃ māṃsāśritā ghanā |
granthayaḥ pañca vā ṣaḍvā kacchapī kacchaponnatāḥ ||
medogarbhā mukhe śūnāṃ tābhyāṃ ca mukhadūṣikā ||
AS.Utt.36.6 te padmakaṇṭakā jñeyā yaiḥ padmamiva kaṇṭakaiḥ |
AS.Utt.36.9 tataḥ kaṣṭatarāḥ sphoṭā visphoṭākhyā mahārujāḥ ||
sā viddhā vātapittābhyāṃ tābhyāmeva ca gardabhī ||
AS.Utt.36.12 kakṣyeti kakṣāsanneṣu prāyo deśeṣu sānilāt |
pittāt bhavanti piṭakāḥ sūkṣmā lājopamā ghanāḥ |
AS.Utt.36.15 malaiḥ pittolbaṇaiḥ sphoṭā jvariṇo māṃsadāraṇāḥ |
durgandhiṃ rudhiraṃ klinnaṃ nānāvarṇaṃ tato malāḥ |
AS.Utt.36.21 śarkaronmathite pāde kṣate vā kaṇṭakādibhiḥ |
AS.Utt.36.23 kuryāt pittānilaṃ pākaṃ nakhamāṃse sarugjvaram |
AS.Utt.36.26 kṛṣṇaṃ sitaṃ vā sahajaṃ maṇḍalaṃ lāñchanaṃ samam ||
AS.Utt.36.28 paruṣaṃ paruṣasparśaṃ vyaṅgaṃ śyāvaṃ ca mārutāt |
AS.Utt.36.29 vāyunodīritaḥ śleṣmā tvacaṃ prāpya viśuṣyati |

div.head: atha saptatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ |
div.p: AS.Utt.37.6 padmakaṇṭakeṣu nimbāmbuvāntaṃ nimbodakasiddhaṃ sarpiḥ sakṣaudraṃ pāyayet |
AS.Utt.37.9 agnirohiṇīmapi pratyākhyāya pittavisarpadupācaret pakvāṃ tu madhuravargasiddhena sarpiṣāṃ ropayet ||
pakvāṃ śastreṇa vidārya nimbatilapaṭolakalkena pracchādya badhnīyāt |
AS.Utt.37.12 balmīkaṃ hastasya pādasya copariṣṭānmarmaṇi vā jātaṃ pravṛddhamatibahucchidrāvṛtaṃ saśophaṃ ca varjayet ||
AS.Utt.37.13 atonyathā tu prāk kṛtaśuddheḥ śoṇitamapaharet |
AS.Utt.37.14 pakve tu sarvāṃ gatiṃ duṣṭamāṃsāni ca śastreṇa samyakśodhayitvāgninā kṣāreṇa vā dahet ||
AS.Utt.37.15 suśuddhe tu vraṇe bhallātakamanaśśilālailākālānusāryagarucandanairnimbatailaṃ ropaṇārthaṃ śrapayet ||
AS.Utt.37.22 tilakālakān maṣāṃśca sūryakāntenāgninā vā dahet kṣāreṇa vā |
tenaiva vā bālāmalakaṃ gomūtreṇa saptāhaṃ sthitam |

AS.Utt.37.25 tatrāpi vātajeṣu devadārudurālabhābṛhatīmañjiṣṭhāmūrvāpāmārgatrāyantītrāyamāṇāśukanasābalāvidārīyavabadarakulatthabilvotpalaśatāvarīdarbhamūlakvāthe śṛṅgīviḍaṅgagarbhaṃ ghṛtaṃ vipakvamadhobhaktaṃ pānamabhyaṅgaṃ nāvanaṃ ca sāyaṃ yojayet ||
AS.Utt.37.27 paitteṣu balāmadhukamāgadhikākṣīrakākolīsvaguptāphalakākamācītugāhvābhiḥ sapayaḥ sarpiḥ siddhaṃ pūrvavat prayojayet ||
AS.Utt.37.35 utkoṭhe pittaśleṣmaharo vidhiḥ sakṣāralavaṇaṃ ca tailamabhyaṅgaḥ |

div.head: atha aṣṭatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ |
div.p: AS.Utt.38.8 śleṣmaṇā kaṭhinaḥ snigdhaḥ kaṇḍūmāñchītalo guruḥ ||
AS.Utt.38.15 piṭakā bahavo dīrghā dīryante madhyataśca yāḥ |
AS.Utt.38.19 mṛditaṃ mṛditaṃ vastu saṃrabdhaṃ vātakopataḥ ||
AS.Utt.38.20 viṣamā kaṭhinā bhugnā vāyunāṣṭhīlikā smṛtā ||
nivartate sarugdāhaṃ kvacit pākaṃ ca gacchati ||
AS.Utt.38.24 vātena dūṣitaṃ carma maṇau saktaṃ ruṇaddhi cet |
AS.Utt.38.32 kṛṣṇāni bhūtvā māṃsāni viśīryante samantataḥ |
bhraṃśaṃ vaṅkṣaṇapārśvādau vyathāṃ gulmaṃ krameṇa ca |
tāṃstāṃśca svān gadān vyāpadvātikī nāma sā smṛtā ||
AS.Utt.38.40 iyaṃ vyāpadudāvṛttā jātaghnī tu yadānilaḥ |
AS.Utt.38.41 atyāśitāyā viṣamaṃ sthitāyāḥ surate marut |
vamet saruṅnīrujo vā yasyāṃ sā vāminī matā ||
AS.Utt.38.46 duṣṭo viṣṭabhya yonyāsyaṃ garbhakoṣṭhaṃ ca mārutaḥ |
AS.Utt.38.54 upaplutā smṛtā yoniḥ viplatākhyā tvadhāvanāt |
AS.Utt.38.57 iti yonigadā nārī yaiḥ śukraṃ na pratīcchati |
tato garbhaṃ na nṛhṇaṇāti rogāṃścāpnoti dāruṇān |

div.head: atha ekonacatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ |
div.p: AS.Utt.39.2 upadaṃśeṣūtpannamātreṣu pākaparihārārthaṃ meḍhramadhye sirāṃ vidhyet |
AS.Utt.39.6 tvacaḥ kṣīridrumāṇāṃ ca triphalāṃ ca pacejjale |
sa kvāthaḥ kṣālanaṃ tena pakvaṃ tailaṃ ca ropaṇam |
AS.Utt.39.9 kapāle triphalādagdhā saghṛtā ropaṇī param ||
AS.Utt.39.10 sāmānyaṃ sādhanamidaṃ vātikaṃ tu pralepayet |
AS.Utt.39.16 na ca yāti yathā pākaṃ prayateta tathā bhṛśam |
pakvaiḥ snāyusirāmāṃsaiḥ prāyo naśyati hi dhvajaḥ ||
AS.Utt.39.18 arśāṃsi yathāyogaṃ śuddhadehasya śastrakṣārāgnibhiḥ sādhayet |
AS.Utt.39.23 uttamāṃ piṭakāṃ śastreṇa cchitvā kaṣāyacūrṇapradehairmadhumādbhirupācaret ||
tato bhūyaḥ svedayitvā ghṛtenābhyajya śanaiḥ śanaiścarma samānayan maṇimavapīḍayet |
AS.Utt.39.29 niruddhamaṇau suvarṇādikṛtāṃ dārujāṃ vā jatusṛtāṃ nāḍīmubhayatodvārāṃ snehābhyaktāṃ srotasi praṇidhāya sūkaraśiṃśumārayorvasayāmajjñā vā pariṣecayet |
tṛtīye tṛtīye cāhani nāḍīṃ pīnatarāṃ vidadhyāt |
evamasya srotodvāraṃ vivardhayet snigdhaṃ cāhāraṃ bhojayet |
evamanupaśāntau śastreṇa sevanīṃ parihṛtya dārayitvā sadyaḥkṣatavadupācaret ||
vidāryādisiddhena ca tailena ropayet śarkarārbude raktavidradhivat sādhanam ||
AS.Utt.39.32 yonivyāpadi tu vātikyāṃ lavaṇatailāktāṃ yoniṃ piṇḍanāḍīkumbhīprabhṛprabhṛtibhiḥ svedayet |

AS.Utt.39.33 balādroṇadvayaniryūhe payasyāsālaparṇīmāgadhikāśatāvarīkākanāsāśrāvaṇīśarkarājīvanīyagarbhaṃ kṣīracaturguṇaṃ ghṛtatailāḍhakaṃ sādhayet tatpānāt sarvān vātapittavikārānapohati garbhajananaṃ ca ||
AS.Utt.39.34 śatāvarītriphalāguḍūcīkāśmaryamṛdvīkākāsamardakaparūṣakaharidrādvayasahacaraśukanāsāpunarnavaiḥ kārṣikairghṛtaprasthaḥ siddhaḥ pīto vātajān yonirogānapohati garbhajananaśca ||
AS.Utt.39.35 saindhavavacopakuñcikāpippalīvṛṣakayavakṣārājamodājājīsitopalācitrakacūrṇo madirālulitaḥ sarpiṣā saṃyāvīkṛtya bhakṣito yonipārśvabāstivedanārśogulmahṛdrogaharaḥ ||
tenaivacārjakamūlaṃ bilvayuktaṃ vā pippalī yuktaṃ vā |
AS.Utt.39.38 kuṣṭhatagaradevadāruvārtākinīsaindhavaiḥ sādhitaṃ tailaṃ picunā dhārayet ||
AS.Utt.39.39 rāsnāmālatīcchinnaruhāmadhukabalāvyāghrīdevadārucitrakayūthikāmūlaiḥ karṣāṃśaistailaprasthaḥ samūtro dviguṇapayasā vipakvaḥ picunā praṇīto 'nilārtiharaḥ ||
AS.Utt.39.40 bastikarma cābhīṣṇaṃ svedaṃ ca prayojayedviśeṣato vātaharaiḥ sukumārabalātailaśirīṣatailaiḥ śatapākasahasra pākaiścānuvāsanamuttarabastiṃ ca |
AS.Utt.39.44 dhārayecca viplutāyāṃ gomatsyānyatarapittenaikaviṃśatikṛtvo bhāvitān kṣaumanaktakān kiṇvaṃ vā mākṣikayuktamevamasyāḥ srotāṃsi viśudhyanti kaṇḍūkledaśophāśca nivartante ||
AS.Utt.39.46 udāvṛttāyāmānūpamāṃsarasāḥ kṣīraṃ svedo daśamūlatrivṛtākvāthakalkāsiddhaśca snehaḥ pānānuvāsanottarabastiṣu |
AS.Utt.39.49 śleṣmalāsu ca rūkṣoṣṇaṃ karma kuryādyathāyatham |
sannipāte vimiśraṃ tu saṃsṛṣṭāsu ca kārayet ||
AS.Utt.39.50 snigdhasvinnāṃ tathā yoniṃ duḥsthitāṃ sthāpayet samām |
pāṇinā namayet jihmāṃ saṃvṛtāṃ prathayet punaḥ ||
AS.Utt.39.53 sarvataḥ suviśuddhāyāḥ śeṣaṃ karma vidhīyate |
AS.Utt.39.59 yacca vātavikārāṇāṃ karmoktaṃ tacca kārayet |
śītāḥ pittajitaḥ kāryāḥ snehanārthaṃ ghṛtāni ca ||
AS.Utt.39.64 siddhaśīte tu madhunaḥ pippalyāśca palāṣṭakam |
garbhadaṃ pittajānāṃ ca rogāṇāṃ paramaṃ hitam ||
AS.Utt.39.69 tilacūrṇaṃ dadhi ghṛtaṃ phāṇitaṃ saukarī vasā |
AS.Utt.39.70 varāhasya raso medhyaḥ sakaulatthaśca tadguṇaḥ |
satārkṣyaśailaṃ lākṣāṃ vā chāgena payasā pibet |
AS.Utt.39.73 madhukaṃ triphalāṃ lodhraṃ mustaṃ saurāṣṭrikāṃ madhu |
doṣā jantukṛtā ye ca bālānāṃ tāṃśca nāśayet ||
AS.Utt.39.80 raktakṣayāyāṃ kṣīraṃ ca jīvanīyaśṛtaṃ pibet ||
AS.Utt.39.81 yonyāṃ balāsaduṣṭāyāṃ vartiḥ saṃśodhane hitā |
AS.Utt.39.87 picchilā vivṛtā yoniściraduṣṭā tu dāruṇā |
tailaṃ kvāthena tasyaiva kāryaṃ dhāryaṃ ca pūrvavat ||
AS.Utt.39.95 yavānnamabhayāriṣṭaṃ sīdhu tailaṃ ca śīlayet |
AS.Utt.39.97 madhunāmalakīcūrṇaṃ rasaṃ vā prāśayet site |
AS.Utt.39.98 āsrāve kṣaumapaṭṭān vā bhāvitāṃstena dhārayet |
dhāryā madhukṛtā vartiḥ kaṣāyāṇāṃ ca bhūriśaḥ ||
AS.Utt.39.101 kāsīsaṃ triphalā kāṅkṣī sāmrajambvasthi ghātakī |
AS.Utt.39.103 stabdhānāṃ karkaśānāṃ ca kāryaṃ mādarvakārakam |
AS.Utt.39.104 durgandhānāṃ kaṣāyaḥ syāttailaṃ vā kalka eva vā |
AS.Utt.39.105 śleṣmalānāṃ kaṭuprāyāḥ samūtrā bastayo hitāḥ |
AS.Utt.39.106 evaṃ yoniṣu śuddhāsu garbhaṃ vindanti yoṣitaḥ |
dve niśe madhukaṃ medā dīpyakaḥ kaṭurohiṇī ||
āyuṣyaṃ pauṣṭikaṃ medhyaṃ dhanyaṃ puṃsavanaṃ param ||
AS.Utt.39.111 phalasarpiriti khyātaṃ puṣpe pītaṃ phalāya yat |

div.head: atha catvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ |
div.p: AS.Utt.40.2 purā khalvamṛtārthaṃ surāsuraiḥ salilanidhervimathyamānāt krodha iva rūpavān satvaṃ samudvabhūva kṛṣṇamanalanayanamūrdhvapradīptakeśaṃ daṃṣṭrākarālaṃ bhairavārāvarūpam |
AS.Utt.40.3 tat sahasaiva sarvabhūtāni nirdagdhukāmamupayogaviśeṣairviṣamamṛtatāṃ vinayamāno brahmānunīyauṣadhiṣu nyastavān ||
AS.Utt.40.5 jaṅgamaṃ punaḥ pṛthivyā bhārāvatārārthamuragādirūpeṇa viṣṇurnirmame ||
sarvameva ca sthāvaraṃ jvarahidhmādantaharṣahanustambhagalagrahaphenavamanāruciśvāsamūrcchāḥ karoti viśeṣeṇa kandajam |
AS.Utt.40.11 sarvaṃ ca prāyaśo jaṅgamaṃ nidrātandrāklamadāharomaharṣaśophapākātisārān karoti ||
AS.Utt.40.13 tatra taikṣṇyauṣṇyāt pittaṃ raktaṃ ca prakopayati |
ata eva ca prayatnenānnāni viṣato rakṣedityuktam |
AS.Utt.40.14 sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ ceti viṣaṃ proktamakṛtrimam ||
AS.Utt.40.15 kṛtrimaṃ garasaṃjñaṃ tu kriyate vividhauṣadhaiḥ |
AS.Utt.40.16 api caitadviṣaṃ sarvaṃ tīkṣṇādyairanvitaṃ guṇaiḥ |
AS.Utt.40.17 viṣaṃ hi dehaṃ samprāpya prāgdūṣayati śoṇitam |
AS.Utt.40.18 śarīraṃ dūṣite rakte sarvaṃ cimicimāyate |
AS.Utt.40.21 viṣaṃ yaddoṣabhūyiṣṭhaṃ taṃ doṣaṃ prāk prapadyate |
AS.Utt.40.23 tatrāpi cottamāṅgasthe sakoṭhaṃ śūyate śiraḥ |
AS.Utt.40.25 vyāpyaivaṃ sakalaṃ dehamuparudhya ca vāhinīḥ |
daṃśe tiṣṭhati bhūyiṣṭhaṃ sarvataḥ piṇḍitaṃ viṣam |
AS.Utt.40.27 yathāsvaṃ bhakṣite pīḍā yathāsvaṃ ca kriyākramaḥ ||
AS.Utt.40.32 duṣyati prathame raktaṃ dvitīye śvayathūdbhavaḥ |
AS.Utt.40.33 pañcame pāṇḍujihvāsya śoṣaḥ ṣaṣṭhe hṛdi vyathā |
saptame maraṇaṃ vega iti gagnajito matam ||
AS.Utt.40.34 mūrcchā hṛdi paraṃ pīḍā śirorugapatantrakaḥ |
AS.Utt.40.37 dhātvantareṣu yāḥ sapta kalāḥ pūrvaṃ prakīrttitāḥ |
AS.Utt.40.39 muninā yena yattūktaṃ tatsarvamiha darśitam ||
AS.Utt.40.40 jīrṇaṃ viṣaghnauṣadhibhirhataṃ vā davāgnivātātapaśoṣitaṃ vā |
svabhāvato vā na guṇaiḥ suyuktaṃ dūṣīviṣākhyāṃ viṣamabhyupaiti ||
bhavennaro dhvasthīśaroruhāṅgo vilūnapakṣaḥ sa yathā vihaṅgaḥ |
jihvāyāḥ śyāvatā stambho mūrcchā trāsaḥ klamo vamiḥ ||
AS.Utt.40.46 dvitīye vepathuḥ svedo kaṇṭhe ca vedanāḥ |
viṣaṃ cāmāśayaṃ prāptaṃ kurute hṛdi vedanām ||
AS.Utt.40.47 tāluśoṣastṛtīye tu śūlaṃ cāmāśaye bhṛśam |
durbale harite śūne jāyete cāsya locane ||
AS.Utt.40.52 dvitīye pūrvavadvāntaṃ viriktaṃ cānu pāyayet |
mūrdhni kākapadaṃ kṛtvā sāsṛgvā piśitaṃ kṣipet ||
AS.Utt.40.56 eṣāṃ yavāgūṃ niryūhe śītāṃ saghṛtamākṣikām |
AS.Utt.40.58 agadān vakṣyate cātaḥ siddhān pūrvarṣinirmitān |
sarveṣu sarvāvastheṣu ye viṣeṣu paraṃ hitāḥ ||
AS.Utt.40.59 candanaṃ kuṅkumaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ kāṅkṣī lākṣā priyaṅgavaḥ |
AS.Utt.40.68 candanaṃ vālakaṃ mustaṃ dhyāmakaṃ kaṭukā natam |
AS.Utt.40.72 karkaṭī pūtanā keśī śvetā ca girikarṇikā |
AS.Utt.40.73 śrīveṣṭakaṃ haridre dve kovidāraṃ manaḥśilām |
pippalīṃ pāṭalīṃ padmāṃ śvetāṃ ca girikarṇikām |
AS.Utt.40.74 phalīnīṃ kiṇihīṃ ceti gavāṃ pittena bhāvayet |
sūryodayo hanti viṣaṃ tamaḥ sūryodayo yathā ||
AS.Utt.40.78 priyaṅgu tagaraṃ lākṣā mañjiṣṭhā madhukaṃ madhu |
raktā nataṃ vacā dantī śivaḥ śivakṛto 'gadaḥ ||
AS.Utt.40.88 surālā pāvakī somā bhogavatyamṛtā natam |
AS.Utt.40.94 śvetā vacā hiṅgvamṛtā sugandhā kuṣṭhasaindhavam |
AS.Utt.40.99 śvitraṃ kṛcchrāṇi kuṣṭhāni duṣṭanāḍī mahāvraṇān |
eṣa māheśvaro yogo na kvacit pratihanyate ||
AS.Utt.40.107 śūyate pacyate sadyo gatvā māṃsaṃ ca kṛṣṇatām |
AS.Utt.40.111 saubhāgyārthaṃ striyo bhartre rājñe vārāticoditāḥ |
viṣāṇāṃ cālpavīryāṇāṃ yogo gara iti smṛtaḥ ||
AS.Utt.40.116 manyate kṛṣṇamātmānaṃ gauro gauraṃ ca kālakaḥ |
AS.Utt.40.118 garārto vāntavān bhuktvā tatpathyaṃ pānabhojanam |
AS.Utt.40.127 haridrāṃ nākulīṃ jātīṃ pṛthakpiṣṭvā vipācayet |
AS.Utt.40.129 nāgadantī trivṛddantī dravantī snukpayaḥ palaiḥ |
AS.Utt.40.131 viḍaṅgaṃ candanaṃ patraṃ priyaṅgurdhyāmakaṃ balā |
AS.Utt.40.132 eṣāṃ kalkairghṛtaṃ siddhamajeyaṃ nāma viśrutam |
AS.Utt.40.138 rajanyau lodhramakṣāṃśaṃ piṣṭvā sādhyaṃ ghṛtāḍhakam |
AS.Utt.40.141 bhakṣite haritāle tu hṛdi dāhorasāgrahaḥ |
AS.Utt.40.142 vibhajya yojayet ūrdhvamadhaḥ saṃśodhitaṃ ca tam |
AS.Utt.40.149 harītakī salavaṇā māgadhī maricāni ca |
AS.Utt.40.150 yuñjyādvā viṣarogeṣu reke vyoṣādikaṃ bhiṣak ||
AS.Utt.40.151 taruṇasya palāśasya srutaṃ kṣārodakaṃ pacet |
AS.Utt.40.152 vyoṣaṃ śirīṣakusumaṃ madhukaṃ sārive misim |
AS.Utt.40.155 pāṇḍuṃ kaṇṭhasvaragadān plīhānaṃ śvayathuṃ kṛmīn |
AS.Utt.40.157 na tu sarvamanuṣyāṇāṃ santi bheṣajasampadaḥ |
AS.Utt.40.159 te 'pi ca vratahīnasya hīnā vā svaravarṇataḥ |
AS.Utt.40.168 nāghṛtaṃ sraṃsanaṃ śastaṃ pralepo bhojyamauṣadham |
AS.Utt.40.172 mūrdhniṃ kākapadaṃ kṛtvā kalkaṃ carmakasodbhavam |
AS.Utt.40.173 āśaye yasya doṣasya viṣaṃ tiṣṭhati taṃ punaḥ |
svedo vātāśaye dadhnā pānaṃ ca natakuṣṭhayoḥ ||
AS.Utt.40.178 valayā somarājyā vā pacet pāṭalayāthavā |

div.head: atha ekacatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ |
div.p: divyā garjanti varṣanti dyotante dyotayanti te ||
AS.Utt.41.10 godhāsutastu gaudhero viṣe darvīkaraiḥ samaḥ ||
AS.Utt.41.14 prāyeṇartumatī māsaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ tiṣṭhati pannagī |
AS.Utt.41.15 dveśate viṃśatī dve ca sā sūte tatra jāyate |
AS.Utt.41.18 tāḥ kramānmudgamātrotrabinduḥ eṣa hi bhoginām |
AS.Utt.41.21 āyatā capalā klībaḥ sukumāro jaḍākṛtiḥ |
AS.Utt.41.25 kṣatriyā mānino dhīrā raktākṣā bhṛśakopanāḥ |
astaṃgate ravau śūdrāḥ daśanti brāhmaṇāḥ puraḥ |
saṃsthitā dakṣiṇe pārśve kṣatriyā vāmato viśaḥ ||
AS.Utt.41.37 ekaṃ daṃṣṭrāpadaṃ dve vā vyālīḍhākhyamaśoṇitam |
daṃṣṭrāpade sarakte dve vyāluptaṃ trīṇi tāni tu ||
AS.Utt.41.40 viṣaṃ nāheyamaprāpya raktaṃ dūṣayate vapuḥ |
kadācit kurute śophaṃ sarpāṅgābhihataṃ tu tat ||
AS.Utt.41.43 daṃāstu saviṣaḥ sarvaḥ saśopho vedanānvitaḥ |
tudyate grathitaḥ kiñcit kaṇḍūmān dahyate bhṛśam |
AS.Utt.41.49 daṃśo maṇḍalināṃ soṣmā saśoṣaḥ pītalohitaḥ |
AS.Utt.41.58 bālena śīghraṃ tīkṣṇāśca kumāreṇākṣṇi dakṣiṇe |
rogī kumāryā vāme tu garbhiṇyā kṛṣṇajihvadṛk ||
AS.Utt.41.59 jṛmbhā krodhopajihvārtaḥ sa śūnoṣṭhaḥ sitānanaḥ |
śyāvatā tena vaktrādau sarpantīva ca kīṭakāḥ ||
AS.Utt.41.62 dvitīye granthayo vege tṛtīye mūrddhagauravam |
dāho hidhmā ca ṣaṣṭhe tu hṛtpīḍā gātragauravam ||
AS.Utt.41.66 tṛtīye daṃśavikledaḥ svedastṛṣṇā ca jāyete |
AS.Utt.41.67 dajṭasya rājilairduṣṭaṃ pāṇḍutāṃ yāti śoṇitam |
pāṇḍutā tena gātrāṇāṃ dvitīye gurutāti ca ||
AS.Utt.41.69 kuryāt pañcasu vegeṣu cikitsāṃ na tataḥ param ||
AS.Utt.41.74 raktāsyanayanā ye ca te syurāśīviṣopamāḥ |
na teṣāṃ kālaniyamo na ca vegeṣvanukramaḥ ||
nairṛtākhye muhūrte ca daṣṭaṃ marmasu ca tyajet ||
AS.Utt.41.79 hidhmā śvāso vamiḥ kāso daṣṭamātrasya dehinaḥ |
jāyate yugapadyasya sa hṛcchūlī na jīvati ||
raktaṃ khebhyaḥ samastebhyo vartate na tu daṃśataḥ ||
AS.Utt.41.85 na nasyaiścetanā tīkṣṇairna kṣatāt kṣatajāgamaḥ |
AS.Utt.41.86 atonyathā tu tvarayā pradīptāgāravad bhiṣak |
rakṣan kaṇṭhagatān prāṇān viṣamāśu śamaṃ nayet ||

div.head: dvicatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ |
div.p: AS.Utt.42.2 mātrāśataṃ viṣaṃ sthitvā daṃśe daṣṭasya dehinaḥ |
kuryācchīghraṃ yathā dehe viṣavallī na rohati ||
loṣṭaṃ mahīṃ vā daśanaiśchitvā vānu sasambhramam ||
aśaktaḥ śithilo rodhduṃ viṣaṃ deśāntaraṃ vrajat ||
AS.Utt.42.7 ambuvat setubandhena bandhena stabhyate viṣam |
karoti bhasmasāt sadyo vahniḥ ki nāma na kṣaṇāt ||
AS.Utt.42.12 viṣe pravisṛte vidhyet sirāṃ sā paramā kriyā ||
AS.Utt.42.13 rakte nirddriyamāṇe hi kṛtsnaṃ nirddriyate viṣam |
AS.Utt.42.17 śoṇitaṃ srutaśeṣaṃ ca pravilīnaṃ viṣoṣmaṇā |
AS.Utt.42.19 viṣaṃ karṣati tīkṣṇatvāddhṛdayaṃ tasya guptaye |
aikadhyaṃ pañcagavyaṃ vā dadhi gairikavāri vā ||
AS.Utt.42.33 sakṣaudro himavān nāma hanti maṇḍalināṃ viṣam |
mañjiṣṭhāṃ madhukaṃ ceti daṣṭo maṇḍalinā pibet ||
AS.Utt.42.38 pibet purāṇaṃ ca ghṛtaṃ varācūrṇāvacūrṇitam |
AS.Utt.42.42 gṛhadhūmaṃ haridre dve samūlaṃ taṇḍulīyakam |
AS.Utt.42.43 raktaṃ māṃsaṃ ca godhāyāḥ śuṣkaṃ cūrṇīkṛtaṃ hitam |
AS.Utt.42.46 śirogate viṣe mūlaṃ nasyakarmaṇi yojayet |
saindhavaṃ cāñjanaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ gavāṃ pittena kalkitam ||
pippalīṃ ca samaṃ piṣṭvā gavyapittena pāyayet ||
AS.Utt.42.56 jayet saṅkrāmaṇairāśu viṣaṃ śirasi saṃśritam |
AS.Utt.42.58 tīkṣṇanasyāñjanānte ca bhūrimātraṃ pibet ghṛtam |
viṣaṃ hi netraṃ rūkṣasya tīkṣṇairhanti samīritam ||
AS.Utt.42.60 dhāmārgavaḥ śakrayavāḥ sarṣapā madanaṃ madhu |
AS.Utt.42.67 śayānaḥ śayane chidre virecyo viṣapīḍitaḥ |
AS.Utt.42.69 atha darvīkṛtāṃ vege pūrve visrāvya śoṇitam |
AS.Utt.42.70 dvitīye vamanaṃ kṛtvā tadvadevāgadaṃ pibet |
AS.Utt.42.71 pibeccaturthe pūrvoktāṃ yavāgūṃ vamane kṛte |
AS.Utt.42.73 kṛtvāvagāḍhaṃ śastreṇa mūrdhni kākapadaṃ tataḥ |
māṃsaṃ sarudhiraṃ tasya carma vā tatra nikṣipet ||
AS.Utt.42.74 tṛtīye vāmitaḥ peyāṃ vege maṇḍalināṃ pibet |
AS.Utt.42.75 ādyevagāḍhaṃ pracchāya vege daṣṭasya rājilaiḥ |
AS.Utt.42.76 ṣaṣṭhe vegeñjanaṃ tīkṣṇamavapīḍaṃ ca yojayet |
AS.Utt.42.77 garbhiṇībālavṛddheṣu mṛdu vidhyet sirāñca na ||
AS.Utt.42.78 tvaṅmanohvā niśe vakraṃ rasaḥ śārdūlajo nakhaḥ |
AS.Utt.42.81 sinduvāraḥ sitaḥ śuṇṭhī dhyāmakaṃ lavaṇottamam |
AS.Utt.42.83 lodhraṃ śirīṣaṣuṣpāṇi samaṅgā hiṅgu reṇukāḥ |
jyotiṣmatī nataṃ kuṣṭhaṃ śvetā ca girikarṇikā ||
AS.Utt.42.85 cūrṇitaḥ kanyayā kṣaudragopittābhyāṃ ca vartitaḥ |
AS.Utt.42.87 bilvasya mūlaṃ surasasya puṣpaṃ phalaṃ karañjasya nataṃ surāhvam |
phalatrayaṃ vyoṣaniśādvayaṃ ca bastasya mūtreṇa susūkṣmapiṣṭam ||
maṃjiṣṭhā tryūṣaṇaṃ tadvat kalkayet sa mahāgadaḥ ||
AS.Utt.42.92 puṣpamāruṣkaraṃ patraṃ saurasaṃ kramukaṃ puram |
bhūyo vegāya jāyeta śeṣaṃ dūṣīviṣāya vā ||
AS.Utt.42.99 sitā vaigandhiko drākṣā payasyā madhukaṃ madhu |
AS.Utt.42.106 pūrṇakumbhaṃ sakusumaṃ sarṣapān chāgalaṃ payaḥ |
śastraṃ dūrvāṃ madhu ghṛtaṃ kuryāddaṣṭasya mūrddhataḥ |
tathā droṇaṃ mahādroṇaṃ mānasīṃ sarpajaṃ maṇim |

div.head: atha tricatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ |
div.p: AS.Utt.43.15 sarveṣāṃ karṇikā śopho jvaraḥ kaṇḍūrarocakaḥ ||
AS.Utt.43.17 daṣṭasya kaṇabhaiḥ śopho visarpo vamathurjvaraḥ |
AS.Utt.43.18 trikaṇṭakaistu daṣṭasya nānāvarṇotha vā sitaḥ |
AS.Utt.43.20 ekadaṃṣṭrārpitaḥ pītaḥ kaṇḍūmān dārduraḥ saruk |
daṃśo daṣṭaḥ satṛṇnidro mūrcchāvān haritaṃ vamet ||
AS.Utt.43.21 mātsyo daṃśaḥ sarugdāhaḥ prāgevokto jalaukasām |
kledī ca daṃśo daṣṭasya hṛspīḍā granthisambhavaḥ ||
AS.Utt.43.25 prāyeṇa makṣikā netre daśanti śvayathūlvaṇaḥ |
AS.Utt.43.26 rugvān pipīlikādaṃśo vahnineva ca dahyate ||
AS.Utt.43.28 vṛścikasya viṣaṃ tīkṣṇamādau dahati vahnivat |
AS.Utt.43.30 mandāḥ pītāḥ sitāḥ śyāvā rukṣāḥ karburamecakāḥ |
AS.Utt.43.35 svidyan mūrcchan viśuṣkāsyo vihṇalo vedanāturaḥ |
AS.Utt.43.37 sādhyato vṛścikāt stambhaṃ śephaso hṛṣṭaromatām |
AS.Utt.43.38 uṣṭravarṇatayā proktaḥ sa eva hyuṣṭradhūmakaḥ |
AS.Utt.43.40 yatra yasyaiva doṣasya liṅgādhikyaṃ pratarkayet |
AS.Utt.43.47 kīṭānāṃ triprakārāṇāṃ traividhyena kriyā hitā ||
AS.Utt.43.49 nṛkeśāḥ sarṣapāḥ pītā guḍo jīrṇaśca dhūpanam |
AS.Utt.43.50 viṣaghnaṃ ca vidhiṃ sarvaṃ kuryāt saṃśodhanāni ca ||
yāti kīṭaviṣaiḥ kampaṃ na kailāsa ivānilaiḥ ||
dhūpo hanti kṛtaḥ śīghraṃ kīṭavṛścikajaṃ viṣam ||
AS.Utt.43.57 vacāṃ vaṃśatvacaṃ pāṭhāṃ nataṃ surasamañjarīm |
dve bale nākulīṃ kuṣṭhaṃ śirīṣaṃ rajanīdvayam ||
AS.Utt.43.59 rohītakaṃ ca pittena kalkayet sa varo 'gadaḥ |
AS.Utt.43.63 tagaraṃ nāgaraṃ nāgakesaraṃ maricāni ca |
AS.Utt.43.64 sitāsite ca lavaṇe maricaṃ ca sanāgaram |
AS.Utt.43.65 sadyo vṛścikajaṃ daṃśaṃ cakratailena secayet |
AS.Utt.43.66 lavaṇottamayuktena sarpiṣā vā punaḥ punaḥ |
AS.Utt.43.67 ādaṃśaṃ sveditaṃ cūrṇaiḥ pracchāya pratisārayet |
lepaḥ sukhoṣṇaśca hitaḥ piṇyāko gomayopi vā ||
AS.Utt.43.69 pāne sarpirmadhuyutaṃ kṣīraṃ vā bhūriśarkaram |
AS.Utt.43.71 manohnā saindhavaṃ hiṅgu mālatīpallavāni ca |
AS.Utt.43.72 laśuno maricaṃ hiṅgu surasaṃ viśvabheṣajam |
AS.Utt.43.73 saśaivaloṣṭradaṃṣṭrā ca hanti vṛścikajaṃ viṣam ||
AS.Utt.43.76 pippalīṃ maricaṃ yaṣṭiṃ śvetāṃ surasamañjarīm |
AS.Utt.43.78 ādaṃśe yasya kaṇḍūḥsyāt kothaḥ koṭhaṃ ca dāruṇam |
AS.Utt.43.80 hṛdayaṃ pīḍyate yasya mūrcchā cimicimāyanam |
vego viṣasya pañcāhānnaiva vā kriyayā vinā ||
AS.Utt.43.81 tatra kurvīta daṃśasya lepanaṃ mastukalkitaiḥ |
AS.Utt.43.82 utkṛtyata ivādaṃśaḥ śūnaḥ klinno hatacchaviḥ |
AS.Utt.43.83 indriyārthaṃ na jānāti prasvidyati ca yo muhuḥ |
AS.Utt.43.86 ante vṛścikadaṣṭānāṃ samudīrṇe bhṛśaṃ viṣe |
AS.Utt.43.88 kuṭajasya phalaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ mālatī phalinī natam |
AS.Utt.43.90 arkasya dugdhena śirīṣabījaṃ trirbhāvitaṃ pippalicūrṇamiśram |

div.head: atha catuścatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ |
div.p: svedaleśāḥ smṛtā lūtā lūne ye patitāstṛṇe ||
ye sphuliṅgā viniśceruste lūtā iti kecana ||
AS.Utt.44.4 anye vadanti bhuktasya duṣṭasyānnasya mūrcchanāt |
AS.Utt.44.5 tatra ghoratamā lūtā bhidyante tā api tridhā |
saptāhena daśāhena pakṣeṇa ca paraṃ kramāt ||
AS.Utt.44.6 kapilāgnimukhī pītā padmā mūtrā sitāsitā |
AS.Utt.44.7 pāṇḍurā raktapadikā bhṛṅgā piṅgā trimaṇḍalā |
AS.Utt.44.8 kumudālaviṣā raktā ścitrā santā nimecakā |
AS.Utt.44.9 kākāṇḍyeṇapadī lājā vaidehī jālinī tathā |
AS.Utt.44.11 tā daśanti site pakṣe 'site sandhau sadaiva ca ||
AS.Utt.44.13 madhye kṛṣṇo 'thavā śyāvaḥ paryante jālakāvṛtaḥ |
AS.Utt.44.16 śvāsena daṃśaḥ sahasā śūyate jvaradāhavān |
AS.Utt.44.18 pacyate cāśu pakvaśca pāṇḍuḥ pīluphalopamaḥ |
AS.Utt.44.19 āvartasadṛśaḥ śūnaḥ pūtiḥ sarpati dahyate |
taddūṣitaṃ ca vastrādi dehe pṛktaṃ vikārakṛt ||
AS.Utt.44.22 dinārdhaṃ lakṣyate naiva daṃśo lūtāviṣodbhavaḥ ||
AS.Utt.44.27 vikārān kurute tāṃstān pañcame viṣakopajān |
ṣaṣṭhe vyāpnoti marmāṇi saptame hanti jīvita ||
AS.Utt.44.32 tridoṣāḥ prāyaśaḥ sarvā lūtāḥ pittakaphādhikāḥ ||
prasṛtaṃ sarvato daṃśaṃ na chindīta dahet vā ||
śastaḥ paryuṣito lepaḥ saghṛtaḥ paittike varṇe ||
āsphoṭagundrā ca hitā pralepaḥ ślaiṣmike viṣe ||
AS.Utt.44.51 udīrṇadoṣān balino viṣe mahati vābhayen |
AS.Utt.44.54 pañcamūlaśṛtaṃ kṣīraṃ toyaṃ vā śodhanauṣadhaiḥ |
AS.Utt.44.56 laghunā pañcamūlena saralena ca sādhitā |
AS.Utt.44.59 śigrupāṭhā kuśavṛṣaṃ vidulaṃ ca jale pacet |
kanīyaḥ paścamūlaṃ ca tasmin maṇḍaṃ pacet ghṛtāt ||
AS.Utt.44.62 nāvanaṃ gaurave śophe lālāsrāve hanugrahe |
AS.Utt.44.67 śaṅkho nīlotpalaṃ tāmraṃ hema pravālakam |
jīvantī laśunaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ katakaṃ mārkavaṃ natam ||
pāne pralepe seke ca lūtāsu paramaṃ hitaḥ ||
surālā kaṭabhī jātiḥ śvetā ca girikarṇikā ||
AS.Utt.44.75 haridrāyugalaṃ nāgadantī lodhraṃ ca śābaram |
AS.Utt.44.77 sarpākṣī candanaṃ vakraṃ mṛgākṣī gandhanākulī |
lepe pāne ca lūtāsu nānena sadṛśogadaḥ ||
AS.Utt.44.82 haridrā gugguluḥ kiṇvaṃ vaṃśalekhaḥ kapotaviḍ |
AS.Utt.44.84 ṛtukāle ca lūtānāṃ yāvantaḥ śukravindavaḥ |
dehe patanti tāvatyo jāyante karṇikāḥ samam ||
AS.Utt.44.85 godantadantī trivṛtā haridre saindhavaṃ tilāḥ |
AS.Utt.44.89 lākṣā rajanyau mañjiṣṭhā haritālaṃ manaśśilā |

div.head: atha pañcacatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ |
div.p: AS.Utt.45.2 ādaṃśe piṭakā tāmrā bhavet kapilayā sthirā |
AS.Utt.45.10 padmābhaḥ padmayā sphoṭo bhinno 'bhinnaḥ punarbhavet |
AS.Utt.45.14 ādaṃśe śvetayā śvetā piṭakā bhṛśakaṇḍulā |
AS.Utt.45.16 ādaṃśaḥ kṛṣṇayā kṛṣṇo viṅgandhiḥ kledaśophavān |
AS.Utt.45.17 śūnaḥ pāṇḍūrayā daṃśaḥ śopho vaktrasya gauravam |
jvaro vighūrṇanaṃ jṛmbhā śiroruk tatra bheṣajam |
AS.Utt.45.19 bhṛṅgābho bhṛṅgayā daṃśaḥ piṭakā dāharukkarī |
koṭhaiśca cīyate gātraṃ tatra śastaṃ bhiṣagjitam |
AS.Utt.45.20 piṅgayā vahnidagdhābho daṃśaḥ sphoṭo bahusrutiḥ |
AS.Utt.45.21 tatrāgadaḥ sitā gundrā mallikā madhukotpalam |
AS.Utt.45.22 trimaṇḍalāyā bahalo daṃśaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ sravatyasṛk |
AS.Utt.45.32 ādaṃśe citrayā raktā piṭakā visṛtā sthirā |
pītā tu gaṇḍayoḥ padmā dakṣiṇāṃsetha kakṣayoḥ ||
AS.Utt.45.47 lūtā mūtraviṣā śvetā cibuke kālikākṣiṇi |
AS.Utt.45.48 vāmapārśve daśet bhṛṅgā vāmāṃse piṅgalā daśet |
trimaṇḍalodare pūtiḥ pṛṣṭhe vīrā tu dakṣiṇe ||
kaṇṭhe raktā lalāṭe tu citrā santānikauṣṭhayoḥ ||
AS.Utt.45.51 bāhusandhiṣu vaidehī lūtāpāṅge tu jālinī |

div.head: atha ṣaṭcatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ |
div.p: AS.Utt.46.3 aruṇaḥ śabalaḥ śvetaḥ kapotaḥ palitonduruḥ |
AS.Utt.46.4 yasminnaṅge patatyeṣāṃ śukramaṅgaiḥ spṛśanti vā |
AS.Utt.46.5 granthayaḥ śvayathuḥ koṭho maṇḍalāni bhramoruciḥ |
AS.Utt.46.7 vyavāyyākhuviṣaṃ kṛcchraṃ bhūyo bhūyaśca kupyati ||
AS.Utt.46.10 śunaḥ śleṣmolbaṇā doṣāḥ saṃjñāṃ saṃjñāvahāśritāḥ |
AS.Utt.46.12 daṃśastena vidaṣṭasya suptaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ kṣaratyasṛk |
AS.Utt.46.15 daṃśāvadaraṇaṃ sphoṭāḥ karṇikā maṇḍalāni ca |
sarvatra saviṣe liṅgaṃ viparītaṃ tu nirviṣe ||
AS.Utt.46.16 daṣṭo yena tu tacceṣṭārutaṃ kurvan vinaśyati |
AS.Utt.46.18 ākhunā daṣṭamātrasya daṃśaṃ kāṇḍena dāhayet |
AS.Utt.46.19 dagdhaṃ visrāvayeddaṃśaṃ pracchitaṃ ca pralepayet |
AS.Utt.46.21 tatomlaiḥ kṣālayitvā tu toyairanu ca lepayet |
anyaiśca viṣaśophaghnaiḥ sirāṃ vā mokṣayet drutam ||
madanasya ca sañcūrṇya dadhnā pītvā viṣaṃ vamet ||
AS.Utt.46.25 vāntasya śuddhe hṛdaye śūlaṃ hidhmārucirvamiḥ |
AS.Utt.46.26 jīrakaṃ tryūṣaṇaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ tuṅgākhyaṃ nāgakesaram |
AS.Utt.46.27 madhuraṃ ca gaṇaṃ piṣṭvā bījapūrakapitthayoḥ |
AS.Utt.46.31 taṇḍulīyakamūlena siddhaṃ pāne hitaṃ ghṛtam |
AS.Utt.46.32 adhobhāge viśuddhasya śūlaṃ nābhyāṃ bhavedyadi |
purīṣaṃ vā vibadhyeta gude syādvā vikartikā ||
AS.Utt.46.35 dadhnā vā prāśayet kṣaudraṃ yavakṣārapayodadhi |
AS.Utt.46.36 sinduvāraṃ nataṃ śigru bilvamūlaṃ punarnavam |
AS.Utt.46.37 takreṇa śarapuṅkhāyā bījaṃ sañcūrṇya vā pibet |
AS.Utt.46.38 payaḥ payasyayā yuktaṃ sitayā madhukena ca ||
AS.Utt.46.41 sthirāṃ mandarujāṃ pracchet karṇikāṃ pātayeta vā |
ropaṇyaḥ kalkitāstailaṃ ghṛtaṃ vā sādhitaṃ tathā |
śirīṣabījaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ ca madhunā tatra lehayet ||
AS.Utt.46.49 cikireṇa śiroduḥkhaṃ śopho hidhmā vamirbhramaḥ |
AS.Utt.46.51 nidrā kaṣāyadantena hṛcchoṣaḥ kṛśatāti ca |
AS.Utt.46.53 granthayaḥ kokilenogrā jvaro dāhaśca dāruṇaḥ |
AS.Utt.46.54 kapilena vraṇe kotho jvaro granthirbhramaḥ satṛṭ |
AS.Utt.46.55 raktaṃ kṛṣṇena vamati viśeṣād durdine pibet |
AS.Utt.46.63 tatra sarve yathāvasthaṃ prayojyāḥ syurupakramāḥ |
śīdhunā śvaviṣaṃ hanti pītaṃ vā taṇḍulāmbunā ||
AS.Utt.46.70 aikadhyaṃ palalaṃ tailaṃ rūpikāyāḥ payo guḍaḥ |
sa kvāthaḥ śītalaḥ pītaḥ paraṃ śvaviṣabheṣajam ||
jalatrāse samaste ca viṣe tat garuḍopamam ||
AS.Utt.46.77 hṛdvidāhe praseke ca virekavamane bhṛśam |
alarkajuṣṭametaṃ me nirviṣaṃ kuru mā cirāt |

div.head: atha saptacatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
div.p: sakṣaudraṃ vālakarajaḥ kvāthaṃ vā saguḍaṃ pibet ||
AS.Utt.47.21 vījanaṃ tālavṛntena śīte sikatile sthitiḥ ||
AS.Utt.47.30 śvayathau śuddhakoṣṭhasya payaḥ pāne hitaṃ śṛtam |
AS.Utt.47.31 triphalāyāḥ kaṣāyeṇa trivṛtā bhāvitā tryaham |
prāyo na sahate tīkṣṇamuṣṇaṃ vā bheṣajaṃ viṣam ||
AS.Utt.47.37 rakte sravatyatibhṛśaṃ ghṛtaṃ samaricaṃ pibet |
nāvane hemaṃ śuklā ca tataḥ śāmyati śoṇitam ||
AS.Utt.47.44 kārpāsamūlaṃ maricaṃ haridre naladaṃ nalam |
AS.Utt.47.47 pratikuryādyathāsvaṃ ca rogeṣvevaṃ pareṣu ca |
tat lohakumbhe nihitaṃ kāryaṃ sannihitaṃ sadā ||
AS.Utt.47.62 mātā me vijayānāma jayo nāma pitā mama |
ajayyasya ca putrosau vijaye ca jayāmi vaḥ ||
AS.Utt.47.73 nidhāpayet gavāṃ śṛṅge manuṣyaṃ punarāharet | (manuṣyaṃ tena jīvayet)
AS.Utt.47.76 śītameva ca kurvīta vidhānaṃ viṣarogiṇām |
AS.Utt.47.77 śālayaḥ ṣaṣṭikā jīrṇāḥ koradūṣāḥ priyaṅgavaḥ |
jāṅgalaṃ dāḍimaṃ dhātrī kapitthaṃ saindhavaṃ sitā ||

div.head: atha aṣṭacatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ |
div.p: AS.Utt.48.1 athāto viṣopayogīyaṃ nāmādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ iti ha smāhurātreyādayo maharṣayaḥ |
AS.Utt.48.5 viṣapītaṃ ca kuśalo daṃśayet pavanāśibhiḥ |
AS.Utt.48.7 daṣṭasya dvau yavau kīṭaistilamātraṃ tu vṛścikaiḥ |
naiva svasṛksthe pāne tu lūtādaṣṭasya neṣyate ||
AS.Utt.48.11 sāktukaṃ mustakaṃ śṛṅgī vālakaṃ sarṣapāhvayam |
vatssnābhaṃ ca karmaṇyaṃ viṣaṃ snigdhaṃ ghanaṃ guru |
AS.Utt.48.14 kṣīrakṣaudraghṛtairyuktaṃ pītaṃ hanti viṣaṃ viṣam |
AS.Utt.48.19 yastu saṃroṣito bhogī dhūmaṃ vaktrādvimuñjcati |
AS.Utt.48.23 grīṣmepyātyayike vyādhau na ca varṣāsu durdine ||
AS.Utt.48.24 na krodhane na pittārte na klībe rājani dvije |
AS.Utt.48.28 tat pibenmastunā vātajvare kṣīreṇa paittike |
kṣīreṇa ca viṣaṃ yuktaṃ jīrṇajvaraharaṃ param ||
AS.Utt.48.32 viṣaṃ rasāñjanaṃ bhārṅgī vṛścikālī mahāsahā |
savedane sapāke ca vraṇe duṣṭe pralepanam ||
AS.Utt.48.39 samūlā pippalī mūtraṃ viṣaṃ śūlaharaṃ tathā |
AS.Utt.48.40 eraṇḍatailaṃ triphalā gomūtraṃ citrako viṣam |
AS.Utt.48.50 śvitrī viṣeṇa saṃsṛṣṭaṃ tataḥ sphoṭān kilāsajān |
AS.Utt.48.54 dantī viṣaṃ sātiviṣaṃ pippalī maricāni ca |
AS.Utt.48.56 svarasaṃ bījapūrasya vacāṃ brāhmīrasaṃ ghṛtam |
AS.Utt.48.57 naṣṭaśukraḥ payo drākṣākapikacchu vacā viṣam ||
AS.Utt.48.58 viṣaṃ sarpiḥ sitā kṣaudraṃ timirāpahamañjanam |
viṣaṃ māgadhikā dve ca niśe kācaghramañjanam ||
ato yathottaraṃ dadyādayasā ca samaṃ viṣam |
AS.Utt.48.66 pūrayet sarpiṣā cānu sarpireva ca pāyayet |
AS.Utt.48.67 nasyaṃ śirorukśamanaṃ pratyakpuṣpī sitā viṣam |
AS.Utt.48.68 śuṇṭhī pathyā viṣaṃ pāṭhā dravantī pūtināsajit ||

div.head: atha ekonapañcāśo 'dhyāyaḥ |
div.p: AS.Utt.49.3 pūrve vayasi madhye vā tatprayojyaṃ jitātmanaḥ |
AS.Utt.49.4 aviśuddhe śarīre hi yukto rāsāyano vidhiḥ |
na bhāti malasaṃsṛṣṭe vastre rāga ivārpitaḥ ||

AS.Utt.49.6 sarve ca doṣā bhavanti grāmyādāhārādamlalavaṇakaṭukakṣāravirudvāsātmyarūkṣābhiṣyandiklinnagurupūtipuryuṣitanavadhānyaśuṣkaśākāmamāṃsatilakulatthadadhiśuktakāñjikapiṣṭānnavirūḍhakaniṣeviṇāṃ divāsvapnastrīmadyanityānāṃ viṣamātimātravyāyāmāyāmasaṅkṣobhitavapuṣāṃ krodhalobhabhayaśokāyāsabahulānā pāpakarmaṇāmasamañjasāhāravihāranirhāraniratānām ||

AS.Utt.49.7 ato nimittaṃ hyaviśuddhaḥ sañjāyate raso vidahyate raktaṃ śithilībhavanti māṃsāni viṣyandate medo dūṣyante doṣā vimucyante sandhayo na sandhīyantesthiṣu majjāno nāpyāyate śukraṃ naujo na balaṃ na vīryam ||

AS.Utt.49.8 tataḥ sa evaṃbhūto glāyati sīdati nidrātandrālasyasamanvitaḥ khidyate nirvidyate nirutsāho 'samarthaḥ śārīramānasānāṃ viśiṣṭānāṃ ceṣṭānāṃ bhraṣṭacchāyo naṣṭasmṛtiralpabuddhirasampādyamānābhilaṣitārtho 'harniśamaniśamaniśaṃ niśvasannadhiṣṭhānabhūto rogāṇāṃ nopāttamapi sarvamāyuravāpnoti ||
AS.Utt.49.9 tasmāt buddhimānapāsya yathoktānāhārādidoṣān nirvāhya ca pūrvopacitān rasāyanaṃ vidhivihitamupaseveta ||
AS.Utt.49.10 tattu dvividhaṃ kuṭīprāveśikaṃ vātātapikaṃ ca |

AS.Utt.49.11 tasya vidhiḥ kṣemasubhikṣadhārmikaśaddadhānajananṛpavaidyavipre sulabhamahauṣadhighṛtakṣīrapathyabhojanopakaraṇe grame nagare vā pūrvottarasyāṃdiśi prāgudakpravaṇe suvibhaktavihāroddeśe deśe dṛḍhaghanasumṛṣṭabhittimutsedhavistārasampannāṃ sūkṣmalocanāṃ trigarbhāmṛtusukhāṃ nirvātāṃ pravātaikadeśāṃ prāgdvārāmudagdvārāṃ vā śamīvilvakṣīrivṛkṣaparigṛhītāmaniṣṭendriyārthavātātaparajodhūmasvedakledadaṃśamaśakasarīsṛpavyālabālastrīdāsāntāvasāyināmagamyāṃ sannihitasadvaidyaparicārakopakaraṇāṃ kuṭīṃ kārayet ||

AS.Utt.49.12 tasyāṃ rasāyanārthī śaradi vasante vā śuklapakṣe praśaste ahani pūjayitvā yathārhaṃ devaguruviprān praṇamya brahmadakṣāśviprabhṛtīn parimṛśya suvarṇaghṛtamadhusiddhārthakapriyaṅgurocanāḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya gobrāhmaṇānanu praviśet ||
AS.Utt.49.13 tatra saṃśodhanaiḥ śuddhaḥ sukhī jātabalaḥ punaḥ |
haridrāṃ pippalīṃ vellaṃ guḍaṃ coṣṇāmbunā pibet |
snigdhasvinno naraḥ pūrvaṃ tena sādhu viricyate ||
trirātraṃ pañcarātraṃ vā saptāhaṃ vā ghṛtānvitam |
AS.Utt.49.20 navā vṛttā ghanā snigdhā gurvī majjati cāpsu yā |

AS.Utt.49.22 atha harītakīnāṃ himavacchailasambhavānāṃ kālajātānāmāpūrṇarasavīryāṇāmanāmayānāṃ dviśastriśo vā śakalitānāmanasthnāmāḍhakaṃ caturguṇena payasā saṃsvedya mṛdubhūtamavatārya śītaṃ sarpirmadhvāḍhakābhyāṃ saṃsṛjya suguptaṃ sthāpayet |
tatastrirātrādūrdhvamāhārānuparodhinīṃ mātrāṃ pratyahamupayojayet jīeṇe śāliṣaṣṭikaṃ payasā bhuñjīta |
asya prayogādvarṣaśatamajaro nirvalīkhalatipalitāmayaḥ śrutismṛtisampannaḥ samiddhānalaśca puruṣo bhavati ||
bhavatyapatyaṃ vipulaṃ sthiraṃ ca samaśnato yogamimaṃ prayatnāt ||
AS.Utt.49.25 jale daśaguṇe paktvā daśabhāgasthite rase |
AS.Utt.49.26 vinīya tasmin niryūhe yojayet kuḍavāṃśakam |
AS.Utt.49.28 sitopalārddhabhāraṃ ca prātrāṇi trīṇi sarpiṣaḥ |
dve ca tailāt pacet sarvaṃ tadagnau lehatāṃ gatam ||
AS.Utt.49.30 etadrasāyanaṃ brāhmaṃ samaṃ pūrveṇa sarvathā |
vaikhānasā bālakhilyāḥ prāśya prāptā navaṃ vayaḥ |
AS.Utt.49.32 ghṛtasyakumbhaṃ madhukaṃ madhūkaṃ kākoliyugmaṃ ca balāṃ svaguptām |
AS.Utt.49.33 āmalakasahastraṃ piṣṭasvedanavidhānena kṣīroṣmaṇā susvinnamanātapaśuṣkamanasthi cūrṇayet |

tadāmalakasahasrasvarasaparipītaṃ sthirājīvantīpunarnavānāgabalāmaṇḍūkaparṇībrahmasuvarcalābhīruśaṅkhapuṣpīvacāpippalīviḍaṅgasvaguptāmṛtāgarucandanamadhukamadhūkapuṣpapadmotpalanavamālikāyuvatiyūthikācūrṇāṣṭabhāgasampṛktaṃ punarnāgabalāpalasahasrasvarasaparipītaṃ chāyopaśoṣitaṃ dviguṇitasarpiṣā kṣaudreṇa kṣudraguḍākṛti kṛtvā ghṛtabhājanasthaṃ bhasmarāśeradhaḥ sthāpayedantarbhūmeḥ pakṣamatharvavedavitkṛtarakṣaṃ pakṣātyaye coddhṛtya kanakarajatatāmrapravālakālāyaścūrṇāṣṭabhāgasaṃyuktamarddhakarṣābhivṛddhyā yathāgni prātaḥ prayojayediti samānaṃ pūrveṇa ||

tāni susvinnaśītānyuddhṛtya niṣkulīkṛtānyāpothya pippalī viḍaṅgataṇḍulānāṃ pṛthagāḍhakenādhyarddhena śarkarāyāḥ ṣaḍbhirmadhughṛtatailānāṃ saṃyojya ghṛtakumbhe sthāpayedviṃśatirātraṃ paraṃ copayojayediti samānaṃ pūrveṇa ||
AS.Utt.49.35 abhayāmalakasahasraṃ pippalīsahasrayuktaṃ taruṇapalāśakṣārodakenāplāvya śucau bhāṇḍe sthāpayet |

tatonugatakṣāramanātapaśuṣkamāsthirahitaṃ cūrṇayitvā sitopalāpādena caturguṇābhyāṃ ca madhughṛtābhyāṃ saṃyojya ghṛtabhājane ṣaṇmāsānantarbhūmeḥ sthāpayitvā parato yathāgnibalamupayuñjīteti samānaṃ pūrveṇa ||
AS.Utt.49.36 āmalakacūrṇāḍhakamekaviṃśatirātramāmalakasvarasabhāvitaṃ madhughṛtāḍhakābhyāṃ pippalīcūrṇāṣṭabhāgena śarkarācaturbhāgena ca saṃsṛṣṭaṃ ghṛtabhājanasthaṃ prāvṛṣi bhasmarāśau nidadhyāt |
AS.Utt.49.37 viḍaṅgataṇḍulānāmāḍhakamāḍhakaṃ pippalītaṇḍulānāmadhyarddhaṃ sitopalānāṃ madhughṛtatailāḍhakaiḥ ṣaḍbhirekīkṛtaṃ ghṛtabhājanasthaṃ prāvṛṣi bhasmarāśāvitisamānaṃ pūrveṇa ||

AS.Utt.49.38 abhayāmalakabibhītakānāṃ dviśastriśo vā saṃyojitānāṃ palāśatvagavanaddhānāṃ mṛdāvaliptānāṃ kukūlasvinnānāṃ nirasthīkṛtānāṃ palasahastramulūkhale saṅkṣudya dadhibhadhughṛtatailapalalaśarkarāsampṛktaṃ bhakṣayedanannabhugyathoktena vidhinā prayogānte tato dviguṇaṃ kālaṃ yavāgūyūṣakṣīraghṛtaṣaṣṭikānnamāhārobhyañjanaṃ sarpirudvartanaṃ yavacūrṇamiti samānaṃ pūrveṇābhyadhikaphalaṃ vā ||
parṇinyau pippalī śṛṅgī medā tāmalakī truṭiḥ ||
AS.Utt.49.40 jīvantī joṅgakaṃ drākṣā pauṣkaraṃ candanaṃ śaṭhī |
AS.Utt.49.41 vidārī vṛṣamūlaṃ ca tadaikadhyaṃ palenmitam |
AS.Utt.49.44 pippalyā dve pale dadyācaturjātaṃ kaṇārdhikam |
AS.Utt.49.45 ityeṣa cyavanaprāśo yaṃ prāśya cayvano muniḥ |
AS.Utt.49.46 kāsaṃ śvāsaṃ jvaraṃ śoṣaṃ hṛdrogaṃ vātaśoṇitam |
AS.Utt.49.49 sitayā vā samāyuktā samāyuktā rasāyanam |
AS.Utt.49.52 varṣaṃ khādet prāṇadāṃ prātarekāmaśnannannāt pūrvamakṣadvayaṃ ca |
AS.Utt.49.53 athāyasāni caturaṅguladīrghavistṛtāni tilotsedhāni patrāṇi kārayet |
teṣāṃ tādṛśānāṃ palaśatamāyasyāṃ sthālyāṃ prakṣipyāmalakasvarasottaraṃ kṛtvā supihitaṃ bhasmahitaṃ bhasmarāśau nikhanet |

tataścottarakālaṃ kṛtvā vamanavirecanaṃ snigdhatanureva kevalaṃ samantatoṅguṣṭhaparvamātramukhenāyasena sruveṇāyasa eva bhājane tasmāt kalkīkṛtāt sruvamekaṃ gṛhītvā madhudhṛtābhyāṃ pṛthak sruveṇa saṃyojya prāśnīyāt |
anena vidhinā varṣamupayujya varṣameva cānyadapyuddiṣṭāhāro yantritātmā kuṭīṃ samadhivaset |
tataḥ sarvopatāpān jitvā vyādhijarāmaraṇaśastrāgnitoyaviṣāṇāmagamyaḥ sarvabhāveṣvatīndiryo varṣasahasradvayaṃ jīvati ||
AS.Utt.49.57 suvarṇaṃ padmabījāni madhu lājāḥ priyaṅgavaḥ |
AS.Utt.49.59 madhumāgadhikāviḍaṅgasāratriphalā hema ghṛtaṃ sitāṃ ca khādan |
jarasānavalīḍhadehakāntiḥ samadhātuśca samāḥ śataṃ ca jīvet ||
AS.Utt.49.62 āyuṣkāmaḥ śaṅkhapuṣpyāsametaṃ medhākāmaḥ kāñcanaṃ sogragandham |
lakṣmīkāmaḥ padmakiñjalkayuktaṃ yuktaṃ khādet kāmakāmo vidāryā ||
AS.Utt.49.63 maṇḍūkaparṇyāḥ svarasaṃ yathāgni kṣīreṇa yaṣṭīmadhukasyacūrṇam |
rasaṃ guḍūcyāḥ sahamūlapuṣpyāḥ kalkaṃ prayuñjīta ca śaṅkhapuṣpyāḥ ||
medhyāni caitāni rasāyanāni medhyā viśeṣeṇa tu śaṅkhapuṣpī ||
AS.Utt.49.65 naladaṃ kaṭurohiṇī payasyā madhukaṃ candanasārivogragandhāḥ |
triphalā kaṭukatrayaṃ haridre sapaṭolaṃ lavaṇaṃ ca taiḥ supiṣṭaiḥ ||
AS.Utt.49.66 triguṇena rasena śaṅkhapuṣpyāḥ sapayaskaṃ ghṛtanalvaṇaṃ vipakvam |
AS.Utt.49.67 peṣyairmṛṇālavisakesarapatrabījaiḥ siddhaṃ sahemaśakalaṃ payasā ca sarpiḥ |
sarpiścatuṣkuvalayaṃ sahiraṇyapatraṃ medhyaṃ gavāmapi bhavet kimumānuṣāṇām ||
vaidehikā ca triyavāḥ pṛthaksyuryavau suvarṇasya tilo viṣasya ||
AS.Utt.49.70 sarpiṣaśca palamekata eta dyojayet pariṇate ca ghṛtāḍhyām |
AS.Utt.49.73 yathoktaguṇāyāṃ bhūmau jātāmabālāmajīrṇāṃ śīrṇapurāṇaparṇāmasañjātānyaparṇāṃ tape tapasye vā māse yathoktena vidhinā puṣyayukte candramasi sumuhurte nāgabalāṃ samūlāmuddharet |
tasyā mūlānāṃ tvakpiṇḍamāmramātramakṣamātraṃ vā ślakṣṇapiṣṭamavacūrṇitaṃ vā payasā pibenmadhughṛtābhyāṃ vā lihyāt |
AS.Utt.49.75 tatra sāravṛkṣāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ svarasārthī kuṣṭhacikitsite khadirakalpamīkṣeta |
ārdravṛkṣāsambhave tu sāraśakalānidvyaṅgulatryaṅgulāni tanūni caturguṇembhsyā plāvyātape trirātraṃ sthāpayet |
trirātrācca punaranyānyevaṃ navarātreṇa triḥprakṣepaṇoddhāreṇa ca svarasaḥ parikalpito bhavati ||
AS.Utt.49.76 phalānāṃ punarvīrudauṣadhīnāṃ ca yantreṇolūkhalena vā saṅkṣudya niṣpīḍya svarasaṃ gṛhṇīyāt ||
AS.Utt.49.77 pariśuṣkāṇāṃ tu cūrṇikṛtānāmāḍhakamāḍhakamudakasyāhorātrasthitaṃ vimṛditapūtaṃ svarasavat prayojyam |
AS.Utt.49.81 avatārya karīṣe ca pakṣamātraṃ nidhāpayet |
AS.Utt.49.83 majjasāra mahāvīrya sarvān dhātūn viśodhaya |
antrdhūmaṃ tasya majjā sudagdhaḥ kṣiptastaile saindhavaṃ cāgnivarṇam |
AS.Utt.49.91 ekāntaraṃ tauvarakañca tailaṃ pibeddhitāśī niyamena māsam |
kuṣṭhī taddivasāsthito niraśanaḥ sūrye gate 'staṃ pibet ||
AS.Utt.49.95 tāvadeva ca tathaiva ca bhūyaḥ pāyayettamaruṇodayakāle |
snāyāt sukhāmbhobhiramadyamāṃsa strīsaṅgatiḥ syāttriguṇaṃ ca yogāt ||
AS.Utt.49.99 atha bhallātakānyanupahatānyanāmayānyāpūrṇarasaprpamāṇavīryāṇi pakrajāmbavaprakāśāni śucau śukre vā māse saṅgṛhya yavapalle māṣapalle vā nidhāpayet |
tāni caturmāsasthitāni sahe sahasye vā māse prayoktumārabheta |
teṣāṃ rasamaṣṭabhāgāvaśiṣṭamanuṣṇaṃ sapayaskaṃ sarpirgaṇḍūṣābhyaktoṣṭhatālujihvaḥ prātaḥ pibet |
vidhinānena sahasraprayogastriguṇaśca kālo ghṛtakṣīrābhyāṃ śāliṣaṣṭikamaśanamevaṃ viśeṣādvigatakuṣṭhadurnāmakṛmipramehamedodoṣo varṣaśatamajara ityādi samānaṃ pūrveṇa ||
AS.Utt.49.100 pūrvamekaikabhallātakakvāthaṃ sapayaskaṃ pibedekaikaṃ ca bhallātakamabhivarddhayedyāvat pañca |
prāpya ca saptatimapakarṣayet bhūyaḥ pañca pañca yāvat pañca |
AS.Utt.49.102 bhallātakānāṃ jarjarīkṛtānāṃ piṣṭasvedanaṃ pūrayitvā bhūmāvākāṇṭhanikhātasya snehabhāvitasya dṛḍhasyoparikumbhasyāropyoḍupenāpidhāyakṛṣṇabhṛdāvaliptaṃ gomayāgninopasvedayet |
teṣāṃ yaḥ svarasaḥ kumbhaṃ prapadyate tamaṣṭabhāgamadhusaṃyuktaṃ dviguṇitaghṛtamadyāt |
AS.Utt.49.103 anenaiva vidhinā bhallātakasya rasaṃ gṛhītvā kevalameva māsamekaṃ prayuñjīta |

AS.Utt.49.105 bhallātakatailaṃ kṛṣṇatilatailaṃ sarpirāmalakaraso 'sanādisārakaṣāya ityeṣāṃ droṇaṃ droṇaṃ triphalātrikaṭukaviḍaṅgasāracitrakaharidrādvayatrivṛddantīndrayavayaṣṭīmadhukaviṣātiviṣārasāñjanapriyaṅgūnāṃ pālikābhāgāstadaikadhyaṃ snehapākavidhinā vipācyāvatārya paripūyacānuguptaṃ nidadhyāt |
tata upaskṛtaśarīraḥ prātaḥ prātaḥ pāṇiśuktimātraṃ kṣaudreṇa pratisaṃsṛjyopayuñjīta |
AS.Utt.49.108 sarpiḥ pakvaṃ tena tulyapramāṇaṃ yuñjyāt svecchaṃ śarkarāyā rajobhiḥ |
ekībhūtaṃ tatkhajakṣobhaṇena sthāpyaṃ dhānye saptarātraṃ suguptam ||
AS.Utt.49.109 tamamṛtarasapākaṃ yaḥ prage prāśamaśnannanu pibati yatheṣṭaṃ vāri dugdhaṃ rasaṃ vā |
AS.Utt.49.110 droṇe 'mbhaso vraṇakṛtāṃ triśatādvipakvāt kvāthāḍhake palasamaistilatailapātram |
tilena saha mākṣikeṇa palalena sūpena vā |
AS.Utt.49.113 kaphajo na sa rogāsti na vibandhostikaścana |
AS.Utt.49.115 pañcāṣṭau sapta daśa vā pippalīrmadhusarpiṣā |
AS.Utt.49.116 tisrastisrastu pūrvāhne bhuktvāgre bhojanasya ca |
AS.Utt.49.119 piṣṭāstā balibhiḥ peyāḥ śṛtā madhyabalairnaraiḥ |
AS.Utt.49.120 tadvaca chāgadugdhena dve sahasre prayojayet ||
ghnanti śophaṃ vamiṃ hidhmāṃ plīhānaṃ vātaśoṇitam ||
viḍaṅgacūrṇaṃ kṣaudrabhallātakakvāthābhyāṃ madhvāmalakarasābhyāṃ guḍūcīkvāthena ca etāṃścaturo yogān māsamupayuñjīteti samānaṃ pūrveṇa |
AS.Utt.49.123 alambuṣāṃ svena rasena bhāvitāṃ pṛthagghṛtakṣīramadhūṣṇavāribhiḥ |
AS.Utt.49.124 uṣṇā vipāke kaṭukā kaṣāyamadhurā rase |
AS.Utt.49.126 śvetāvalgujaphalānyātapaśuṣkāṇī cūrṇayitvā tattulyaguḍena saṅkṣudya ghṛtakumbhe dhānyarāśau saptparātraṃ nidadhyāt |
tasya māsaprayogādviśeṣeṇa vigatakuṣṭho grahaṇadhāraṇavān varṣaśatamajara ityādi samānaṃ pūrveṇa |
pītvā cātape nirvātoṣṇe vā garbhagṛhe tiṣṭhedaparāhṇe tadvadeva srānamaśanaṃ ca |
AS.Utt.49.129 palāni daśa bākucyā daśaiva ca phalatrayāt |
AS.Utt.49.132 cūrṇayedatha tanmātrāṃ bhakṣayet pālikīṃ parām |

tato nistuṣīkṛtya chāyāyāṃ viśoṣayitvā susūkṣmaṃ ca sañcūrṇya tryahaṃ tryahaṃ kramaśo bhāvayettriphalākvathena kāravallīvāsābrāhmīguḍūcībhṛṅgarājasvarasaiḥ pṛthakpṛthak khadirāsanarājavṛkṣapicumandakvāthaiḥ ||
AS.Utt.49.138 tīvreṇa kuṣṭhena parītamūrttiryaḥsomarājīṃ niyamena khādet |
AS.Utt.49.139 ye somarājyā vituṣīkṛtāyāścūrṇairupetāt payasaḥ sujātāt |
uddhṛtya sāraṃ madhunā lihanti takraṃ tadevānu pibanti cānte ||
AS.Utt.49.141 khadirāmbhasā pibedvā ravisevī tāṃ tayā yavāgūṃ vā |
AS.Utt.49.143 gomūtre saptarātraṃ śaśiśakalaphalaṃ vāsitaṃ lolayitvā |
kuryācchāyāviśuṣkaṃ pṛthagiti ca phalaṃ prāpunāṭaṃ ca śuṣkam ||
AS.Utt.49.144 aṃśastābhyāṃ tathāṃśaḥ kṛmiripudahana sphoṭakṛdbhyaḥ sa cūrṇo gomūtreṇopayuktaḥ pramitahitabhujaḥ ścitramāśveva hanti ||
upalamaghanaṃ ghanaṃ vā rasāśināṃ hanti bākucikā ||
AS.Utt.49.146 uṣṇodakena piṣṭā pītā ca ghṛtānvitā jayet gulmam laghupañcamūlasiddhāṃ peyāmupayojayejjīrṇe ||
AS.Utt.49.148 viṣkirarasena pītā daśamūlarasena vā guḍūcyā vā |
AS.Utt.49.150 ikṣurakādikvāthairvardhmani mūtreṇa vā gavāṃ śastaḥ |
dhāroṣṇena tu payasā yuktaḥ śophajvarau hanti ||
AS.Utt.49.152 lekhāmindoḥ saghṛtāṃ sukhāmbunā putriṇī bhavati pītvā puṣṣodayeśvagandhāśṛtena payasā ca bhuñjānā ||
AS.Utt.49.153 vandhyāpi saptāhamimaṃprayogaṃ karoti yā harṣayatī sugandhiḥ |
priyaṃvadā sadvrataśaucayuktā sūte sutān sā niyamāt guṇāḍhyān ||
gehe sthitāpi rekhā cāndramasī kimuta koṣṭhasthā ||
avalgujo mokṣayate mahābhayācchriyaṃ ca medhāṃ ca dadāti pupkalām ||
AS.Utt.49.157 haimavatyā vacāyāḥ piṇḍamāmalakamātraṃ payasāloḍya pibejjīrṇe payassarpirodana ityāhāraḥ |
saptabhiḥ saptarātraiḥ śrutadharo varṣaśatamajara ityādi samānaṃ pūrveṇa ||
AS.Utt.49.158 itarasyā api vacāyā dvipalakvāthaṃ pibet jīrṇe payaḥ sarpirityādi samānaṃ pūrveṇa |
AS.Utt.49.159 vacākalkaśatapākaṃ ghṛtadroṇamupayujya viśeṣāt grahonmādāpasmāragalagaṇḍagaṇḍamālāślīpadasvarabhedavimuktaḥ sarvārtheṣu siddhimān varṣaśatāyurbhavati ||
AS.Utt.49.163 śīlayellaśunaṃ śīte vasante ca kapholbaṇaḥ |
AS.Utt.49.164 māsaḥ parosya rasakalkaniṣevaṇāya svacchandamapyupadiśanti vimardakaistu |
ṣaṇmāsamanyavidhinā na tu śastamāhuḥ pakṣaprayogamapi hīnataraṃ rasone ||
AS.Utt.49.168 madyasyānyasya takrasya mastunaḥ kañjikasya vā |
tatkāla eva vā yuktaṃ yuktamālocya mātrayā ||
kvāthena vā yathāvyādhi rasaṃ kevalameva vā ||
śeṣaṃ pibet klamāpāye sthiratāṃ gata ojasi ||
AS.Utt.49.175 kuḍavosyaparā mātrā tadarddhaṃ kevalasya tu |
palaṃ piṣṭasya tanmajjñaḥ sabhaktaṃ prākca śīlayet ||
AS.Utt.49.181 amadyapo yastu phalāmbutukramavantisomaṃ ca sugandhi śītam |
sauvīrakaṃ jāṅgalajaṃ rasaṃ vā tuṣodakvaṃ vā parisikthikāṃ vā ||
AS.Utt.49.182 tatkalkaṃ vā samaghṛtaṃ ghṛtapātre khajāhatam |
AS.Utt.49.183 sadyaḥ piṣṭaṃ sarpiṣā saṃyutaṃ vā niryāsena svena yuktaṃ ca kāmam |
AS.Utt.49.185 samatailaṃ saśuktaṃ vā yavarāśau samāsthitam |
AS.Utt.49.187 palaṃ tvacaśca tacślakṣṇaṃ nihitaṃ ghṛtabhājane |
AS.Utt.49.188 kṣuṇṇāṃ kṣipet kandatulāṃ takrasya palaviṃśatau |
AS.Utt.49.191 paṭūni pañca kṣārau dvau dadyāttatrākṣamānataḥ |
tailena gulmī khadireṇa kuṣṭhī khādet kṛmighnaiḥ kṛmimān rasonam ||
yathāyathaṃ prayogosya kāryastaṃ taṃ gadaṃ prati ||
śuddhe vā vidyate vāyau na dravyaṃ laśunātparam ||
svapnaṃ divā jāgaraṇaṃ niśāsu piṣṭaṃ vyavāyaṃ dadhi cātra necchet ||
laśunaṃ snehasaṃyogāt garīyān jāyate hi saḥ ||
paitte vikārekṣigadetisāre kṣāme śarīre ca sa varjanīyaḥ ||
AS.Utt.49.212 śīlita eṣa karoti durāpaṃ vahniśarīrabalaṃ samameva |
AS.Utt.49.213 amṛtakaṇasamutthaṃ yo rasonaṃ rasonaṃ vidhiyutamitikhādecchītakāle sadaiva |
sa nayati śatajīvī strīsahāyo jarāntaṃ kanakaruciravarṇo nīrujastuṣṭijuṣṭaḥ ||
kapolakāntyā vijitaḥ śaśāṅko rasātalaṃ gacchati nirvideva ||
samprāpyante yantraṇodvegamuktaiḥ ryasyābhyāsāddhāri dīrghaṃ sukhaṃ ca ||
AS.Utt.49.217 apyāhāre śīlito dīrghārātraṃ balyaścakṣuṣyastarpaṇaḥ sthairyakārī |
AS.Utt.49.219 marakatamaṇinīlaṃ nālamasyātibālaṃ pariṇataśaśigauraṃ yacca bījaṃ supiṣṭam |
babūva tebhyaḥ kila kukkuṭī yayā vrajanti devatvamivādya mānuṣāḥ ||
AS.Utt.49.231 bhuñjītālpataraṃ dinārditamṛṣiḥ pakṣakṣaye bhakṣayan kṣīraṃ bījakavāri takramathavā pītvā sthitiṃ kalpayet |
māṃsaṃ prāśya tathā nakhadvijakacaḥ śīrṇotthitaiḥ kāntimān jīvatyabdaśatatrayaṃ dhṛtimatismṛtyādibhirbhūṣitaḥ ||
AS.Utt.49.232 kṣīreṇa kandacūrṇaṃ pibanyavāgūṃ ca pariṇate māsam |
kandatrayaṃ ca bhṛṣṭaṃ ghṛteśnato bhakṣitaṃ vātān ||
AS.Utt.49.235 trīn kandakāṃśca niśi bhakṣayatājyabhṛṣṭān dhātrīphalāmbu sasitaṃ cahgalīpayo vā |
peyaṃ dṛgāmayajayāya niṣevitavyā kāmaṃ ca rogaśamamātraphalārthibhiḥ sā ||
vibhartti yā pallavamabdaśabdāt sā kañcukī śvetavapurvareṇyā ||
AS.Utt.49.237 āṣāḍhe kārtike vāttaṃ tatkandaṃ śītalaṃ sthitam |
kṣīrameva ca jīrṇepi peyāṃ vā snehabharjitām ||
AS.Utt.49.240 sarvavyādhīn dvitīyena tṛtīyena tu sarpavat |
AS.Utt.49.241 kañcukīkandacūrṇaṃ vā svena kṣīreṇa bhāvitam |
AS.Utt.49.244 kṣīreṇa bhojanaṃ jīrṇe śālerlābarasena vā |
AS.Utt.49.245 medhāvinaḥ praṇaśyanti gātraṃ suptaṃ ca budhyate |
AS.Utt.49.246 palaṃ cūrṇasya kañcukyāḥ kṣīraprasthe samāvapet |
AS.Utt.49.247 śālerannaṃ payaḥ pānaṃ māsamevaṃ prayojayet |
AS.Utt.49.248 pacet palāni droṇepāṃ kañcukyāḥ pañcaviṃśatiḥ |
aṣṭāṃśaśiṣṭe tu ghṛtāt prasthaṃ kṣīrasamaṃ pacet ||
AS.Utt.49.253 vahe 'pāṃ pādaśeṣe ca pṛthagarddhāḍhakena ca |
AS.Utt.49.256 idamupayujya sarpirativīryamudāraguṇaṃ bhavati suvāksudhīḥ sudṛḍhasubalaḥ subhagaḥ |
AS.Utt.49.257 dānavendra vijitān purā surān bhraṣṭakāntidhṛtidharyatejasaḥ |
AS.Utt.49.258 adyāpyataḥ suragaṇāḥ kila dhūpamukhyān hitvā varāgaruturuṣkahimendudarpān |
nirdahyamānavapuṣṣo 'pi śikhāṃ pibanto gandhena yasya muditā dadhati prasādam ||
AS.Utt.49.259 sa yogavāhī sa śivaḥ sa sārvaḥ sarvartusevyaḥ sukhaśīlanīyaḥ |
AS.Utt.49.260 gandhotkaṭaḥ sa dāhe snigdhadravapicchilo vigataśalyaḥ |
AS.Utt.49.261 yaḥ padmarāgarāgo yaḥ kanakacchedapāṭalo yo vā |
AS.Utt.49.265 laghīyasopi tadvacca sukhoṣṇena jalena vā |
kvāthaiḥ pṛthakpathyaparasya hanti māsena ghorān kaphapittarogān ||
AS.Utt.49.277 pibet palaśataṃ yosya vidhinā niyato yatiḥ |
AS.Utt.49.281 grīṣmerkataptā girayo jatutulyaṃ vamanti yat |
AS.Utt.49.283 sarvaṃ ca tiktakaṭukaṃ nātyuṣṇaṃ kaṭu pākataḥ |
chedanaṃ ca viśeṣeṇa lauhaṃ tatra praśasyate ||
AS.Utt.49.284 gomūtragandhi kṛṣṇaṃ guggulvābhaṃ viśarkaraṃ mṛtsnam |
snigdhamanamlakaṣāyaṃ mdṛu guru ca śilājatu śreṣṭham ||
AS.Utt.49.294 tat samarasatāṃ yātaṃ saṃśuṣkaṃ prakṣipedrase bhūyaḥ |
AS.Utt.49.295 atha snigdhasya śuddhasya ghṛtaṃ tiktakasādhitam |
AS.Utt.49.296 phalatrayasya yūṣeṇa paṭolyā madhukasya ca |
guṇān samagrān kurute sahasā vyāpadaśca na ||
AS.Utt.49.299 saṃskṛtaṃ saṃskṛte dehe prayuktaṃ girijāhvayam |
AS.Utt.49.302 kulatthān kākamācīṃ ca kapotāṃśca sadā tyajet |
AS.Utt.49.303 jvarī jvaraghnāmbudaparpaṭādeḥ kvāthena raktī madhuyaṣṭikāyāḥ |
śoṣī saraiḥ kravyabhugāmiṣotthairmāyuramāṃsaiḥ payasā ca kārśye ||
AS.Utt.49.304 madhvambunā medasi sampravṛddhe kṣīreṇa payākulabuddhisatvaḥ |
kṣīraudanāśī yo jīrṇe yakṣmaṇā na sa bādhyate ||
AS.Utt.49.310 balāyā madhuyaṣṭyāśca rase gavye ca vāriṇi |
AS.Utt.49.315 tāḥ śuṣkā navakumbhe jātīpuṣpādhivāsite sthāpyāḥ |
AS.Utt.49.317 saptāhamātramevaṃ sarvānnīnaḥ kramāt bhavet parataḥ |
bhaktasyānte prāgvā guṭikā na virudhyate saiṣā ||
AS.Utt.49.320 vidradhimudaraṃ kuṣṭhaṃ śvitraṃ jāḍyaṃ kṣayaṃ madaṃ mūrcchām |
AS.Utt.49.323 abhicāramarātikṛtaṃ duḥsvapnaṃ bhautikīṃ tathā bādhām |
kurute nṛpavallabhatāṃ jayaṃ vivāde ca vaktrasthā ||
AS.Utt.49.325 jitakhalativalīpalitā jīvayati sukhaṃ śatadvayaṃ śaradām |
AS.Utt.49.326 na sostirogo bhuvi sādhyarūpo jatvaśmajaṃ yaṃ na jayet prasahya |
AS.Utt.49.328 daśaguṇamupayuṅkte yaḥ śataṃ śailajātāllaghuhitamitabhojī varjayan varjanīyān |
satatasamanuṣaktān varjitān vaidyavṛndairvidhamati sagadaughān nekṣate cāyuṣontam ||
AS.Utt.49.329 samudvabhūvāmṛtamanthanotthaḥ svedaḥ śilābhyo 'mṛtavān gireḥ prāk |
yo mandarasyātmabhuvā hitāya nyastaḥ sa śaileṣu śilājarūpī ||
AS.Utt.49.331 tāpyāṃ sūryāṃśusantapto mādhave māsi dṛśyate |
AS.Utt.49.332 kiṃcit kaṣāya ubhayaḥ śītaḥ pāke kaṭurlaghuḥ |
AS.Utt.49.333 na tanniṣevī jarasābhibhṛyate na pannagairnāpi garairna vṛścikaiḥ |
AS.Utt.49.334 sodaśvitko mākṣikadhātuḥ saghṛto vā sakṣaudro vā kṣaudraghṛtābhyāṃ sahito vā |
sāmbhasko vā tailayuto vā vinihantā tvagdoṣāṇāṃ sarvaviṣāṇāṃ sagarāṇām ||
datvā tulyaṃ mākṣikadhātuṃ madhumiśraṃ lihyātpāṇḍuvyādhyabhibhūtaḥ śivamicchan ||
AS.Utt.49.336 aṃśaḥ śuṇṭhyā lohamalāṃśo badarāṃśaḥ pippalyaṃśo mākṣikadhāturdviguṇāṃśaḥ |
kṣaudraṃ kāmaṃ kṛṣṇatilānāmapi cāṃśaḥ śreṣṭhā piṇḍī pāṇḍuvikāraśvayathughnī ||
AS.Utt.49.337 sāyaścūrṇaṃ mākṣikadhātuṃ madhumiśraṃ vyoṣopetaṃ parvataniryāsasametam |
AS.Utt.49.338 lohaṃ sarpirmākṣikadhāturmadhumātrā dhātrīcūrṇaṃ ke saramambuprabhavānām |
AS.Utt.49.339 kṛtyaikasthaṃ mākṣikadhātuṃ triphalāṃ ca bhrāṣṭre paktvā ye sahaviṣkaṃ vilihanti |
pathyādāstān vārdhakadoṣā na bhajante māturdoṣāḥ stanyanivṛttāniva vālān ||
śanaiḥ śanairyāti jarā vināśaṃ pratyantavāsādiva lokayātrā ||
AS.Utt.49.341 trikoṇakāṇḍā subahupratānā phaleṣu pītā kusumeṣu raktā |
bhuvi paramauṣadhirmahiṣavallarīti prathitā kvacidapi vṛddhadāraka iyatvapi vellarikā ||
AS.Utt.49.348 jīrṇo pūrvavadaśnīyādyo jīvet sa samāḥ śatam |
AS.Utt.49.350 yo lihyāt sarpiṣā cūrṇaṃ vṛddhadārakamūlajam |
AS.Utt.49.351 svarasena śatāvaryā saptāhaṃ bhāvitaṃ ca tat |
AS.Utt.49.353 vṛddhadārakamūlānāṃ rasaṃ kṣīreṇa yaḥ pibet |
gavyaṃ pibedanu payo māhiṣaṃ vā yatheṣṭabhuk ||
AS.Utt.49.359 pañcāhena jayet kāsān saptāhena tvagāmayān |
AS.Utt.49.361 amṛtāyā rasenānu tataḥ śuṣkaṃ ghṛtāplutam |
AS.Utt.49.362 māsāduddhṛtya taṃ lehaṃ yo varṣamupayojayet |
atonyathā tu ye teṣāṃ sauryamārutiko vidhiḥ ||
sukhopacārā bhraṃśe 'pi ye na dehasya bādhakāḥ ||
AS.Utt.49.367 śītodakaṃ payaḥ kṣaudraṃ ghṛtamekaikaśo dviśaḥ |
sarpirmadhubhyāmadataḥ śarīraṃ kālāgradūtī na jarā dunoti ||
AS.Utt.49.370 triphalāmasanodakena piṣṭāṃ rajanīṃ paryuṣitāmayaḥ kapāle |
madhunā madhurāṃ lihan hinasti sthavimānaṃ jarasaṃ gadāṃśca sarvān ||
niyamena narā niṣevitāro yadi jīvantyajarāḥ kimatra citram ||
AS.Utt.49.373 bījakamya rasamaṅgulihāryaṃ śarkarāmadhughṛtaṃ triphalāṃ ca |
AS.Utt.49.376 harītakīṃ sarpiṣi sampratāpya samaśnatastat pibato ghṛtaṃ ca |
bhaveccirasthāyi balaṃ śarīre sakdtkṛtaṃ sādhu yathā kṛtajñe ||
AS.Utt.49.377 ārāccitānāṃ kalaśaṃ purāṇaṃ dhātrīphalānāṃ madhunaśca pūrṇam |
saṃvatsarārddhaṃ nihitaṃ yaveṣu niṣevamāṇo jarasaṃ nihanti ||
AS.Utt.49.379 navāmalakaśuktayo madhu ghṛtaṃ rajaścāyasaṃ catuṣṭayamayoghaṭasthamiti cūrṇitaṃ vatsaram ||
AS.Utt.49.380 krameṇa lihataḥ payonupibataśca pathyāśinaściraṃ bhavati jīvitaṃ kṣayamupaiti pṛthavījarā ||
AS.Utt.49.382 viḍaṅgasāraṃ madhukaṃ ca piṣṭaṃ bhallātakakvāthamadhupragāḍham |
arśāṃsi jantūṃśca jayatyudīrṇān vahniṃ ca sandhukṣayati kṣaṇena ||
tailena cūrṇāni niṣevamāṇān śarīriṇo nopatapanti rogāḥ ||
AS.Utt.49.385 viḍaṅgakalkaṃ svarasena dhātryāḥ kṣaudreṇa yuktaṃ ca pibennaro yaḥ |
drākṣārasakṣaudrapariplutaṃ vā vijitya rogān sa bhavecchatāyuḥ ||
AS.Utt.49.386 cūrṇaṃ samaṃ māgadhikākaṇānāṃ viḍaṅgacūrṇena sacitrakeṇa |
AS.Utt.49.387 punarnavasyārddhapalaṃ palaṃ vā piṣṭaṃ pibedyaḥ payasārddhāmāsam |
māsadvayaṃ tattriguṇaṃ samāṃ vā jīrṇopi bhūyaḥ sapunarnavaḥ syāt ||
AS.Utt.49.390 pītāśvagandhā payasārddhamāsaṃ ghṛtena tailena sukhāmbunā vā |
kṛśasya puṣṭiṃ vapuṣo vidhatte bālasya sasyasya yathā suvṛṣṭiḥ ||
AS.Utt.49.391 dine dine kṛṣṇatilaprakuñcaṃ samaśnataḥ śītajalānupānam |
AS.Utt.49.393 madhu madhurasā lājā bhārṅgī madhūkaśatāvarī |
AS.Utt.49.394 gāyatrīśikhiśiṃśapāsanaśivā vellākṣakāruṣkarān piṣṭvāṣṭau daśaṣaṭguṇembhasi dṛtān khaṇḍaiḥ sahāyomayaiḥ |
pātre lohakṛte tryahaṃ ravikarairāloḍayan pācayedagnau cānu mṛdau salohaśakalaṃ pādasthitaṃ tat pacet ||
AS.Utt.49.396 vimalayā sitayā madhunāthavā yutamayuktamidaṃ yadi vā ghṛtam |
AS.Utt.49.397 śrīmān nirdhūtapāpmā vanamahiṣabalo vājivegaḥ sthirāṅgo keśairbhṛṅgāṅganīlairmadhusurabhimukho naikayoṣinniṣevī |
AS.Utt.49.399 bhṛṅgapravālānamunaivabhṛṣṭān ghṛtena yaḥ khādati yantritātmā |
AS.Utt.49.400 māsopayogāt sa sukhī jīvatyabdaśata trayam |
AS.Utt.49.402 kāśmaryāṇāṃ tulāṃ māsaṃ sthitāṃ madhughṛtokṣitām |
AS.Utt.49.403 uktāni śakyāni phalānvitāni yugānurūpāṇi rasāyanāni |
AS.Utt.49.404 amānuṣāṇāmativismayānāṃ satkarmaṇāṃ yadyapi tāni hetuḥ |
samūlakāṣaṃ tu kaṣanti dehaṃ bhraṃśādvidhestena vivarjitāni ||
AS.Utt.49.405 yugasvabhāvādyadi cauṣadhīnāṃ kriyāsu śaktiḥ parikalpyate 'lpā |
AS.Utt.49.406 na cauṣadhīnāmapi sarvathaiva prabhāvahāniḥ parikalpanīyā |
phalaṃ prayātyūrdhvamadhastrivṛttu pratyakṣataḥ kasya na siddhametat ||
nāśaṃ nayante sahasaiva dehaṃ samyakprayuktāni tathaiva vṛddhim ||
AS.Utt.49.408 jitvā tasmādindriyādīn suduṣṭān kālopetaḥ śvaddadhāno yathāvat |
sthiraṃ śarīraṃ kriyate śarīriṇāṃ kulaṃ yathā satpuruṣairadhiṣṭhitam ||
AS.Utt.49.413 adhyākrāntā ye 'mlapaṭukṣārakaṭūṣṇairdravyaistīkṣṇaiḥ sannihitā teṣu jarattā |
sandhukṣyognistairupajāte ca vivarjyā yogāstegnau dhātusamṛddheḥ sa hi mūlam ||
AS.Utt.49.414 āyuryogāḥ sādhvapi yuktā mṛduvahnau nairarthakyaṃ yānti kṛtaghne 'pyupakārāḥ |
dīpte vahnau te tu guṇaughairapi tucchā vistīryante pātranisṛṣṭā iva bhogāḥ ||
AS.Utt.49.416 guṇairobhiḥ samuditaḥ sevate yo rasāyanam |
maṭhapraveśena vināpi siddhiṃ vrajanti goṣṭheṣu rasāyanāni ||

div.head: atha pañcaśo 'dhyāyaḥ ||
div.p: AS.Utt.50.4 sāro hi jīvalokasya strī strīguṇasamanvitā |
AS.Utt.50.6 na tu tā api śobhante jarasānugatā iva |
puṃyogena vinā strīṇāṃ sa hi saṃvananaṃ param ||
na śarīramavāpnoti na vā ratiratiḥ kṣayam ||
AS.Utt.50.8 acchāyaḥ pūtikusumaḥ phalena rahito drumaḥ |
AS.Utt.50.12 cintājarābhyāṃ śukraṃ tu vyādhibhiḥ karmakarśanāt |
AS.Utt.50.16 santi cālpāśrayāḥ strīṣu balavanto bahuprajāḥ |
AS.Utt.50.22 mede dve dve ca kākolyau sūpyaparṇyau śatāvarīm |
AS.Utt.50.23 vīrāṃ payasyāṃ jīvantīmṛddhiṃ rāsnāṃ trikaṇṭakam |
AS.Utt.50.26 vīrāṃ svaguptāṃ kākolyau yaṣṭīṃ phalgu dvipippalīm |
AS.Utt.50.29 palamātraṃ tataḥ khādet pratyahaṃ rasadugdhamuk |
AS.Utt.50.32 sarvaiḥ kṣīreṇa haviṣo navāt prasthaṃ śṛte 'tra ca |
AS.Utt.50.34 medādibhiśca karṣāṃśaiḥ śṛtaṃ bāṣkayaṇaṃ payaḥ |
AS.Utt.50.37 madhūlikā māṣaparṇī sitā śṛṅgāṭakaṃ yavāḥ |
AS.Utt.50.41 cūrṇa vidāryā bahuśaḥ svarasenaiva bhāvitam |
payonupānaṃ yo lihyānnityavegaḥ sa nā bhavet ||
AS.Utt.50.44 kulīraśṛṅgyā yaḥ kalkamāloḍya payasā pibet |
AS.Utt.50.49 kṣīriṇī ca śvadaṃṣṭrā ca phāṇitaṃ śarkarā madhu |
pītvā saśarkaraṃ śītaṃ kuliṅga iva hṛṣyati ||
AS.Utt.50.57 ghṛtaprasthaṃ daśaguṇe kṣīre tat balapuṣṭikṛt |
pādaśeṣe ca saṃcūrṇya kuḍavāṃśāḥ pṛthak kṣipet ||
AS.Utt.50.63 vidāryā madhunaścātra kuḍavaṃ kuḍavaṃ kṣipet |
pacedekāṃ tataḥ prāśya śataṃ vrajati yoṣitām ||
AS.Utt.50.66 saṃyojya kṣīrasarpirbhyāṃ ghṛte pūpalikāḥ pacet |
AS.Utt.50.69 mudgāt godhūmataścāpi kuḍavaṃ kuḍavaṃ pṛthak |
pakvāṃ pūpalikāṃ khādan strīṣu hṛṣyati vājivat ||
AS.Utt.50.71 māyuraṃ taittiraṃ hāṃsamevameva rasaṃ pibet |
AS.Utt.50.74 yathā na bhindyādguṭikāstathā taṃ sādhayedrasam |
pīto bhuktaśca sa rasaḥ kurute śukramakṣayam ||
tapte sarpiṣi yaḥ khādet sa gacchet strīṣu na kṣayam ||
AS.Utt.50.79 ghṛtabhṛṣṭān rase chāge rohitān phalasārike |
AS.Utt.50.80 ghṛtaṃ māṣān sabastāṇḍān phalāmle māhiṣe rase |
svādau vā sādhayet pūtaṃ tadrasaṃ bharjayet ghṛte ||
pītaḥ sa vṛṣyo balyaśca bṛṃhaṇaśca paraṃ rasaḥ ||
kalpayecchikhino hāṃse haṃsān vā śikhije rase ||
AS.Utt.50.83 tṛptiṃ caṭakamāṃsānāṃ gatvā yonu payaḥ pibet |
AS.Utt.50.84 ghṛtāḍhyaṃ kukvuṭaṃ śūlyaṃ śītaṃ khādet samākṣikam |
AS.Utt.50.87 bhuktvā yo māṣasūpena ghṛtāḍyaṃ ṣaṣṭikaudanam |
payaḥ pibati jāgarti kṛtsnāṃ rātriṃ sa vegavān ||
AS.Utt.50.92 toyāḍhake palāṃśāni pādaśeṣeṇa tena ca |
AS.Utt.50.94 śṛṅgāṭakāni capalā navaṃ sarpiḥpayo jalam |
AS.Utt.50.100 medāṃ payasyāṃ jīvantīṃ vidārīṃ kaṇṭakārikām |
sitayā ca yutaṃ pītvā vṛddhopi taruṇāyate ||
AS.Utt.50.105 dadhnaḥ sareṇa saghṛto bhakṣitaḥ ṣaṣṭikaudanaḥ |
pādalepaṃ naraḥ kṛtvā niśi vegairna hīyate ||
siddhaścaraṇalepoyaṃ bhuvaṃ padbhyāṃ tu na spṛśet ||
AS.Utt.50.111 ebhirbhakṣyāṇi peyāni lehyāni ca ghṛtāni ca |
yuñjīta bastīn putrārthī putrakāmoditaṃ ca yat ||
kiṃ punaḥ strīśarīre ye saṅghaghātena pratiṣṭhitāḥ ||
taṃ taṃ prāpya vivarddhante naraṃ rūpādayo guṇāḥ ||
AS.Utt.50.118 tasmādyā yasya hṛdayaṃ viśatīva varāṅganā |
AS.Utt.50.120 pibantīva ca paśyantī spṛśantī limpatīva yā |
AS.Utt.50.121 nayatyutsukatāṃ ceto nityaṃ sannihitāpi yā |
AS.Utt.50.122 pragalbhā rītasaṅgrāme svasthā lajjāmayī ca yā |
bahuśopi ca yāṃ gatvā tatpūrvamiva gacchati ||
AS.Utt.50.125 prājñāḥ kalājñā vaśagā vinītāḥ priyaṃvadāḥ prītikarā vayasyāḥ |
AS.Utt.50.126 kāntā vanāntāḥ parapuṣṭaghuṣṭā ramyāḥ sravantyaḥ satataṃ sravantyaḥ |
madyaṃ madāmodakaraṃ viśeṣādhdṛdyā prasannā surabhiḥ prasannā ||
saudhaṃ sudhāśubhratarāḥ karāśca candrasya kurvanti paraṃ vṛṣatvam ||
AS.Utt.50.129 bandhena pūrvopahitena puṃsaḥ khinnasya vṛttiḥ karaṇāntareṇa |
AS.Utt.50.131 tasmānnityaṃ strīṣu vāñchan priyatvaṃ vṛṣyairyogairjātakāmo 'pi kāmī |
satvṃa sātmyaṃ deśakālau ca budhvā cātuṣṣaṣṭe ceṣṭite vyāpriyeta ||
sītkāragarbhaṃ hasitaṃ sahāvaṃ chinnākṣaraṃ vibhramavacca gītam ||
AS.Utt.50.136 srotassu śudveṣvamale śarīre vṛṣyaṃ yadādyaṃ mitamatti kāle |
vṛṣāyate tena paraṃ manuṣyastadbṛṃhaṇaṃ dehabalapradaṃ ca ||
AS.Utt.50.137 tasmāt purā śodhanameva kāryaṃ balānurūpaṃ na ca vṛṣyayogāḥ |
sidhyanti dehe kaluṣe prayuktāḥ kliṣṭe yathā vāsasi rāgayogāḥ ||
AS.Utt.50.139 etat svarūpaṃ śāstrasya yadvyāpitvena varṇyate |
AS.Utt.50.142 kathaṃ vā sarvaevaite yogā rāgāgnidīpanāḥ |
AS.Utt.50.144 prakrānte sarvathā sarvamuktaṃ bhavati sūditam |
AS.Utt.50.145 tathā ca gardabhīkṣīraṃ māṃsamaśvasya hastinām |
AS.Utt.50.150 tatrādhikaraṇaṃ yogo hetvarthorthaḥ padasya ca |
AS.Utt.50.163 kuryāt prayuktaṃ śastrādi saśeṣamapi rogiṇam |
AS.Utt.50.164 sadā doṣauṣadhādīni vīkṣya dvādaśa tatvataḥ |
śāstratatvaṃ na vijñāya sa durātmā cikitsati ||
AS.Utt.50.168 lobhayantyāturaṃ mūḍhā ye citraiḥ karmakauśalaiḥ |
AS.Utt.50.175 arājakā yathā deśā bhartṛhīnā yathā gṛhāḥ |
AS.Utt.50.177 yajñasya hi śiraśchinnamaśvibhyāṃ sandhitaṃ punaḥ |
pātitā daśanāḥ pūṣṇo bhagasya ca vilocane ||
AS.Utt.50.179 bhārgavaścavanaḥ kāmī vṛddhaḥ san vikṛtiṃ gataḥ |
AS.Utt.50.181 aśvibhyāṃ sahitaḥ somaṃ prātaḥ pibati vāsavaḥ |
AS.Utt.50.182 aśvinoḥ kalpyate bhāgo yajñeṣu brāhmaṇairapi |
prāṇibhiḥ pitṛvatpūjyaḥ prāṇācāryaḥ sa hi smṛtaḥ ||
na vaidyo vaidyaśabdaṃ hi labhate pūrvajanmanā ||
AS.Utt.50.187 vidyāsamāptāvāṣa vā brahmaṃ vā bhiṣajaṃ dhruvam |
AS.Utt.50.190 kurvate ye tu vṛtyarthaṃ cikitsāpaṇyavikrayam |
AS.Utt.50.196 sarvatra maitrī karuṇātureṣu nirāmadeheṣu nṛṣu pramodaḥ |
AS.Utt.50.198 kimuta nirāmiṣeṇa manasā karuṇāmṛdunā kṛpaṇaviśiṣṭayoḥ sadṛśamādaramudvahatā |
atiguru bodhisatvacaritaṃ satataṃ vidadhacchamayati rogajālamapi yotivirodhi mithaḥ ||
AS.Utt.50.201 prāṇācārthaṃ vedapāraṃ prayātaṃ budhyā yuktaṃ pūjayennityamasmāt |
yasminyasya prāṇayātrā nibaddhā tasmai yacchan ko dhanānāṃ dhanāyet ||
AS.Utt.50.203 bhiṣagvaro vāgbhaṭa ityabhūnme pitāmaho nāmadharo 'smi yasya |
AS.Utt.50.204 samadhigamya guroravalokitāt gurutarācca pituḥ pratibhā mayā |
AS.Utt.50.205 pūrvoktameva vadatā kimivoditaṃ syācchraddhālutuṣṭijananaṃ na bhavatyapūrvam |
saṅkṣiptasaṃśayitavistṛtaviprakīrṇaḥ kṛtsnortharāśiriti sādhu sa eva dṛṣṭaḥ ||
AS.Utt.50.207 smṛtvedamuditaṃ pūrvaṃ śrutvedānīṃ dvayoḥ punaḥ |
smarttuḥ śrotuśca sutarāṃ śraddhātuṃ kasya yujyate ||
AS.Utt.50.209 ūrdhvameti madanaṃ trivṛtādho vastumātraka iti pratipādye |
madvidho yadi vadedathavātriḥ kathyatāṃ ka iva karmaṇi bhedaḥ ||
bāliśo bhavati no khalu vidvān sūkta eva ramate matirasya ||
yaduditamiha puṇyaṃ kurvato menuvādaṃ bhavatu vigatarogo nirvṛtastena lokaḥ ||
